original: 'ol ma se stong gi ljid tsam du mi 'gyur gyi /🔽'on kyang dngos po lhag par 'gyur ba de ltar na ma sha ka la sogs pa grangs mtshungs pa mi rung ngo //🔽rdzas kyi tshogs pa de tsam nye ba dang / de dang 'bral ba la ji ltar lci ba mtshungs par mi 'gyur na /
analyzed: 'ol ma se stong gi ljid tsam du mi 'gyur gyi / 'on kyang dngos po lhag par 'gyur ba de ltar na ma sha ka la sogs pa grangs mtshungs pa mi rung ngo // rdzas kyi tshogs pa de tsam nye ba dang / de dang 'bral ba la ji ltar lci ba mtshungs par mi 'gyur na /
translated: It is not as heavy as a thousand Olmas.🔽But it is heavy in comparison with a lesser quantity of the same substance.🔽In the same way, the quantity of a substance is not the only cause of heaviness.🔽But since it is heavy in comparison with a lesser quantity of the same substance, the number of Mashaka, etc., is not the only cause of heaviness.

original: mtshungs par 'gyur ba yang yin de bas na rdul cha gnyis pa la sogs pa 'bras bu'i rdzas de las gzhan pa gzhal bar bya ba yod pa ma yin no //🔽ci stem sha ka la sogs pa'i grangs mi mnyam pa'i skyon du ma gyur cig snyam pa nas /
analyzed: mtshungs par 'gyur ba yang yin de bas na rdul cha gnyis pa la sogs pa 'bras bu'i rdzas de las gzhan pa gzhal bar bya ba yod pa ma yin no // ci stem sha ka la sogs pa'i grangs mi mnyam pa'i skyon du ma gyur cig snyam pa nas /
translated: If the quantity of a substance is not the only cause of heaviness, why is a heap of a certain weight not as heavy as the sum of the weights of the parts?🔽The weight of a heap is not the sum of the weights of its parts.

original: yungs kar nas brtsams te re re bsnan pa nas tshogs chen po'i bar du'o //
analyzed: yungs kar nas brtsams te re re bsnan pa nas tshogs chen po'i bar du'o //
translated: If the number of Mashaka, etc., is not the only cause of heaviness, why is a heap of a certain weight not as heavy as the sum of the weights of the parts?

original: de ltar tshogs chen po de thams cad lci ba nyid du rtogs pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de ltar tshogs chen po de thams cad lci ba nyid du rtogs pa ma yin no //
translated: The weight of a heap is not the sum of the weights of its parts.

original: yungs kar gnyis la sogs pa'i 'bras bu'i rdzas kyi phreng ba gnyis po de la ldan pa'i 'bras bu gang yin pa de ni lci ba nyid du 'byung ba'i dang tshul can nyid yin zhing /
analyzed: yungs kar gnyis la sogs pa'i 'bras bu'i rdzas kyi phreng ba gnyis po de la ldan pa'i 'bras bu gang yin pa de ni lci ba nyid du 'byung ba'i dang tshul can nyid yin zhing /
translated: The effect of the two strings of mustard seeds and so on is the nature of being heavy.

original: de bzhin du gsum pa ldan pa na 'bras bu'i rdzas yod pa lci ba nyid kyi dang tshul du 'byung ba yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin du gsum pa ldan pa na 'bras bu'i rdzas yod pa lci ba nyid kyi dang tshul du 'byung ba yin no //
translated: Similarly, the effect of three is the nature of being heavy.

original: de ltar na gong nas gong du 'phel ldan thams cad lci ba nyid rtogs pa nyid ni ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: de ltar na gong nas gong du 'phel ldan thams cad lci ba nyid rtogs pa nyid ni ma yin no zhe na /
translated: In that case, the nature of being heavy is not understood in the increase of all.

original: 'di ltar gal te yungs kar nas brtsams nas tshogs chen po gong nas gong du ni /
analyzed: 'di ltar gal te yungs kar nas brtsams nas tshogs chen po gong nas gong du ni /
translated: Thus, if the nature of being heavy is not understood in the increase of a great collection beginning from mustard seeds,

original: 'phel ldan 'bras 'phel lci pa nyid rtogs pa nyid ni ma @300a * //
analyzed: 'phel ldan 'bras 'phel lci pa nyid rtogs pa nyid ni ma @300a * //
translated: then the nature of being heavy is not understood in the increase of the effect.

original: yin na // de'i tshe /
analyzed: yin na // de'i tshe /
translated: At that time,🔽the nature of being heavy is very difficult to understand prior to mustard seeds.

original: yungs kar las sngar lci ba nyid shin tu rtogs dka' ba yungs kar las sngar ji srid 'bras bu'i phreng ba shin tu phra ba'i lci ba nyid gang yin pa chung ba ste /
analyzed: yungs kar las sngar lci ba nyid shin tu rtogs dka' ba yungs kar las sngar ji srid 'bras bu'i phreng ba shin tu phra ba'i lci ba nyid gang yin pa chung ba ste /
translated: The nature of being heavy of a very subtle string of effects prior to mustard seeds is small.

original: de rtogs par dka' ba nyid yin no //
analyzed: de rtogs par dka' ba nyid yin no //
translated: It is difficult to understand.

original: yungs kar las gzhan pa'i lci ba nyid kyang nye bar mtshon pa rang nyid kyis kyang bsnyon par nus pa ma yin pa de ltar na 'bras bu'i rdzas de'i rdul phra rab kyi ngo bo rgyu ni gzhal bya thob pa'o //
analyzed: yungs kar las gzhan pa'i lci ba nyid kyang nye bar mtshon pa rang nyid kyis kyang bsnyon par nus pa ma yin pa de ltar na 'bras bu'i rdzas de'i rdul phra rab kyi ngo bo rgyu ni gzhal bya thob pa'o //
translated: The heaviness of the sesame seed, which is different from the sesame seed, cannot be demonstrated, and it cannot be denied. In the same way, the cause of the substance of the effect, the atom, is not perceived.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why?

original: de'i 'bras bu lci ba mtshon pa med phyir te de ma thag par bshad zin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i 'bras bu lci ba mtshon pa med phyir te de ma thag par bshad zin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the heaviness of the effect is not perceived, because it has just been explained.

original: rdul phra rab dag la lci ba nyid la sogs pa'i yon tan dmigs pa yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: rdul phra rab dag la lci ba nyid la sogs pa'i yon tan dmigs pa yod pa ma yin te /
translated: The quality of heaviness, etc., is not perceived in the atoms.

original: de mi dmigs pa nyid las yan lag can du brtags pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de mi dmigs pa nyid las yan lag can du brtags pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is not perceived, the whole is imagined.

original: de bas na don thams cad mngon sum nyid ma yin par thal bar 'gyur /
analyzed: de bas na don thams cad mngon sum nyid ma yin par thal bar 'gyur /
translated: Therefore, it follows that all objects are not perceived.

original: gal te ras bal lci bar rtogs pa med pa de lta na yang /
analyzed: gal te ras bal lci bar rtogs pa med pa de lta na yang /
translated: Even though the heaviness of the cotton is not perceived,

original: de snang ba nyid yin pa'i phyir de yod pa nyid yin par rigs pa yin te /
analyzed: de snang ba nyid yin pa'i phyir de yod pa nyid yin par rigs pa yin te /
translated: it is reasonable that it exists, because it appears.

original: yan lag can gyi mtshan nyid can gyi /
analyzed: yan lag can gyi mtshan nyid can gyi /
translated: The definition of the whole is that which possesses parts.🔽

original: don de mi mthong ras ba la bzhin //
analyzed: don de mi mthong ras ba la bzhin //
translated: The object which has the characteristic of being a whole is not seen, like a piece of cloth.

original: de'i 'bras bu ste /
analyzed: de'i 'bras bu ste /
translated: The result of that is that

original: lci ba dang gzugs dang bsgribs pa la sogs pa mthong ba med do //
analyzed: lci ba dang gzugs dang bsgribs pa la sogs pa mthong ba med do //
translated: weight, form, obstruction, etc. are not seen.

original: de bas na ma sha ka la sogs pa de'i lci ba'i yon tan rtogs med bzhin de'i yon tan /
analyzed: de bas na ma sha ka la sogs pa de'i lci ba'i yon tan rtogs med bzhin de'i yon tan /
translated: Therefore, the quality of weight of a māṣa, etc. is not understood.

original: thams cad de /
analyzed: thams cad de /
translated: All of its qualities,

original: gzugs la sogs pa dag nye bar mtshon med phyir rgyu'i phyir /
analyzed: gzugs la sogs pa dag nye bar mtshon med phyir rgyu'i phyir /
translated: form, etc. are not indicated, because of the cause.

original: ma sha la sogs lhag ma med /
analyzed: ma sha la sogs lhag ma med /
translated: There is no remainder of the māṣa, etc.

original: dma' de mtshon pa ste /
analyzed: dma' de mtshon pa ste /
translated: The remainder is indicated,

original: dma' ba'i khyad par 'dzin pa med pa'i phyir /🔽ma sha ka la sogs pa lhag pa med pa ni /
analyzed: dma' ba'i khyad par 'dzin pa med pa'i phyir / ma sha ka la sogs pa lhag pa med pa ni /
translated: because there is no apprehension of a difference in weight.

original: nye bar mtshon pa tsam ni yin mod kyi /
analyzed: nye bar mtshon pa tsam ni yin mod kyi /
translated: The remainder of the māṣa, etc. is indeed merely indicated,

original: 'on kyang lci nga la sogs pa bzhin du de'i gzugs la sogs pa med par yang 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'on kyang lci nga la sogs pa bzhin du de'i gzugs la sogs pa med par yang 'gyur ro //
translated: but nevertheless, like weight, etc., its form, etc. would not exist.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: gzugs la sogs pa yul du gyur pa /
analyzed: gzugs la sogs pa yul du gyur pa /
translated: Form, etc. are objects.

original: lhag dang lhag nyid bdag ci bzhin /
analyzed: lhag dang lhag nyid bdag ci bzhin /
translated: The remainder and the remainder itself are just like the self.

original: dbang pos mig la sogs pas mthong ba med phyir te /🔽rgyu'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dbang pos mig la sogs pas mthong ba med phyir te / rgyu'i phyir ro //
translated: because the sense faculties do not see the form, etc.🔽of the lump, etc.

original: 'ji ba la sogs pa ril bu ma 'dres pa'i gnas skabs kyi gzugs la sogs pa gang yin pa de las 'dres pa'i gnas skabs kyi gzugs la sogs pa lhag pa yang bdag nyid ji lta ba bzhin du dbang pos mthong ba med phyir ro //🔽'dis ni med pa'i tha snyad bsgrub pa'i phyir /
analyzed: 'ji ba la sogs pa ril bu ma 'dres pa'i gnas skabs kyi gzugs la sogs pa gang yin pa de las 'dres pa'i gnas skabs kyi gzugs la sogs pa lhag pa yang bdag nyid ji lta ba bzhin du dbang pos mthong ba med phyir ro // 'dis ni med pa'i tha snyad bsgrub pa'i phyir /
translated: The form, etc. of the lump, etc. in the unmixed state is not seen by the sense faculties in the mixed state, just as it is.🔽This shows that the proof of the non-existence of the lump, etc.

original: mi dmigs pa'i bdag nyid can gyi @300b sgrub par byed pa bstan pa yin no //🔽khas blangs rang gi tshig sogs kyis //
analyzed: mi dmigs pa'i bdag nyid can gyi @300b sgrub par byed pa bstan pa yin no // khas blangs rang gi tshig sogs kyis //
translated: is by the non-apprehension of what is apprehensible.

original: gnod pa dag ni yod pas kyang //
analyzed: gnod pa dag ni yod pas kyang //
translated: But there is refutation by what is accepted, by one’s own words, etc.🔽There is also refutation by direct perception, inference, and testimony.

original: sogs pa smos pas ni /
analyzed: sogs pa smos pas ni /
translated: The “etc.”

original: mngon sum dang / rjes su dpag pa dang / grags pas gnod pa yod pa gzung ngo //
analyzed: mngon sum dang / rjes su dpag pa dang / grags pas gnod pa yod pa gzung ngo //
translated: refers to refutation by direct perception, inference, and testimony.

original: ji ltar khas blangs pa'i gnod pa yod pa ni khas blangs pa la sogs pa gang gis gang la gnod pa yod pa des gnod par brjod par bya'o zhes bstan pa'i don to //
analyzed: ji ltar khas blangs pa'i gnod pa yod pa ni khas blangs pa la sogs pa gang gis gang la gnod pa yod pa des gnod par brjod par bya'o zhes bstan pa'i don to //
translated: The meaning of the statement “The fault that is admitted is stated as a fault for whomever it is admitted and so on” is this: The fault that is admitted is stated as a fault for whomever it is admitted and so on.

original: ji skad bshad pa'i phyogs la ni //
analyzed: ji skad bshad pa'i phyogs la ni //
translated: In the system that is explained,

original: ji ltar bsgrub par bya ba'i chos kyi khyad par med na mi 'byung bar yod pa can la gnod pa yod pa de ltar /
analyzed: ji ltar bsgrub par bya ba'i chos kyi khyad par med na mi 'byung bar yod pa can la gnod pa yod pa de ltar /
translated: if the specific property of the probandum does not exist without the property of the subject that is explained, then the fault that is stated is a fault for whomever it is stated.

original: ji skad bshad pa'i phyogs kyi chos can gyi khyad par dang / rang gi ngo po gsal ba la /
analyzed: ji skad bshad pa'i phyogs kyi chos can gyi khyad par dang / rang gi ngo po gsal ba la /
translated: In the specific property of the subject that is explained and in its own nature,

original: dpe gzhan gang yin pa de yang / rtogs par bya zhing khong du chud par bya'o //
analyzed: dpe gzhan gang yin pa de yang / rtogs par bya zhing khong du chud par bya'o //
translated: whatever other examples there are should be understood and comprehended.

original: rang nyid kyi gzhung bshad par bya ba la /
analyzed: rang nyid kyi gzhung bshad par bya ba la /
translated: Now, in the explanation of our own texts,

original: gzhan gyi 'dod pa dpyod pa yan lag ma yin du zin kyang bshad par bya ba'i gzhung gi nang du 'dus pa nyid kyis zhar la 'ongs pa dpyod pa med par ci'i phyir 'dug ce na /
analyzed: gzhan gyi 'dod pa dpyod pa yan lag ma yin du zin kyang bshad par bya ba'i gzhung gi nang du 'dus pa nyid kyis zhar la 'ongs pa dpyod pa med par ci'i phyir 'dug ce na /
translated: even though the analysis of the assertions of others is not a branch of the text, since it is included in the text that is to be explained, why is the analysis of the digression not included?

original: de bshad 'dod pa'i phyir byed pa dang ldan dus gsum gyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: de bshad 'dod pa'i phyir byed pa dang ldan dus gsum gyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: In order to explain that, he says, “at the time of the three,” and so on.🔽The statement of the probandum is the thesis of the logicians and so on.

original: rigs pa can la sogs pa dag gi bsgrub par bya ba bshad pa ni dam bca' pa yin pa de ltar na 'di bsgrub par bya ba smos pa ni grub pa la bzlog par nus pa yin gyi /
analyzed: rigs pa can la sogs pa dag gi bsgrub par bya ba bshad pa ni dam bca' pa yin pa de ltar na 'di bsgrub par bya ba smos pa ni grub pa la bzlog par nus pa yin gyi /
translated: Thus, the statement of the probandum is capable of being refuted in regard to what is established,

original: gtan tshigs ma grub pa la sogs bzlog par byed pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: gtan tshigs ma grub pa la sogs bzlog par byed pa ni ma yin no //
translated: but it is not capable of being refuted in regard to an unestablished reason and so on.

original: de ltar na gtan tshigs dang dpe ma grub pa'i tshig dam bca' bar thal bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: de ltar na gtan tshigs dang dpe ma grub pa'i tshig dam bca' bar thal bar 'gyur te /
translated: Thus, it follows that the words of an unestablished reason and example are a thesis.

original: dper na sgra rtag pa yin te /
analyzed: dper na sgra rtag pa yin te /
translated: For example, “Sound is permanent,

original: mig gis gzung bar bya ba nyid yin pa'i phyir dang / sgra rtag ste /🔽lus can yin pa nyid kyi phyir te /
analyzed: mig gis gzung bar bya ba nyid yin pa'i phyir dang / sgra rtag ste / lus can yin pa nyid kyi phyir te /
translated: because it is perceptible by the eye, and sound is permanent,

original: blo bzhin no zhes bya ba lta bu'o //
analyzed: blo bzhin no zhes bya ba lta bu'o //
translated: because it is corporeal, like the mind.”

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: byed pa dang ldan pa'i rkyen rnams dus gsum gyi yul can nyid phyir bsgrub par bya bar 'gyur ba yang dam bca' ba nyid yin pa bzlog par dka'o //
analyzed: byed pa dang ldan pa'i rkyen rnams dus gsum gyi yul can nyid phyir bsgrub par bya bar 'gyur ba yang dam bca' ba nyid yin pa bzlog par dka'o //
translated: The conditions that possess activity are the objects of the three times. Therefore, the probandum is also the thesis. It is difficult to refute.

original: de bas na rtag pa nyid sgrub par byed pa gang de bzhin min /
analyzed: de bas na rtag pa nyid sgrub par byed pa gang de bzhin min /
translated: Therefore, the proof of permanence is not so.

original: bdag nyid blo la sogs pa mi rtag pa nyid la sogs pa'i rang bzhin can no //
analyzed: bdag nyid blo la sogs pa mi rtag pa nyid la sogs pa'i rang bzhin can no //
translated: The nature of the self is impermanence, etc.

original: de ltar ma grub pa gzhan la de lta bu'i ngo bor 'god pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: de ltar ma grub pa gzhan la de lta bu'i ngo bor 'god pa de'i tshe /
translated: Thus, when establishing the other unestablished in such a nature,

original: rtag pa nyid sgrub par byed pa'i dus na /
analyzed: rtag pa nyid sgrub par byed pa'i dus na /
translated: at the time of proving permanence,

original: bsgrub par mi 'dod pa'ang /
analyzed: bsgrub par mi 'dod pa'ang /
translated: even what is not intended to be proven

original: bsgrub par bya ba'i skyon du thal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba'i skyon du thal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: becomes a fault of the probandum.

original: de phyir shes byed skabs la ni //
analyzed: de phyir shes byed skabs la ni //
translated: Therefore, in the context of the object of knowledge,

original: shes pa'i phyir sgrub par byed pa'i skabs las cung zad cig ma grub pa gang yin pa de ma @301a * //
analyzed: shes pa'i phyir sgrub par byed pa'i skabs las cung zad cig ma grub pa gang yin pa de ma @301a * //
translated: whatever is slightly unestablished in the context of the proof due to knowledge,

original: grub thams cad 'gal ba med pa 'dzin par byed pa'i bsgrub par bya ba'i sgras khyad par de'i tshe /
analyzed: grub thams cad 'gal ba med pa 'dzin par byed pa'i bsgrub par bya ba'i sgras khyad par de'i tshe /
translated: that unestablished is accepted without contradiction. When the word probandum is qualified by that,

original: rgol bar 'dod pa bsgrub par bya ba nyid du 'dod pa'i khyad par phyogs nyid yin par dmigs par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: rgol bar 'dod pa bsgrub par bya ba nyid du 'dod pa'i khyad par phyogs nyid yin par dmigs par mi 'gyur te /
translated: The opponent does not perceive the specific property of the subject that he wishes to prove.

original: rtogs par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rtogs par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: He does not understand it.

original: gal te bsgrub par bya ba'i sgra spyi'i sgra nyid yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: gal te bsgrub par bya ba'i sgra spyi'i sgra nyid yin pa'i phyir /
translated: If the word “probandum” is a general term,

original: khyad par ston pa ma yin /
analyzed: khyad par ston pa ma yin /
translated: it does not indicate a specific property.

original: ci'i phyir gtan tshigs la sogs pa'i ma grub pa'i tshig nyid dam bca' bar 'gyur ro zhes brjod kyi /
analyzed: ci'i phyir gtan tshigs la sogs pa'i ma grub pa'i tshig nyid dam bca' bar 'gyur ro zhes brjod kyi /
translated: Why is it that the words “unproven” in the case of the reason, etc.,

original: thams cad ma grub pa yang ma yin zhe na /
analyzed: thams cad ma grub pa yang ma yin zhe na /
translated: are not also a thesis?

original: shes par byed pa'i skabs las gzhan la thal ba med do /
analyzed: shes par byed pa'i skabs las gzhan la thal ba med do /
translated: The consequence does not apply to anything other than the context of the proof.

original: gzhan du ri bong rva la sogs //
analyzed: gzhan du ri bong rva la sogs //
translated: Otherwise, the horns of a rabbit, etc.,

original: kun la ma grub kyang sgrub 'gyur //
analyzed: kun la ma grub kyang sgrub 'gyur //
translated: would be established even though they are not established for anyone.

original: de bas na de ni shes par byed pa'i skabs yin pa'i phyir mi 'gyur ro zhes 'dod par bya'o //
analyzed: de bas na de ni shes par byed pa'i skabs yin pa'i phyir mi 'gyur ro zhes 'dod par bya'o //
translated: Therefore, it should be accepted that this is not the case because it is a context of proof.

original: de ltar ni 'gyur mod kyi /
analyzed: de ltar ni 'gyur mod kyi /
translated: This is true, but

original: rang gi ngo bo las dang byed pa po dang / bsgrub par rnam par gzhag pa dag yin zhing /
analyzed: rang gi ngo bo las dang byed pa po dang / bsgrub par rnam par gzhag pa dag yin zhing /
translated: the nature of the probandum, the proof, and the prover are established.

original: byed pa po dang ldan pa'i rkyen 'di ni las la yin pa des na las brjod pa'i ngang tshul can gyis bsgrub par bya bar smos pas sgrub par byed pa 'phangs pa ma yin na /
analyzed: byed pa po dang ldan pa'i rkyen 'di ni las la yin pa des na las brjod pa'i ngang tshul can gyis bsgrub par bya bar smos pas sgrub par byed pa 'phangs pa ma yin na /
translated: Since this condition of the agent is with regard to the object, when the object is stated in the manner of what is to be accomplished, the means of accomplishment is not implied.

original: gang gis na de bsgrub par bya ba nyid yin par 'gyur /
analyzed: gang gis na de bsgrub par bya ba nyid yin par 'gyur /
translated: By what would it be the object?

original: byed pa po ches shin tu 'dod pa las yin pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: byed pa po ches shin tu 'dod pa las yin pa de'i tshe /
translated: If it is the object of the very desirous agent,

original: gtan tshigs la sogs pa ma grub pa bsgrub par bya ba nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: gtan tshigs la sogs pa ma grub pa bsgrub par bya ba nyid ma yin no //
translated: then the unestablished reason, etc. are not the object.

original: grub pa'i mtha' yang rnam pa bzhi ste /
analyzed: grub pa'i mtha' yang rnam pa bzhi ste /
translated: The conclusion is also of four types:

original: rgyud thams cad kyi grub ba'i mtha' dang / rgol ba rgyud kyi grub pa'i mtha' dang / skabs kyi grub pa'i mtha' dang / khas blangs pa'i grub pa'i mtha'o //
analyzed: rgyud thams cad kyi grub ba'i mtha' dang / rgol ba rgyud kyi grub pa'i mtha' dang / skabs kyi grub pa'i mtha' dang / khas blangs pa'i grub pa'i mtha'o //
translated: the conclusion of all the tantras, the conclusion of the tantra of the opponent, the conclusion of the context, and the conclusion of the assertion.

original: de skabs su byas nas bsgrub par bya ba'i bshad pa dam bca' ba yin no zhes brjod pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de skabs su byas nas bsgrub par bya ba'i bshad pa dam bca' ba yin no zhes brjod pa'i phyir /
translated: Having made that the context, the explanation of what is to be accomplished is the thesis.

original: grub pa'i mtha'i mtshan nyid bshad pa yang dam bca' ba yang yin no //
analyzed: grub pa'i mtha'i mtshan nyid bshad pa yang dam bca' ba yang yin no //
translated: Therefore, the explanation of the definition of the conclusion is also the thesis.

original: dam bca' ba dang / gtan tshigs dang / dpe dang / nye bar sbyar ba dang / mjug bsdu pa'i skabs dag la sgrub par byed pa'i yul nyid bsgrub par bya ba'i yan lag gang yin pa de /
analyzed: dam bca' ba dang / gtan tshigs dang / dpe dang / nye bar sbyar ba dang / mjug bsdu pa'i skabs dag la sgrub par byed pa'i yul nyid bsgrub par bya ba'i yan lag gang yin pa de /
translated: The object of proof in the context of the thesis, reason, example, application, and conclusion is a part of the probandum.

original: dam bca' tsam yin no zhes don gyis rtogs pa'i phyir /
analyzed: dam bca' tsam yin no zhes don gyis rtogs pa'i phyir /
translated: Because the meaning is understood implicitly,

analyzed: 'di ltar gtan tshigs la sogs pa ma grub pa la yang /

original: grub mtha' mtshungs so //
analyzed: grub mtha' mtshungs so //
translated: they are the same in terms of the philosophical tenet.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /🔽gang gis de dag kyang rgol ba'i rgyud la sogs pa'i grub pa'i mtha'i khas blangs mtshan nyid phyir /

original: khas blangs pa'i rang bzhin can gyi khyad par med pas gang las de dag rnam par gcod pa yin gal te yang ma grub pa la sogs pa de'i te khas mi len pa de ltar na khas blang bar bya ba dag la byed pa dang ldan pa'i rkyen
analyzed: khas blangs pa'i rang bzhin can gyi khyad par med pas gang las de dag rnam par gcod pa yin gal te yang ma grub pa la sogs pa de'i te khas mi len pa de ltar na khas blang bar bya ba dag la byed pa dang ldan pa'i rkyen
translated: If one does not accept that which is not established and so on, then the conditions that possess activity with regard to that which is to be accepted

original: bshad pa nyid kyis grub pa'i mtha' nyid thob par 'gyur ro //🔽'di yang bsgrub par bya ba'i chos sam chos can nam /
analyzed: bshad pa nyid kyis grub pa'i mtha' nyid thob par 'gyur ro // 'di yang bsgrub par bya ba'i chos sam chos can nam /

original: gnyi gar 'gyur grang na /
analyzed: gnyi gar 'gyur grang na /

analyzed: gal te chos can tsam bsgrub par bya ba yin pa de'i tshe bsgrub par bya ba dang chos mthun pa nyid kyi phyir /
translated: If the mere subject is what is to be established, then because it is similar to the property of the thesis,

original: de'i chos yod pa can dpe yin no zhes bya ba 'gal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i chos yod pa can dpe yin no zhes bya ba 'gal bar 'gyur ro //

analyzed: de ltar na bsgrub par bya ba'i chos mi rtag pa nyid skye ba dang ldan pa nyid la sogs par chos su mi 'gyur te /
translated: In that case, the property of the thesis, impermanence, would not be a property of that which possesses the property of being produced, and so on.

original: de ni sgra'i chos nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ni sgra'i chos nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because that is the intrinsic reality of sound.

original: bsgrub par bya ba'i chos dpe'i chos de'i chos nyid yod pa can nyid du mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba'i chos dpe'i chos de'i chos nyid yod pa can nyid du mi 'gyur ro //

original: ci ste chos can bsgrub par bya ba yin na de'i tshe /
analyzed: ci ste chos can bsgrub par bya ba yin na de'i tshe /
translated: But if the subject is the thesis, then in that case,

original: chos can bsgrub par bya ba yin na /🔽dpe dang chos mthun pa nyid kyi phyir bsgrub par bya ba @302a * //
analyzed: chos can bsgrub par bya ba yin na / dpe dang chos mthun pa nyid kyi phyir bsgrub par bya ba @302a * //

original: sgrub par byed pa'i gtan tshigs yin no zhes bya bar mi rung ngo //
analyzed: sgrub par byed pa'i gtan tshigs yin no zhes bya bar mi rung ngo //
translated: because it is similar to the example.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: gang gi phyir sgra grub pa ma yin pa gang gis na bsgrub par bya ba de sgrub par byed pa de'i gtan tshigs yin te /
analyzed: gang gi phyir sgra grub pa ma yin pa gang gis na bsgrub par bya ba de sgrub par byed pa de'i gtan tshigs yin te /
translated: Because sound is not established, by which it would be the proof of that which is to be established.

original: sgra ni grub pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: sgra ni grub pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Because sound is already established.

original: 'di ltar chos dang chos can gnyi ga bsgrub par bya ba yin pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: 'di ltar chos dang chos can gnyi ga bsgrub par bya ba yin pa de'i tshe /
translated: In that case, both the property and the basis of the property would be the probandum.

original: gnyi ga bsgrub par bya ba nyid du 'gyur ba'i skyon gang yin pa de ldog pa med pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: gnyi ga bsgrub par bya ba nyid du 'gyur ba'i skyon gang yin pa de ldog pa med pa nyid yin no //
translated: The error that both would be the probandum would be unavoidable.

original: de ltar gnas pa la 'on te tshogs pa bsgrub par bya ba nyid yin par 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: de ltar gnas pa la 'on te tshogs pa bsgrub par bya ba nyid yin par 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: If you say that the collection is the probandum,

original: bshad pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: bshad pa de'i tshe /
translated: then in that case,

original: tshogs pa bsgrub bya nyid yin na'ang /
analyzed: tshogs pa bsgrub bya nyid yin na'ang /
translated: even if the collection were the probandum,

original: khas len par byed na gzhan ni gzhan gyi khyad par yin /
analyzed: khas len par byed na gzhan ni gzhan gyi khyad par yin /
translated: the other would be the qualifier of the qualifier.

original: bsgrub par bya ba'i chos kyi khyad par du byas pa'i chos can nam chos can nam chos can gyis khyad par du byas pa'i chos bsgrub par bya ba yin par 'dod par 'gyur te /
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba'i chos kyi khyad par du byas pa'i chos can nam chos can nam chos can gyis khyad par du byas pa'i chos bsgrub par bya ba yin par 'dod par 'gyur te /
translated: If you assert that the property or the basis of the property qualified by the property to be proven is the probandum,

original: tshogs pa can dag las tshogs pa don gzhan nyid ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: tshogs pa can dag las tshogs pa don gzhan nyid ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: then the collection would not be a different object from the members of the collection.

original: chos dang chos can gnyis bsgrub par bya ba yin pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: chos dang chos can gnyis bsgrub par bya ba yin pa de'i tshe /
translated: In that case, both the property and the basis of the property would be the probandum.

original: gtan tshigs dang / dpe'i mtshan nyid ma grub pa yin no //🔽de ltar na chos kyis khyad par can du byas pa'i chos can gyi skye ba dang ldan pa nyid la sogs pa'i sgo gnas dpe la chos mthun pa yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: gtan tshigs dang / dpe'i mtshan nyid ma grub pa yin no // de ltar na chos kyis khyad par can du byas pa'i chos can gyi skye ba dang ldan pa nyid la sogs pa'i sgo gnas dpe la chos mthun pa yod pa ma yin no //
translated: The reason and the example are not established.🔽Thus, the subject, qualified by the property, does not have the property of origination, etc., and the example does not have the property in common.

original: de lta bu'i rnam pa can gyi chos can la gzhan gyi gtan tshigs ma grub pa yin pas na gtan tshigs kyi mtshan nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: de lta bu'i rnam pa can gyi chos can la gzhan gyi gtan tshigs ma grub pa yin pas na gtan tshigs kyi mtshan nyid ma yin no //
translated: Since the reason is not established in regard to the subject that has such a nature, it is not a characteristic of the reason.

original: mi rtag pas khyad par du byas pa'i chos can dpe la chos mthun pa yod pa ma yin pas na dpe'i mtshan nyid ma yin no /
analyzed: mi rtag pas khyad par du byas pa'i chos can dpe la chos mthun pa yod pa ma yin pas na dpe'i mtshan nyid ma yin no /
translated: Since the example does not have the property in common with the subject qualified by impermanence, it is not a characteristic of the example.

original: // / tshad ma rnam 'grel gyi 'grel pa /
analyzed: // / tshad ma rnam 'grel gyi 'grel pa /
translated: Commentary on Valid Knowledge

original: bam po sum cu rtsa dgu pa /
analyzed: bam po sum cu rtsa dgu pa /
translated: Chapter 39

original: ci ste 'di ltar skye ba dang ldan pa nyid la sogs pa'i chos nyid la /
analyzed: ci ste 'di ltar skye ba dang ldan pa nyid la sogs pa'i chos nyid la /
translated: If it is said, “In regard to the nature of the property, such as origination,

original: bsgrub bya'i sgra ni med pa'i phyir //
analyzed: bsgrub bya'i sgra ni med pa'i phyir //
translated: since the term of the probandum does not exist,

original: gal te chos can 'jug can 'dod //
analyzed: gal te chos can 'jug can 'dod //
translated: if the subject is asserted to be engaged,

original: ji ltar kho bo cag gis bsgrub par bya ba'i phyogs gcig nyid yin pa'i phyir nye bar btags nas phyogs gcig la 'jug pa can bsgrub par bya ba'i sgras bshad pa yin no //
analyzed: ji ltar kho bo cag gis bsgrub par bya ba'i phyogs gcig nyid yin pa'i phyir nye bar btags nas phyogs gcig la 'jug pa can bsgrub par bya ba'i sgras bshad pa yin no //
translated: Just as we do, he also imputes the term “one part” to the subject, and then explains that the term “one part” is the object of the verb “to be.”

original: de'i tshe bstan bcos kyis chog pa yin na /
analyzed: de'i tshe bstan bcos kyis chog pa yin na /
translated: If that is the case, then the treatise is sufficient.

original: de'i tshe mtshan nyid kyi tshig gis ci zhig bya /🔽bdag nyid ci rigs par rtogs shing shes nas /
analyzed: de'i tshe mtshan nyid kyi tshig gis ci zhig bya / bdag nyid ci rigs par rtogs shing shes nas /
translated: What is the use of the definition?

original: 'jig rten nyid ni 'jug par 'gyur /
analyzed: 'jig rten nyid ni 'jug par 'gyur /
translated: The treatise is sufficient for those who understand and know the subject matter.🔽The treatise is sufficient for those who understand and know the subject matter.

original: kho bos ni phyogs kyi phyogs gcig tu rung ba'i chos can gyi chos nyid yongs su bzung ba'i phyir mtshan nyid kyi tshig smos pa yin pa de ltar rigs pa yin gyi /
analyzed: kho bos ni phyogs kyi phyogs gcig tu rung ba'i chos can gyi chos nyid yongs su bzung ba'i phyir mtshan nyid kyi tshig smos pa yin pa de ltar rigs pa yin gyi /
translated: We state the definition because we accept the subject as a suitable subject for the one part of the position.

original: @302b gzhan gyis ni ma yin no //
analyzed: @302b gzhan gyis ni ma yin no //
translated: It is reasonable that it is not suitable for others.

original: de bas na ci tsam pa'i tshig gis de brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: de bas na ci tsam pa'i tshig gis de brjod par bya'o //
translated: Therefore, the definition should be stated in as few words as possible.

original: gzhan yang bsgrub par bya ba ston nyid dam bca' ba nyid yin no zhes sngar nges par gzung ba'am /
analyzed: gzhan yang bsgrub par bya ba ston nyid dam bca' ba nyid yin no zhes sngar nges par gzung ba'am /
translated: Moreover, the statement “The definition is the thesis itself” is a previous determination.

original: bsgrub par bya ba ston pa dam bca' ba nyid yin no zhes bya ba phyis nges par gzung ba yin par 'gyur grang na de la re zhig sngar nges par bzung ba ni grub pa ldog par ma grub pa yongs su bzung ba'i don ma yin no //
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba ston pa dam bca' ba nyid yin no zhes bya ba phyis nges par gzung ba yin par 'gyur grang na de la re zhig sngar nges par bzung ba ni grub pa ldog par ma grub pa yongs su bzung ba'i don ma yin no //
translated: If you say that the statement “The thesis is the statement of what is to be established” is a later clarification, then we reply: First of all, the clarification is not the meaning of the statement “The thesis is that which is to be established.”

original: 'di ltar de'i don la dam bcas pa'i don la bsgrub byar rtogs /
analyzed: 'di ltar de'i don la dam bcas pa'i don la bsgrub byar rtogs /
translated: The meaning of that statement is that the meaning of the thesis is taken to be that which is to be established.

original: de khong du chud pa nyid do //
analyzed: de khong du chud pa nyid do //
translated: That is understood in the following way.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /🔽sgrub byed bstan pa'i shugs nyid kyis gal te grub par 'gyur ba de'i tshe /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na / sgrub byed bstan pa'i shugs nyid kyis gal te grub par 'gyur ba de'i tshe /
translated: Why?

original: rtsod pa'i gnas ma yin pa'i phyir /🔽de sgrub pa'i phyir /
analyzed: rtsod pa'i gnas ma yin pa'i phyir / de sgrub pa'i phyir /
translated: If it were established by the power of the statement of the proof, then it would not be a topic of debate.

original: sgrub par byed pa brjod par mi 'gyur na /
analyzed: sgrub par byed pa brjod par mi 'gyur na /
translated: Therefore, the statement of the proof would not be made in order to establish it.

original: sgrub par byed pa brjod par yang 'gyur ba de ni ma grub pa nyid yin no zhes rtogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sgrub par byed pa brjod par yang 'gyur ba de ni ma grub pa nyid yin no zhes rtogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: But since the statement of the proof is made, it is understood that it is not established.

original: gzhan yang bsgrub par bya ba ston pa nyid dam bca' ba yin no zhes yongs su bzung ba na /
analyzed: gzhan yang bsgrub par bya ba ston pa nyid dam bca' ba yin no zhes yongs su bzung ba na /
translated: Moreover, if you maintain that the statement “The thesis is the statement of what is to be established” is a later clarification,

original: sgrub par byed pa'i tshig dam bca' ba yin no zhes bya bar ston par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sgrub par byed pa'i tshig dam bca' ba yin no zhes bya bar ston par 'gyur ro //
translated: The words that prove it are the thesis.

original: sgrub par byed pa'i tshig la yang dam bca' ba yod pa nyid ma yin pa de ltar na /🔽sgrub par byed pa ste /
analyzed: sgrub par byed pa'i tshig la yang dam bca' ba yod pa nyid ma yin pa de ltar na / sgrub par byed pa ste /
translated: And in the words that prove it, the thesis is not present.🔽Therefore,

original: sgrub bar byed pa'i tshig la dam bca' ba nyid du the tshom med do //
analyzed: sgrub bar byed pa'i tshig la dam bca' ba nyid du the tshom med do //
translated: there is no doubt that the words that prove it are the thesis.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: gtan tshigs sogs tshig gis yul 'di la khyab phyir ro //
analyzed: gtan tshigs sogs tshig gis yul 'di la khyab phyir ro //
translated: Because the words of the reason and so on pervade this object.

original: de bas na rgyu 'dis sngar nges gzung yin /
analyzed: de bas na rgyu 'dis sngar nges gzung yin /
translated: Therefore, by this reason, it is certain that🔽it is the thesis.

original: de yis ni /
analyzed: de yis ni /
translated: By that,

original: gtan tshigs la sogs pas don 'di 'phangs pa yin pa'i phyir dam bca'i mtshan nyid brjod don med /
analyzed: gtan tshigs la sogs pas don 'di 'phangs pa yin pa'i phyir dam bca'i mtshan nyid brjod don med /
translated: the words of the reason and so on imply this meaning, so it is pointless to state the definition of the thesis.

original: gang gis sngar nges pa gzung ba don med pa de'i phyir /
analyzed: gang gis sngar nges pa gzung ba don med pa de'i phyir /
translated: Since it is pointless to state what is certain beforehand,

original: rgyu'i phyir shugs las bsgrub par bya ba bstan pa dam bca' ba nyid yin no zhes bya ba phyis nges par gzung ba 'di la bsgrub par bya ba ston pa nyid yin no zhes bya bar bshad pa /🔽khyab pa'i 'bras can yin pa ste //
analyzed: rgyu'i phyir shugs las bsgrub par bya ba bstan pa dam bca' ba nyid yin no zhes bya ba phyis nges par gzung ba 'di la bsgrub par bya ba ston pa nyid yin no zhes bya bar bshad pa / khyab pa'i 'bras can yin pa ste //
translated: This is the explanation of the statement, “The thesis is the statement of the probandum.”🔽The thesis has a pervasion.

original: mi ldan pa rnam par gcod pa'i 'bras can yin pa de ltar na /
analyzed: mi ldan pa rnam par gcod pa'i 'bras can yin pa de ltar na /
translated: The thesis has the result of excluding the non-possession.

original: gtan tshigs dang dpe ma grub pa ston pa dam bca' ba nyid yin par thal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gtan tshigs dang dpe ma grub pa ston pa dam bca' ba nyid yin par thal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: If it were so, then it would follow that the thesis would be the statement of an unestablished reason and example.

original: dam bca' ba nyid yin na ngag gis 'gal ba ni dam bca' ba'i skyon yin te /
analyzed: dam bca' ba nyid yin na ngag gis 'gal ba ni dam bca' ba'i skyon yin te /
translated: When it is a thesis, the contradiction by the words is a fault of the thesis.

original: dper na sgra rtag pa yin te /
analyzed: dper na sgra rtag pa yin te /
translated: For example, “Sound is permanent.

original: thams cad mi rtag pa nyid yin @303a * //🔽pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba lta bu'o //
analyzed: thams cad mi rtag pa nyid yin @303a * // pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba lta bu'o //
translated: Because all are impermanent.”

original: de la 'dir sgra rtag pa yin no //
analyzed: de la 'dir sgra rtag pa yin no //
translated: In that case, here sound is permanent.

original: thams cad mi rtag pa nyid dang 'gal ba yin te /
analyzed: thams cad mi rtag pa nyid dang 'gal ba yin te /
translated: It is contradictory to all being impermanent.

original: thams cad mi rtag pa nyid yin na sgra thams cad kyi khongs su 'dus pa ba nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: thams cad mi rtag pa nyid yin na sgra thams cad kyi khongs su 'dus pa ba nyid kyi phyir /
translated: If all are impermanent, then sound is included in all and is impermanent.🔽

original: sgra rtag pa nyid 'gal ba yin no zhe na /
analyzed: sgra rtag pa nyid 'gal ba yin no zhe na /
translated: If all are impermanent, then permanence of sound is contradictory because it is included in all that is impermanent.

original: de la 'dir 'dod dang 'brel med 'gal ba yin par 'gyur te /
analyzed: de la 'dir 'dod dang 'brel med 'gal ba yin par 'gyur te /
translated: Here, the contradiction is not related to the thesis.

original: 'dod pa'i don dang 'brel pa med nyid yin na 'gal ba yin par 'gyur ro //🔽de yang phan mi 'dogs lhan cig mi gnas /
analyzed: 'dod pa'i don dang 'brel pa med nyid yin na 'gal ba yin par 'gyur ro // de yang phan mi 'dogs lhan cig mi gnas /
translated: If it is unrelated to the thesis, then it is contradictory.🔽It is not related to the thesis in two ways: it does not benefit and it does not coexist.

original: rnam pa gnyi ga dang 'dod pa 'brel pa med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rnam pa gnyi ga dang 'dod pa 'brel pa med par 'gyur ro //
translated: It is not related to the thesis in either of these two ways.

original: gtan tshigs bsgrub par bya ba la phan 'dogs pa mi byed pa de ltar na /🔽phan mi 'dogs pa'i phyir ram /
analyzed: gtan tshigs bsgrub par bya ba la phan 'dogs pa mi byed pa de ltar na / phan mi 'dogs pa'i phyir ram /
translated: The reason does not benefit the probandum.

original: lhan cig mi gnas pa'i phyir /
analyzed: lhan cig mi gnas pa'i phyir /
translated: If it does not benefit, then it is contradictory because it does not benefit or because it does not coexist.

original: de la re zhig 'dir phan 'dogs par byed pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de la re zhig 'dir phan 'dogs par byed pa ma yin te /
translated: Here, it does not benefit.

original: gal te gtan tshigs skyon dang ldan pa yin na bsgrub par bya ba'i don la gnod pa'i phyir dam bca' ba'i skyon du 'gyur ba de ltar rtags kyi skyon thams cad rtags kyi ma grub pa la sogs pa'i skyon thams cad dam bca'i skyon nyid 'gyur /
analyzed: gal te gtan tshigs skyon dang ldan pa yin na bsgrub par bya ba'i don la gnod pa'i phyir dam bca' ba'i skyon du 'gyur ba de ltar rtags kyi skyon thams cad rtags kyi ma grub pa la sogs pa'i skyon thams cad dam bca'i skyon nyid 'gyur /
translated: If the reason is faulty, then the thesis is faulty because it is undermined with respect to the meaning of the probandum. In that case, all faults of the reason, such as the reason not being established, are faults of the thesis.

original: de'i skyon dag gis dam bca' ba la gnod pa'i phyir ro //🔽phyogs skyon gzhan la ltos pa ni //
analyzed: de'i skyon dag gis dam bca' ba la gnod pa'i phyir ro // phyogs skyon gzhan la ltos pa ni //
translated: Because those faults undermine the thesis.🔽The thesis is not related to another faulty position.

original: yan lag phyi ma la ltos pa ni //🔽yan lag phyi ma la ltos pa //
analyzed: yan lag phyi ma la ltos pa ni // yan lag phyi ma la ltos pa //
translated: The thesis is not related to a later part.

original: ma yin zhes kyang sngar bstan zin to //
analyzed: ma yin zhes kyang sngar bstan zin to //
translated: It has already been explained earlier that it is not related to a later part.

original: de bas na dam bca' ba tsam dang rjes su 'brel pa tsam nyid dam bca' ba'i skyon yin no //
analyzed: de bas na dam bca' ba tsam dang rjes su 'brel pa tsam nyid dam bca' ba'i skyon yin no //
translated: Therefore, the thesis is faulty if it is merely a thesis or if it is merely related to the reason.

original: ci ste 'dod dang 'brel med can te /
analyzed: ci ste 'dod dang 'brel med can te /
translated: If it is unrelated to what is desired,

original: bsgrub par bya ba'i chos su 'dod pa dang / lhan cig byed pa ni de dang lhan cig gnas pa ma yin pa'i gtan tshigs yin pa de bas na /
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba'i chos su 'dod pa dang / lhan cig byed pa ni de dang lhan cig gnas pa ma yin pa'i gtan tshigs yin pa de bas na /
translated: then the thesis is a reason that is not co-present with what is desired, that is, the property to be proven. Therefore,

original: de la med pa'i phyir 'gal ba yin no zhe na /
analyzed: de la med pa'i phyir 'gal ba yin no zhe na /
translated: Because it does not exist there, it is contradictory.

original: de yang rigs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de yang rigs pa ma yin te /
translated: That is also unreasonable.🔽Because:

original: 'di ltar / 'dod dang med can ma grub yin //
analyzed: 'di ltar / 'dod dang med can ma grub yin //
translated: The desire and the non-existence are not established.

original: gtan tshigs kyi skyon yin gyi /
analyzed: gtan tshigs kyi skyon yin gyi /
translated: The fault is in the reason,

original: 'di phyogs kyi skyon nyid yin par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'di phyogs kyi skyon nyid yin par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: but it is not a fault of the position.

original: thams cad mi rtag pa nyid kyi gtan tshigs kyis sgra la rtag pa nyid bsal ba ma yin na /
analyzed: thams cad mi rtag pa nyid kyi gtan tshigs kyis sgra la rtag pa nyid bsal ba ma yin na /
translated: If the reason of impermanence of all does not remove permanence from sound,

original: gang gis na dam bca' ba'i don la 'gal bar 'gyur /
analyzed: gang gis na dam bca' ba'i don la 'gal bar 'gyur /
translated: then how could there be a contradiction in the meaning of the thesis?

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: 'di ltar gal te mi rtag pa nyid kyi gtan tshigs kyis sgra gtan tshigs dang bcas par 'gyur ba de bas na /
analyzed: 'di ltar gal te mi rtag pa nyid kyi gtan tshigs kyis sgra gtan tshigs dang bcas par 'gyur ba de bas na /
translated: Because if the reason of impermanence makes sound a reason,

original: mi rtag gtan tshigs bcas yin na /
analyzed: mi rtag gtan tshigs bcas yin na /
translated: then because it is impermanent and a reason,

original: bsgrub par bya ba'i chos de yang de ltar bsal bar 'gyur zhing thams cad mi rtag pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes sgra la de skad bstan par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba'i chos de yang de ltar bsal bar 'gyur zhing thams cad mi rtag pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes sgra la de skad bstan par 'gyur ro //
translated: the property to be established would also be removed, because all is impermanent. Thus it would be taught that sound is like that.

original: 'di ltar thams @303b cad mi rtag pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes bya ba 'di la dpe bshad pa nyid las /
analyzed: 'di ltar thams @303b cad mi rtag pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes bya ba 'di la dpe bshad pa nyid las /
translated: In this regard, the example is taught in the very explanation:

original: don mthong gzhan ci zhig yod de /
analyzed: don mthong gzhan ci zhig yod de /
translated: What other meaning is seen?

original: cung zad kyang yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: cung zad kyang yod pa ma yin no //
translated: None at all.

original: de bas na de ni chos mi mthun pa nyid kyi dpe ston pa nyid yin par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: de bas na de ni chos mi mthun pa nyid kyi dpe ston pa nyid yin par rig par bya'o //
translated: Therefore, this should be understood as the teaching of an example that is dissimilar.

original: de ltar na khyad par te sgra nyid la'o //
analyzed: de ltar na khyad par te sgra nyid la'o //
translated: Thus, the qualifier, i.e., sound, is different.

original: tha dad de /
analyzed: tha dad de /
translated: It is different.

original: 'gal ba'i chos rtag pa nyid bshad pa yis thams cad mi rtag pa nyid kyi phyir ngo zhes spyi ni rjes su 'jug yin na /
analyzed: 'gal ba'i chos rtag pa nyid bshad pa yis thams cad mi rtag pa nyid kyi phyir ngo zhes spyi ni rjes su 'jug yin na /
translated: By explaining the contradictory property, i.e., permanence, the universal is included in everything that is impermanent.

original: de la khyad par sgra zhes bya ba'i khyad par des mi rtag pa nyid thob pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de la khyad par sgra zhes bya ba'i khyad par des mi rtag pa nyid thob pa ma yin no //
translated: But impermanence is not obtained by that qualifier, i.e., sound.

original: 'di ltar khyad par skabs su byas nas phyis spyi bsgrub khyad par de la brten pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: 'di ltar khyad par skabs su byas nas phyis spyi bsgrub khyad par de la brten pa ma yin gyi /
translated: In this way, having made the qualifier the topic, later the universal is not established as dependent on that qualifier.

original: 'on kyang skabs su bab pa'i khyad par gyi yul spangs nas gzhan thams cad la 'jug par 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'on kyang skabs su bab pa'i khyad par gyi yul spangs nas gzhan thams cad la 'jug par 'gyur te /
translated: Rather, having abandoned the object of the qualifier that is the topic, it engages all others.

original: dper na bram ze kun de'i bu la dar ba byin cig ces byas nas /
analyzed: dper na bram ze kun de'i bu la dar ba byin cig ces byas nas /
translated: For example, when someone says to a Brahmin, “Give milk to Kun-dhe’s son,”

original: bram ze dag la zho byin cig ces smras pas /
analyzed: bram ze dag la zho byin cig ces smras pas /
translated: and he replies, “Give curd to the Brahmins,”

original: kun di'i bu la zho byin pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: kun di'i bu la zho byin pa ma yin gyi /
translated: he does not give curd to Kun-dhe’s son,

original: 'on kyang de las bzlog pa'i bram ze gzhan dag la yin pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: 'on kyang de las bzlog pa'i bram ze gzhan dag la yin pa lta bu'o //
translated: but rather to other Brahmins.

original: de ltar sgra rtag pa nyid yin pa brjod nas thams cad la rtag pa nyid yin par smra ba na sgra las bzlog pa gzhan thams cad la brten pa yin no //
analyzed: de ltar sgra rtag pa nyid yin pa brjod nas thams cad la rtag pa nyid yin par smra ba na sgra las bzlog pa gzhan thams cad la brten pa yin no //
translated: In the same way, having stated that sound is permanent, when one says that everything is permanent, one is referring to everything other than sound.

original: de bas na sgra la mi rtag pa nyid kyi phyir yod pa ma yin na /
analyzed: de bas na sgra la mi rtag pa nyid kyi phyir yod pa ma yin na /
translated: Therefore, if sound does not exist because it is impermanent,

original: ji ltar na rang dang 'gal ba sel bar 'gyur /
analyzed: ji ltar na rang dang 'gal ba sel bar 'gyur /
translated: how can it be the counter-correlate of itself?

original: gal te sgra las bzlog pa thams cad mi rtag pa nyid yin par 'gyur ba de'i tshe /🔽spyi yis ni /
analyzed: gal te sgra las bzlog pa thams cad mi rtag pa nyid yin par 'gyur ba de'i tshe / spyi yis ni /
translated: If everything other than sound were impermanent,

original: rjes su 'jug pa'i 'bras bu ci //
analyzed: rjes su 'jug pa'i 'bras bu ci //
translated: then what would be the result of the universal?

original: dper na thams cad mi rtag pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes bya ba lta bu'o //
analyzed: dper na thams cad mi rtag pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes bya ba lta bu'o //
translated: For example, “because everything is impermanent.”

original: de ltar na sgra mi rtag pa nyid kyi phyir zhes bya ba nyid brjod par bya bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar na sgra mi rtag pa nyid kyi phyir zhes bya ba nyid brjod par bya bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Thus, it would be stated, “Because sound is impermanent.”

original: de bas na sgra la mi rtag pa nyid med pa yin pa de bas na /
analyzed: de bas na sgra la mi rtag pa nyid med pa yin pa de bas na /
translated: Therefore, since sound does not have impermanence,

original: de la rtag pa nyid sel bar byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de la rtag pa nyid sel bar byed pa ma yin no //
translated: it does not eliminate permanence.

original: yod pa yin na sel bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: yod pa yin na sel bar 'gyur ro //
translated: If it exists, it would eliminate.

original: de'i phyir slob dpon gyis /
analyzed: de'i phyir slob dpon gyis /
translated: Therefore, the master [Dignāga] said,

original: sgra'i mi rtag pas bsal par 'gyur ba yin zhes gsungs /🔽thams cad mi rtag pa nyid kyi phyir zhes bya ba 'dis ni de chos mi mthun pa nyid kyi dpe bshad pa yin par gnas pa yin te /
analyzed: sgra'i mi rtag pas bsal par 'gyur ba yin zhes gsungs / thams cad mi rtag pa nyid kyi phyir zhes bya ba 'dis ni de chos mi mthun pa nyid kyi dpe bshad pa yin par gnas pa yin te /
translated: “It is eliminated by the impermanence of sound.”

original: de'i mtshan nyid kyi rjes su byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i mtshan nyid kyi rjes su byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This statement, “Because all is impermanent,” explains the example of the dissimilar class, because it conforms to its definition.

original: gtan tshigs kyang nye bar sbyar ba las yin pa de ltar na /
analyzed: gtan tshigs kyang nye bar sbyar ba las yin pa de ltar na /
translated: The reason is applied from that. Thus,

original: dper na thams cad ni mi rtag pa yin la /
analyzed: dper na thams cad ni mi rtag pa yin la /
translated: for example, “Because all is impermanent,

original: sgra yang thams cad ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir te /
analyzed: sgra yang thams cad ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir te /
translated: sound is not all,

original: rtag pa yin te /
analyzed: rtag pa yin te /
translated: it is permanent.”

original: thams cad mi rtag pa yin pa nyid ni gtan tshigs yin no //
analyzed: thams cad mi rtag pa yin pa nyid ni gtan tshigs yin no //
translated: The reason is that everything is impermanent.

original: de yang ma grub pa yin te /
analyzed: de yang ma grub pa yin te /
translated: But that is not established.

original: 'di ltar thams @304a * //
analyzed: 'di ltar thams @304a * //
translated: In this regard,

original: cad kyi sgra 'jig rten la grags pa yin nam /
analyzed: cad kyi sgra 'jig rten la grags pa yin nam /
translated: is the word everything well known in the world?

original: 'ga' zhig la grags pa yin par 'gyur grang na /
analyzed: 'ga' zhig la grags pa yin par 'gyur grang na /
translated: Or is it well known to some?

original: gal te 'jig rten la grags pa yin pa de'i tshe /🔽ma lus pa 'phangs pas 'jug pa yin pa de bas na sgra yang 'phangs pas 'jug pa yin pa de bas na sgra yang 'phangs pa yin pa de ltar na /🔽sgra de dag gi nang du 'dus pa yin te /
analyzed: gal te 'jig rten la grags pa yin pa de'i tshe / ma lus pa 'phangs pas 'jug pa yin pa de bas na sgra yang 'phangs pas 'jug pa yin pa de bas na sgra yang 'phangs pa yin pa de ltar na / sgra de dag gi nang du 'dus pa yin te /
translated: If it is well known in the world,🔽then since everything is included in that, the word everything is also included.

original: thams cad kyi khongs su 'dus pa nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: thams cad kyi khongs su 'dus pa nyid kyi phyir /
translated: Therefore, since everything is included in that,

original: thams cad ma yin pa nyid du ma grub pa yin no //
analyzed: thams cad ma yin pa nyid du ma grub pa yin no //
translated: it is not established that everything is not included.

original: ci ste 'ga' zhig la grags pa yin na sgra ma yin pa gang yin pa de dag ni thams cad kyi sgras brjod par bya ba yin zhing /
analyzed: ci ste 'ga' zhig la grags pa yin na sgra ma yin pa gang yin pa de dag ni thams cad kyi sgras brjod par bya ba yin zhing /
translated: But if it is well known to some, then that which is not a sound is included in everything,

original: sgra gcig pu thams cad ma yin pa de ltar na /
analyzed: sgra gcig pu thams cad ma yin pa de ltar na /
translated: and since a single sound is not everything,🔽then it is not established that everything is not included.

original: sgra dang thams cad ma yin pa zhes bya ba de dag rnam grangs kyi sgra nyid yin no //
analyzed: sgra dang thams cad ma yin pa zhes bya ba de dag rnam grangs kyi sgra nyid yin no //
translated: The terms “sound” and “not all” are merely synonyms.

original: de ltar na dper na sgra ni rtag pa yin te /
analyzed: de ltar na dper na sgra ni rtag pa yin te /
translated: For example, the statement “Sound is permanent🔽because of being sound” is an unestablished reason that is a part of the meaning of the thesis.

original: sgra nyid yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba dam bca' ba'i don gyi phyogs gcig gtan tshigs ma grub pa yin pa de ltar na 'di yang ma grub pa yin no zhes bya bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sgra nyid yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba dam bca' ba'i don gyi phyogs gcig gtan tshigs ma grub pa yin pa de ltar na 'di yang ma grub pa yin no zhes bya bar 'gyur ro //
translated: In the same way, this is an unestablished reason.

original: thams cad kyi khongs su 'dus pa nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: thams cad kyi khongs su 'dus pa nyid kyi phyir /
translated: Because it is included in all,

original: thams cad ma yin pa nyid yod pa ma yin no zhes bshad pa na /
analyzed: thams cad ma yin pa nyid yod pa ma yin no zhes bshad pa na /
translated: it is not the case that it is not all.

original: gzhan dag na re phyogs gcig nyid yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: gzhan dag na re phyogs gcig nyid yin pa'i phyir /
translated: Others say that because it is a part of all,

original: sgra ji ltar thams cad ma yin pa nyid yin no zhes smra'o //
analyzed: sgra ji ltar thams cad ma yin pa nyid yin no zhes smra'o //
translated: sound is not all.

original: de dang de ni bden pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de dang de ni bden pa ma yin te /
translated: That is not true.

original: gal te thams cad kyi phyogs gcig nyid yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: gal te thams cad kyi phyogs gcig nyid yin pa'i phyir /
translated: If it is a part of all,

original: sgra thams cad ma yin pa de'i tshe dngos po sgra'i bdag nyid can ma yin pa dag kyang so sor re re la phyogs gcig nyid yod pa ma yin pa de ltar na /
analyzed: sgra thams cad ma yin pa de'i tshe dngos po sgra'i bdag nyid can ma yin pa dag kyang so sor re re la phyogs gcig nyid yod pa ma yin pa de ltar na /
translated: When all sounds are not, then even things that are not of the nature of sound do not have a part in each individual thing.

original: de dag la yang thams cad ma yin pa nyid yod pa'i phyir 'ga' zhig thams cad yin par mi 'gyur na /
analyzed: de dag la yang thams cad ma yin pa nyid yod pa'i phyir 'ga' zhig thams cad yin par mi 'gyur na /
translated: Thus, since they also have the quality of not being all, nothing is all.

original: de ltar yang ni 'dod do //🔽lan 'di yul gzhan la ni zhes bya ba la sogs pas gzhung 'dzugs par byed do //
analyzed: de ltar yang ni 'dod do // lan 'di yul gzhan la ni zhes bya ba la sogs pas gzhung 'dzugs par byed do //
translated: But this is not accepted.

original: yul gzhan la ni 'gal smra bas sgra ni gzhan nyid yin par smra /
analyzed: yul gzhan la ni 'gal smra bas sgra ni gzhan nyid yin par smra /
translated: The author of the treatise sets forth the response to this in the lines beginning “The opponent says that sound is different from the other objects.”🔽The opponent says that sound is different from the other objects.

original: sgra la thams cad nyid la 'gal ba thams cad ma yin pa nyid kyi chos smra ba na sgra de mnyan pa thams cad las /
analyzed: sgra la thams cad nyid la 'gal ba thams cad ma yin pa nyid kyi chos smra ba na sgra de mnyan pa thams cad las /
translated: When he says that sound has the quality of not being all, which is contradictory to being all, he says that sound is different from all that is heard.

original: gzhan nyid yin par smra'o //
analyzed: gzhan nyid yin par smra'o //
translated: Thus, he says that it is different.

original: de ltar na gang zhig gang dang 'gal ba'i chos can la smra ba des de las tha dad pa nyid yin pa brjod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar na gang zhig gang dang 'gal ba'i chos can la smra ba des de las tha dad pa nyid yin pa brjod par 'gyur ro //
translated: Thus, whoever says that a subject has a quality that is contradictory to another quality, he says that it is different from that.

original: de yang ste sgra thams cad las tha dad par yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de yang ste sgra thams cad las tha dad par yod pa ma yin no //
translated: And that is not different from all sounds.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: spyi ni khyad par mi spong @304b phyir //
analyzed: spyi ni khyad par mi spong @304b phyir //
translated: Because the universal does not abandon the particular.

original: spyi'i sgra ni rang gi khyad par 'dor ba ma yin gyi /
analyzed: spyi'i sgra ni rang gi khyad par 'dor ba ma yin gyi /
translated: The word “universal” does not abandon its own particular.

original: 'on kyang 'phel bas 'jug par 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'on kyang 'phel bas 'jug par 'gyur te /
translated: But rather, it is applied by extension.

original: dper na shing gi sgra pa la sha la sogs pa'i khyad par mi spong ba lta bu'o //
analyzed: dper na shing gi sgra pa la sha la sogs pa'i khyad par mi spong ba lta bu'o //
translated: For example, the word “tree” does not abandon the particular, such as a palāśa tree.

original: de bas na thams cad kyi sgras kyang sgra yang 'phen par byed pa yin pa de ltar ni sgra thams cad nyid yin no //
analyzed: de bas na thams cad kyi sgras kyang sgra yang 'phen par byed pa yin pa de ltar ni sgra thams cad nyid yin no //
translated: Therefore, the word “all” also applies to sound.

original: de ltar ni 'gyur mod kyi /
analyzed: de ltar ni 'gyur mod kyi /
translated: That is so, but

original: spyi khyad par 'dor ba nyid yin te /
analyzed: spyi khyad par 'dor ba nyid yin te /
translated: the universal does abandon the particular.

original: dper na ci shing sha pa shing yin nam 'on te ma yin zhes dris pa na /
analyzed: dper na ci shing sha pa shing yin nam 'on te ma yin zhes dris pa na /
translated: For example, if someone asks, “Is a palāśa tree a tree or not?”

original: shing sha pa nyid shing ma yin no zhes brjod pa lta bu'o /
analyzed: shing sha pa nyid shing ma yin no zhes brjod pa lta bu'o /
translated: one says, “A palāśa tree is not a tree.”

original: shing sha pa la shing bkag pa nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: shing sha pa la shing bkag pa nyid kyi phyir /
translated: Because a tree is negated in a palāśa tree,

original: 'dir spyis khyad par spangs pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: 'dir spyis khyad par spangs pa yin no zhe na /
translated: here the universal abandons the particular.

original: spangs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: spangs pa ma yin te /
translated: It is not that it is abandoned.

original: 'di ltar shing gi spyi de rnam pa 'dis shing sha pa la gsal ba gcig la nges pa de bzlog pa yin gyi /
analyzed: 'di ltar shing gi spyi de rnam pa 'dis shing sha pa la gsal ba gcig la nges pa de bzlog pa yin gyi /
translated: Thus, the universal of tree is ascertained in one instance of a particular tree, such as a śimśapā tree. That ascertainment is refuted.

original: de shing nyid kyis spangs pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de shing nyid kyis spangs pa ni ma yin no //
translated: But it is not that it is abandoned by the universal tree.

original: 'di ltar / dper na gnas skabs la lar ni //🔽shing sha pa nyid shing min zhes spyi gcig la nges pa 'gog pa yin pa de ltar na sgra kun /
analyzed: 'di ltar / dper na gnas skabs la lar ni // shing sha pa nyid shing min zhes spyi gcig la nges pa 'gog pa yin pa de ltar na sgra kun /
translated: For example, at some point🔽in time, a śimśapā tree is not a tree. In that way, the universal is refuted in one instance. In that case, the application of all words

original: sgra gcig nyid la 'jug pa 'gog par 'gyur pa'i phyir 'di 'dra ba 'di ni sgra thams cad gcig la 'jug pa ni 'gog par 'gyur ba yin gyi /
analyzed: sgra gcig nyid la 'jug pa 'gog par 'gyur pa'i phyir 'di 'dra ba 'di ni sgra thams cad gcig la 'jug pa ni 'gog par 'gyur ba yin gyi /
translated: to one word would be refuted. Therefore, this refutes the application of all words to one.

original: sgra la 'jug pa bzlog pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: sgra la 'jug pa bzlog pa ni ma yin no //
translated: But it does not refute the application of words to objects.

original: 'di tsam nyid kyis sgra thams cad sgra gcig la 'jug pa la 'gog pa tsam gyis de sgra ni kun min ma yin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'di tsam nyid kyis sgra thams cad sgra gcig la 'jug pa la 'gog pa tsam gyis de sgra ni kun min ma yin par 'gyur ro //
translated: By merely refuting the application of all words to one word, it would not be the case that that word is not all words.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /🔽sgra'i ngo bo ma yin pa'i khyad par kun so so de nyid min la /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na / sgra'i ngo bo ma yin pa'i khyad par kun so so de nyid min la /
translated: Why is that?🔽All the differences that are not the nature of a word are not that itself.

original: thams cad nyid med pa yin no //
analyzed: thams cad nyid med pa yin no //
translated: And all of them do not exist.

original: de med phyir te thams cad nyid med pa'i phyir 'ga' zhig kyang thams cad nyid du mi 'gyur ba na 'dod pa yang yin pa de'i phyir /
analyzed: de med phyir te thams cad nyid med pa'i phyir 'ga' zhig kyang thams cad nyid du mi 'gyur ba na 'dod pa yang yin pa de'i phyir /
translated: Because that does not exist, because all do not exist, then nothing at all would be all.

original: sgra thams cad kyi khongs su 'du ba yin pas na /
analyzed: sgra thams cad kyi khongs su 'du ba yin pas na /
translated: Since all sounds are included in that,

original: de la thams cad ma yin pa nyid ma grub pa yin no //
analyzed: de la thams cad ma yin pa nyid ma grub pa yin no //
translated: it is not established that it is not all.

original: de ltar ni 'gyur mod kyi /
analyzed: de ltar ni 'gyur mod kyi /
translated: This is true, but

original: gal te 'jig rten la grags pa'i thams cad nyid yin par 'gyur na ni /
analyzed: gal te 'jig rten la grags pa'i thams cad nyid yin par 'gyur na ni /
translated: if it were all that is renowned in the world,

original: thams cad kyi khongs su 'dus pa nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: thams cad kyi khongs su 'dus pa nyid kyi phyir /
translated: then because it would include all,

original: de thams cad nyid ma yin pa ma grub par 'gyur na /
analyzed: de thams cad nyid ma yin pa ma grub par 'gyur na /
translated: it would not be established that it is not all.

original: gang gi tshe gang zhig la grags pa'i thams cad nyid yin pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: gang gi tshe gang zhig la grags pa'i thams cad nyid yin pa de'i tshe /
translated: But when it is all that is renowned in a specific context,

original: 'di rnam grangs nyid yin na /
analyzed: 'di rnam grangs nyid yin na /
translated: then it is a mere enumeration.

original: sgra la sgra nyid yod pa ma yin pa de ltar na ji ltar ma grub pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: sgra la sgra nyid yod pa ma yin pa de ltar na ji ltar ma grub pa yin zhe na /
translated: If sound does not exist in sound, then how is it not established?

original: bshad pa ma grub pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: bshad pa ma grub pa nyid yin no //
translated: We reply: It is not established.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why?

original: shes bya shes byed tha dad phyir //
analyzed: shes bya shes byed tha dad phyir //
translated: Because the object of knowledge and the consciousness are different.

original: bsgrub par bya ba yang gzhan yin zhing @305a * //
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba yang gzhan yin zhing @305a * //
translated: The probandum is different,

original: sgrub par byed pa gzhan yin no //
analyzed: sgrub par byed pa gzhan yin no //
translated: and the proof is different.

original: sgra bsgrub par bya ba'i chos can de yang rang gi sgrub par byed pa la shes par byed pa nyid du ma grub pa yin te /
analyzed: sgra bsgrub par bya ba'i chos can de yang rang gi sgrub par byed pa la shes par byed pa nyid du ma grub pa yin te /
translated: Moreover, that sound which is the subject to be proven is not established as the revealer in regard to its own proof.

original: shes par bya ba nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: shes par bya ba nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is the object to be revealed.

original: des na chos can shes par byed par ma grub pa yin no //
analyzed: des na chos can shes par byed par ma grub pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, the subject is not established as the revealer.

original: ci 'dra bar gyur pa ma grub ce na /
analyzed: ci 'dra bar gyur pa ma grub ce na /
translated: In what way is it not established?

original: gtan tshigs ldan pa de /
analyzed: gtan tshigs ldan pa de /
translated: The subject that possesses the reason🔽is not established as the reason.

original: gtan tshigs nyid du brjod pas zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: gtan tshigs nyid du brjod pas zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: This is the meaning of the statement.

original: de ltar na /
analyzed: de ltar na /
translated: In that case,

original: gtan tshigs ldan pa'i chos can ni //
analyzed: gtan tshigs ldan pa'i chos can ni //
translated: the subject that possesses the reason

original: shes byed ma grub phyir /
analyzed: shes byed ma grub phyir /
translated: is not established as the revealer.

original: sgra bsgrub par bya ba'i chos can rang nyid sgrub byed la te /
analyzed: sgra bsgrub par bya ba'i chos can rang nyid sgrub byed la te /
translated: The subject to be proven, sound, is not itself the proof.

original: bdag nyid bsgrub par bya ba'i phyir brjod pa sgrub par byed pa ma yin pa de ltar na grub min te /
analyzed: bdag nyid bsgrub par bya ba'i phyir brjod pa sgrub par byed pa ma yin pa de ltar na grub min te /
translated: Because it is itself the probandum, it is not expressed as the proof. In that case, it is not established.

original: sgra'i ngo bo nyid du grub tu zin kyang /
analyzed: sgra'i ngo bo nyid du grub tu zin kyang /
translated: Even though the nature of sound is established,

original: bdag nyid la gtan tshigs kyi ngo bor ma grub pa yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshigs go //
analyzed: bdag nyid la gtan tshigs kyi ngo bor ma grub pa yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshigs go //
translated: The reason is not established in the nature of the self.

original: gal te dngos po thams cad la //
analyzed: gal te dngos po thams cad la //
translated: If all things

original: chos dang chos can 'byed mi 'grub pa'i rgyu'i phyir /
analyzed: chos dang chos can 'byed mi 'grub pa'i rgyu'i phyir /
translated: are not established as the distinction of property and property possessor,

original: thams cad la dam bca' ba'i don gyi phyogs gcig la yod pa can gyi ma grub pa nyid kyi skyon mtshungs par 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: thams cad la dam bca' ba'i don gyi phyogs gcig la yod pa can gyi ma grub pa nyid kyi skyon mtshungs par 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: then the fault of non-establishment would equally apply to the existence of one part of the meaning of the thesis in all.

original: skyon de yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: skyon de yod pa ma yin no //
translated: That fault does not exist.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is it so?

original: 'dir ldog pas khyad yod phyir ro //
analyzed: 'dir ldog pas khyad yod phyir ro //
translated: Because here there is a difference in terms of negation.

original: 'di ji ltar ldog pas byas pa'i tha dad pa la brten nas bsgrub par bya ba dang sgrub par byed pa dag gi bye brag yod pa yin no zhes bstan to //
analyzed: 'di ji ltar ldog pas byas pa'i tha dad pa la brten nas bsgrub par bya ba dang sgrub par byed pa dag gi bye brag yod pa yin no zhes bstan to //
translated: This shows that the distinction of the probandum and the proof is based on the difference made by negation.

original: ji ltar thams cad las ldog pa'i dngos po gcig gang dang gang las tha dad pa de dang de la ltos nas chos su rnam par gzhag par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ji ltar thams cad las ldog pa'i dngos po gcig gang dang gang las tha dad pa de dang de la ltos nas chos su rnam par gzhag par 'gyur ro //
translated: Just as one thing that is distinguished from all is posited as a property in dependence on each of those,

original: 'on kyang / don dam par ni dpyad par bya ste /
analyzed: 'on kyang / don dam par ni dpyad par bya ste /
translated: but ultimately it is to be analyzed.

original: skabs su dngos por gyur pa'i chos gzhan grub pa ma yin te /
analyzed: skabs su dngos por gyur pa'i chos gzhan grub pa ma yin te /
translated: At times, other things that are entities are not established.

original: de lta bur gyur ma grub phyir //
analyzed: de lta bur gyur ma grub phyir //
translated: Because they are not established as such,

original: kun rdzob pa yi dngos rnams la //
analyzed: kun rdzob pa yi dngos rnams la //
translated: In regard to conventional entities,

original: de nyid gzhan nyid 'gog par 'gyur /
analyzed: de nyid gzhan nyid 'gog par 'gyur /
translated: Identity and difference are refuted.

original: de dag ni dngos po la rten pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de dag ni dngos po la rten pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because they are based on entities.

original: gal te de lta yin na ji ltar rjes su dpag par bya ba dang dpog par byed pa'i tha snyad rnam par gzhag pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: gal te de lta yin na ji ltar rjes su dpag par bya ba dang dpog par byed pa'i tha snyad rnam par gzhag pa yin zhe na /
translated: If that is so, how is the convention of the object to be inferred and the means of inference established?🔽It is said:

original: bshad pa / dpag bya dpog byed dag gi don //
analyzed: bshad pa / dpag bya dpog byed dag gi don //
translated: The meaning of the object to be inferred and the means of inference

original: tha snyad gnas pa 'di yin ni //
analyzed: tha snyad gnas pa 'di yin ni //
translated: Is the basis of conventional existence.

original: tha dad la brten nas rnam par brtags pa yin /
analyzed: tha dad la brten nas rnam par brtags pa yin /
translated: It is imagined in dependence on difference.

original: ldog pa la brten nas zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: ldog pa la brten nas zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: It is based on the exclusion, that is the meaning.

original: tha dad pa ci 'dra ba zhig ce na /
analyzed: tha dad pa ci 'dra ba zhig ce na /
translated: What kind of difference is it?

original: shes pa @305b la grub ste /
analyzed: shes pa @305b la grub ste /
translated: It is established in consciousness.

original: ldog pa la brten pa'i phyir /
analyzed: ldog pa la brten pa'i phyir /
translated: Because it is based on the exclusion,

original: shes pa la grub pa'i tha dad pa gang yin pa de la brten nas so //
analyzed: shes pa la grub pa'i tha dad pa gang yin pa de la brten nas so //
translated: It is based on the difference that is established in consciousness.

original: sgra zhes brjod pa dang byas pa nyid ces brjod pa na shes pa tha dad par 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: sgra zhes brjod pa dang byas pa nyid ces brjod pa na shes pa tha dad par 'gyur gyi /
translated: When one says “sound” and “produced,” the cognition is different.

original: dngos su tha dad pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: dngos su tha dad pa ni ma yin no //
translated: But there is no difference in the real thing.

original: de ltar na yang ldog pa la brten pa las de mthar phyin pa'i shes pa skye ba gang yin pa de chos dang chos can la tha dad pa bstan pa can du 'gyur ro //🔽bdag nyid tha dad mthar thug pa'i //
analyzed: de ltar na yang ldog pa la brten pa las de mthar phyin pa'i shes pa skye ba gang yin pa de chos dang chos can la tha dad pa bstan pa can du 'gyur ro // bdag nyid tha dad mthar thug pa'i //
translated: And yet, the cognition that arises from the difference based on the exclusion is the cognition that has the difference of the property and the property-possessor.🔽The cognition of the difference

original: shes de dag la tha dad par //
analyzed: shes de dag la tha dad par //
translated: of those two is based on the difference

original: chos dang chos can snang 'gyur ba //
analyzed: chos dang chos can snang 'gyur ba //
translated: of the appearance of the property and the property-possessor.

original: tha snyad de yi rten can yin /🔽ji ltar snang ba bzhin gyi chos can la brten nas bsgrub par bya ba dang sgrub par byed pa'i tha snyad yin gyi /
analyzed: tha snyad de yi rten can yin / ji ltar snang ba bzhin gyi chos can la brten nas bsgrub par bya ba dang sgrub par byed pa'i tha snyad yin gyi /
translated: The convention is based on that.

original: don dam par ni ma yin no //
analyzed: don dam par ni ma yin no //
translated: The convention of the probandum and the probans is based on the property-possessor as it appears, not ultimately.

original: don la mi slu ba ni 'brel pa las yin no zhes bshad zin to //
analyzed: don la mi slu ba ni 'brel pa las yin no zhes bshad zin to //
translated: It has been explained that non-deceptiveness with respect to the object is due to the connection.

original: 'dir ni ldog pas byas pa'i tha dad pa yang yod pa ma yin na /
analyzed: 'dir ni ldog pas byas pa'i tha dad pa yang yod pa ma yin na /
translated: Here, there is no difference made by exclusion.

original: gang gis ni dam bca' ba'i don gyi phyogs gcig nyid yin par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: gang gis ni dam bca' ba'i don gyi phyogs gcig nyid yin par mi 'gyur /
translated: How could it not be the case that the meaning of the thesis is just one part?

original: de ltar na 'dir ni tha snyad thob pa /🔽tha snyad kyi thob pa'i bsgrub par bya ba gang yin pa de nyid sgra ni rtag pa yin te /
analyzed: de ltar na 'dir ni tha snyad thob pa / tha snyad kyi thob pa'i bsgrub par bya ba gang yin pa de nyid sgra ni rtag pa yin te /
translated: Thus, here, the meaning of the thesis is the attainment of the conventional.🔽The object of attainment of the conventional is just what is to be proven.🔽Sound is permanent, and everything is impermanent.

original: thams cad mi rtag pa nyid yin no zhes bya ba 'dir bsgrub bya sgrub byed nyid thob pa yin no //
analyzed: thams cad mi rtag pa nyid yin no zhes bya ba 'dir bsgrub bya sgrub byed nyid thob pa yin no //
translated: Here, the object of attainment is the means of proving what is to be proven.

original: bsgrub par bya ba sgrub par byed pa nyid thob pa ci 'dra ba zhig ce na /
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba sgrub par byed pa nyid thob pa ci 'dra ba zhig ce na /
translated: What is the object of attainment of the means of proving what is to be proven?

original: tha dad blo ni 'dres med can /
analyzed: tha dad blo ni 'dres med can /
translated: The cognition of difference is not mixed.

original: gang sgra tha dad pa'i blo 'dres pa med ces bya bar tshig rnam par sbyar ro //
analyzed: gang sgra tha dad pa'i blo 'dres pa med ces bya bar tshig rnam par sbyar ro //
translated: The cognition of difference of sound is not mixed.

original: bsgrub par bya ba nyid thob pa'i rnam pa las tha dad pa'i ngo bor shes pa gzhan la 'jug pa med pa ni tha dad pa'i blo dang 'dres pa med pa can zhes bya ba'i don te /
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba nyid thob pa'i rnam pa las tha dad pa'i ngo bor shes pa gzhan la 'jug pa med pa ni tha dad pa'i blo dang 'dres pa med pa can zhes bya ba'i don te /
translated: The meaning of the statement is that the cognition of a different nature from the form of the object of attainment of what is to be proven does not occur in another.

original: so sor rnam par gcod pa med pa'i phyir ro ;
analyzed: so sor rnam par gcod pa med pa'i phyir ro ;
translated: This is because there is no individual determination.

original: / gang gi phyir shes pas grub pa'i yang tha dad pa med pa des ni ma grub pa ste /
analyzed: / gang gi phyir shes pas grub pa'i yang tha dad pa med pa des ni ma grub pa ste /
translated: Because of the non-difference of the established by the cognition, therefore it is not established.

original: sgra nyid yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i gtan tshigs 'di bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: sgra nyid yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i gtan tshigs 'di bstan pa yin no //
