translated: Because of the non-difference of the established and the non-established by the cognition, therefore, this reason, “because of being sound,” is taught.

original: de de ltar gnas pa las gzhan gyis dper na 'dus pa dag ni gzhan gyi don byed pa yin te /
analyzed: de de ltar gnas pa las gzhan gyis dper na 'dus pa dag ni gzhan gyi don byed pa yin te /
translated: And, in that case, it is seen that the reason is the same as the meaning of the proposition, as in the case of the syllogism, “The assembled elements perform the function of another,

original: 'dus pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ram /
analyzed: 'dus pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ram /
translated: because of being assembled,

original: 'dus byas pa ni mi rtag pa yin te /
analyzed: 'dus byas pa ni mi rtag pa yin te /
translated: or, the produced is impermanent,🔽because of being produced.”

original: 'dus byas nyid yin pa'i phyir ro zhes dam bcas pa'i don gyi phyogs gtan tshigs su mthong ba ma yin nam /
analyzed: 'dus byas nyid yin pa'i phyir ro zhes dam bcas pa'i don gyi phyogs gtan tshigs su mthong ba ma yin nam /
translated: But, in that case, the meaning of the proposition is not seen to be the reason.

original: de ltar ma nges pa'i don yin par sems so //
analyzed: de ltar ma nges pa'i don yin par sems so //
translated: Thus, it is thought that the meaning is not ascertained.

original: skyon de yod pa ma yin no //🔽'dus ma byas thams cad dam /
analyzed: skyon de yod pa ma yin no // 'dus ma byas thams cad dam /
translated: That fault does not exist.🔽All the unproduced,

original: 'dus byas thams cad @306a * //
analyzed: 'dus byas thams cad @306a * //
translated: or all the produced,

original: ni dam bca'i don ma yin no //
analyzed: ni dam bca'i don ma yin no //
translated: are not the meaning of the proposition.

original: 'on kyang khyad par bsgrub par bya ba yin zhing spyi gtan tshigs yin pa de na ldog pas byas pa'i tha dad pa las ji skad du bshad pa'i skyon dang rjes su 'brel pa ma yin no //
analyzed: 'on kyang khyad par bsgrub par bya ba yin zhing spyi gtan tshigs yin pa de na ldog pas byas pa'i tha dad pa las ji skad du bshad pa'i skyon dang rjes su 'brel pa ma yin no //
translated: However, in particular, the predicate is what is to be proven, and the general is the proof. Therefore, the fault explained above does not follow from the difference that is made by the distinction.

original: lan 'di'i khyad par spyi dag ces bya ba la sogs pas gzhung 'dzugs par byad do //
analyzed: lan 'di'i khyad par spyi dag ces bya ba la sogs pas gzhung 'dzugs par byad do //
translated: The reply to this is set forth by the passage beginning with “The difference and the general . . .”

original: shes pa tha dad pa med pa'i yul bsgrub par bya ba'i chos can sgrub par byed pa nyid du khas blangs pa'i dam bcas pa'i don gyi phyogs gcig nyid yin zhing /
analyzed: shes pa tha dad pa med pa'i yul bsgrub par bya ba'i chos can sgrub par byed pa nyid du khas blangs pa'i dam bcas pa'i don gyi phyogs gcig nyid yin zhing /
translated: The object of a non-different cognition is the one part of the meaning of the thesis that is accepted as the subject that is to be proven.

original: de yang 'di la yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de yang 'di la yod pa ma yin no //
translated: And that does not exist in this case.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: khyad par bsgrub par bya ba yin zhing spyi sgrub par byed pa yin pa de ltar na /
analyzed: khyad par bsgrub par bya ba yin zhing spyi sgrub par byed pa yin pa de ltar na /
translated: In that the predicate is what is to be proven and the general is the proof,

original: khyad par spyi dag ste gnyis po tha dad de /
analyzed: khyad par spyi dag ste gnyis po tha dad de /
translated: the difference and the general, that is, the two, are different.

original: ldog pas byas pa'i tha dad pa yod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ldog pas byas pa'i tha dad pa yod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because the difference that is made by the distinction exists.

original: de'i phyir khyad par spyi dag tha dad pa'i rtags can yin /
analyzed: de'i phyir khyad par spyi dag tha dad pa'i rtags can yin /
translated: Therefore, the difference and the general have the reason of difference.

original: ji ltar yin zhe na /🔽dper na / sgra ni rtsol byung mi rtag yin //
analyzed: ji ltar yin zhe na / dper na / sgra ni rtsol byung mi rtag yin //
translated: How is that?🔽For example, “Sound is impermanent because it is produced by effort.”

original: zhes bya ba khyad par bsgrub par bya ba la yin zhing /
analyzed: zhes bya ba khyad par bsgrub par bya ba la yin zhing /
translated: In this proof of a specific quality,

original: rtsol bas bslad pa'i phyir /
analyzed: rtsol bas bslad pa'i phyir /
translated: because of being produced by effort,

original: spyi'i chos gtan tshigs su gyur pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: spyi'i chos gtan tshigs su gyur pa'i phyir ro //
translated: the general quality becomes the reason.

original: de ltar brtsal ma thag tu byung ba'i sgra ni sgra yin pas bum pa la sogs pa sel bar byed kyi /
analyzed: de ltar brtsal ma thag tu byung ba'i sgra ni sgra yin pas bum pa la sogs pa sel bar byed kyi /
translated: Thus, the sound that arises immediately upon the effort is sound, and therefore excludes pots and so on.

original: brtsal ma thag tu byung ba'i sgra zhes bya ba ma yin te /
analyzed: brtsal ma thag tu byung ba'i sgra zhes bya ba ma yin te /
translated: It is not called “the sound that arises immediately upon the effort.”

original: ldog pas byas pa'i tha dad pa las bsgrub par bya ba dang / sgrub par byed pa tha dad pa yin no //
analyzed: ldog pas byas pa'i tha dad pa las bsgrub par bya ba dang / sgrub par byed pa tha dad pa yin no //
translated: The difference made by the exclusion is the difference between the probandum and the proof.🔽Also, it is not the case that “arising immediately upon the effort” is the specific property of the subject of the probandum, because

original: brtsal ma thag tu byung ba nyid bsgrub par bya ba'i chos can khyad par du byas pa nyid kyi phyir dam bcas pa'i don gyi phyogs gcig nyid yin no zhes smras pa gang yin pa de yang ma yin te /
analyzed: brtsal ma thag tu byung ba nyid bsgrub par bya ba'i chos can khyad par du byas pa nyid kyi phyir dam bcas pa'i don gyi phyogs gcig nyid yin no zhes smras pa gang yin pa de yang ma yin te /
translated: it is said that it is only one part of the meaning of the thesis.

original: 'di ltar phyogs yan lag na /
analyzed: 'di ltar phyogs yan lag na /
translated: In this way, the thesis is a part of the subject.

original: phyogs kyi chos kyi khyad par nyid na'ang brtsal ma thag tu byung ba nyid kyis gnod med phyir /
analyzed: phyogs kyi chos kyi khyad par nyid na'ang brtsal ma thag tu byung ba nyid kyis gnod med phyir /
translated: Even if there were a difference in the property of the subject, there would be no harm, because it would arise immediately upon investigation.

original: 'gal ba med pa'i phyir na /
analyzed: 'gal ba med pa'i phyir na /
translated: Because there is no contradiction,

original: chos can tha dad ma grub min //
analyzed: chos can tha dad ma grub min //
translated: the subject is not established as different.

original: bsgrub par bya ba'i chos can sgra las tha dad pa yin no //
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba'i chos can sgra las tha dad pa yin no //
translated: The subject to be established is different from sound.

original: ci dang 'dra bar zhe na /
analyzed: ci dang 'dra bar zhe na /
translated: What is it like?

original: dper na shes pa mi gsal ba yin na /
analyzed: dper na shes pa mi gsal ba yin na /
translated: For example, if consciousness is unclear,

original: gong bu mang po dag nye ba na /
analyzed: gong bu mang po dag nye ba na /
translated: when many objects are nearby,

original: ci rta yin nam ma yin zhes the tshom du gyur pa na /
analyzed: ci rta yin nam ma yin zhes the tshom du gyur pa na /
translated: one becomes doubtful, thinking, Is it a horse or not?

original: rva can nyid yin phyir /
analyzed: rva can nyid yin phyir /
translated: Because it has horns,

original: gong bu dva can de rta min //🔽zhes brjod pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: gong bu dva can de rta min // zhes brjod pa lta bu'o //
translated: that two-horned object is not a horse.

original: de la 'dir gong bu phyogs su byas pa ni dva can nyid ni bsgrub par bya ba'i nang du 'dus pa la ltos pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de la 'dir gong bu phyogs su byas pa ni dva can nyid ni bsgrub par bya ba'i nang du 'dus pa la ltos pa ma yin te /
translated: In that case, here the two-horned object is not included in the probandum, but it is not dependent on the property of the subject.

original: gal te gong bu rva can nyid kyis khyad par dang khyad par gyi gzhir 'gyur na yang @306b bsgrub par bya bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i nges pa med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gal te gong bu rva can nyid kyis khyad par dang khyad par gyi gzhir 'gyur na yang @306b bsgrub par bya bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i nges pa med par 'gyur ro //
translated: If the whole were to be the qualified and the parts the qualifiers, then there would be no certainty that the whole is the probandum.

original: de bas na 'dir bsgrub par bya ba dang / sgrub par byed pa tha dad pa'i phyir ma grub pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de bas na 'dir bsgrub par bya ba dang / sgrub par byed pa tha dad pa'i phyir ma grub pa ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, here, because the probandum and the proof are different, it is not the case that it is not established.

original: yang na bsgrub par bya ba'i dus na yan lag min /
analyzed: yang na bsgrub par bya ba'i dus na yan lag min /
translated: Or, at the time of the probandum, it is not a part.

original: bsgrub par bya ba'i dus nyid na brtsal ma thag tu byung ba nyid khyad par ma yin no //
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba'i dus nyid na brtsal ma thag tu byung ba nyid khyad par ma yin no //
translated: At the time of the probandum itself, the arising immediately after the effort is not the qualifier.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: de rtogs nas ni ldog phyir ro //
analyzed: de rtogs nas ni ldog phyir ro //
translated: Because it is reversed upon understanding it.

original: yi ge dang tshig dang ngag gi ngo bo can gyi sgra rtogs nas brtsal ma thag tu byung ba nyid ldog par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: yi ge dang tshig dang ngag gi ngo bo can gyi sgra rtogs nas brtsal ma thag tu byung ba nyid ldog par 'gyur ro //
translated: Upon understanding the sound that has the nature of letters, words, and speech, the arising immediately after the effort is reversed.

original: ldog pa de las rang gi ngo bor rtogs pa bsgrub par bya ba nyid thob pa ma yin pa de ltar na sgrub par byed pa'i dus na khyad par yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir ma grub pa yin no //
analyzed: ldog pa de las rang gi ngo bor rtogs pa bsgrub par bya ba nyid thob pa ma yin pa de ltar na sgrub par byed pa'i dus na khyad par yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir ma grub pa yin no //
translated: But it is not established that the nature of sound is established by the exclusion of that which is not sound, because there is no difference between the time of the proof and the time of the probandum.

original: sgra gcig la sgra nyid yod pa ma yin pa de ltar na /
analyzed: sgra gcig la sgra nyid yod pa ma yin pa de ltar na /
translated: Sound does not exist as sound itself.

original: 'dir mnyan par bya ba dang 'dra bar thun mong ma yin pa nyid du 'gyur bas na /
analyzed: 'dir mnyan par bya ba dang 'dra bar thun mong ma yin pa nyid du 'gyur bas na /
translated: In that case, it would be non-common, like what is to be heard.

original: dam bca' ba'i don gyi phyogs gcig ma yin no zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyi'o //🔽khyad par dam bca'i don du yang //
analyzed: dam bca' ba'i don gyi phyogs gcig ma yin no zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyi'o // khyad par dam bca'i don du yang //
translated: Therefore, the meaning of the thesis is not one-sided, as the opponent claims.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pas lan 'debs par byed do //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pas lan 'debs par byed do //
translated: The reply is given by the verse beginning with Even for the meaning of the qualification.

original: de ni rigs pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de ni rigs pa ma yin no //
translated: That is not correct.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why?

original: 'di ltar khyad par te mnyan par bya ba yang dam bca' pa'i don yin par mi rung ngo //
analyzed: 'di ltar khyad par te mnyan par bya ba yang dam bca' pa'i don yin par mi rung ngo //
translated: Because the qualification, what is to be heard, is not suitable as the meaning of the thesis.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why?

original: chos tha dad phyir ro //
analyzed: chos tha dad phyir ro //
translated: Because of the difference in properties.

original: de ltar na sgras sgra ma yin pa rnam par gcod cing /
analyzed: de ltar na sgras sgra ma yin pa rnam par gcod cing /
translated: Thus, sound excludes what is not sound,

original: mnyan par bya ba'i sgras kyang rna ba'i dbang po'i yul ma yin pa rnam par gcod pa de yin pa de ltar na /
analyzed: mnyan par bya ba'i sgras kyang rna ba'i dbang po'i yul ma yin pa rnam par gcod pa de yin pa de ltar na /
translated: The word “audible” also excludes that which is not an object of the auditory sense faculty.

original: sgra la mnyan par bya ba'i chos yod pa yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: sgra la mnyan par bya ba'i chos yod pa yin pa'i phyir /
translated: Thus, because the property of the subject, “audible,” exists in sound,

original: de thun mong ma yin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de thun mong ma yin par 'gyur ro //
translated: it is not common.

original: 'di ni sgra sgra'i gtan tshigs brjod pa can dang chos can brjod pa can rnam par gcod pa mtshungs pa yin pa de ltar na /
analyzed: 'di ni sgra sgra'i gtan tshigs brjod pa can dang chos can brjod pa can rnam par gcod pa mtshungs pa yin pa de ltar na /
translated: This is the same as the exclusion in the case of the reason “sound” and the subject “sound” that was stated earlier.

original: sgra la gzhan sgra nyid kyi chos 'di la yod pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: sgra la gzhan sgra nyid kyi chos 'di la yod pa ma yin gyi /
translated: Thus, this property of sound, “soundness,” does not exist in sound.

original: 'on kyang bsgrub par bya ba de nyid du sgrub par byed pa de gsum mi mthun phyogs la yang //
analyzed: 'on kyang bsgrub par bya ba de nyid du sgrub par byed pa de gsum mi mthun phyogs la yang //
translated: However, the three that prove that which is to be proven also exist in the discordant side.

original: yod med rnam pa gnyis phyir ro /
analyzed: yod med rnam pa gnyis phyir ro /
translated: Because there are two types: existence and nonexistence.

original: grub pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: grub pa nyid yin no //
translated: It is established.

original: phyogs chos mthun phyogs yod med gnyis //
analyzed: phyogs chos mthun phyogs yod med gnyis //
translated: The property of the subject and the concordant side are two types: existence and nonexistence.

original: rnam gnyis re re dag la yang //
analyzed: rnam gnyis re re dag la yang //
translated: Each of the two🔽has three types.

original: rnam gsum mi mthun phyogs la yang //
analyzed: rnam gsum mi mthun phyogs la yang //
translated: The discordant side

original: yod med rnam pa gnyis phyir ro //
analyzed: yod med rnam pa gnyis phyir ro //
translated: has two types: existence and nonexistence.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pas phyogs kyi chos rnam pa dgur dbye ba'i dgos pa /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pas phyogs kyi chos rnam pa dgur dbye ba'i dgos pa /
translated: The purpose of the ninefold division of the property of the subject is stated by the words:

original: phyogs chos rab tu dbye ba yis //🔽zhes bya @307a * //
analyzed: phyogs chos rab tu dbye ba yis // zhes bya @307a * //
translated: By the division of the property of the subject,🔽etc.

original: ba la sogs pas ston par byed do //🔽phyogs chos rab tu dbye ba yis //
analyzed: ba la sogs pas ston par byed do // phyogs chos rab tu dbye ba yis //
translated: The division of the reason is stated by the words:

original: gtan tshigs kyi rab tu dbye bas don thams cad /
analyzed: gtan tshigs kyi rab tu dbye bas don thams cad /
translated: By the division of the reason, all the meanings

original: bde bar bzung bar grub pa'i phyir //
analyzed: bde bar bzung bar grub pa'i phyir //
translated: are easily grasped,

original: gtan tshigs dag gi skabs kyi don //
analyzed: gtan tshigs dag gi skabs kyi don //
translated: and the meaning of the section on the reasons

original: mdor bsdus pa ni brjod pa yin //
analyzed: mdor bsdus pa ni brjod pa yin //
translated: is stated in brief.

original: phyogs chos zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni dag ni don yin no //
analyzed: phyogs chos zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni dag ni don yin no //
translated: The words “property of the subject” and so on are the meanings.

original: gal te phyogs kyi chos nyid yin na /
analyzed: gal te phyogs kyi chos nyid yin na /
translated: If it is the property of the subject,

original: phyogs kyi khyad par la ltos pa dpe la gtan tshigs mi 'jug pa'i phyir /
analyzed: phyogs kyi khyad par la ltos pa dpe la gtan tshigs mi 'jug pa'i phyir /
translated: then the reason does not apply to the example, because it depends on the particular subject.

original: mthun phyogs yod ces bya ba la sogs pa mi rung ngo //🔽ci ste khyad par du gyur pa nyid ma yin pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: mthun phyogs yod ces bya ba la sogs pa mi rung ngo // ci ste khyad par du gyur pa nyid ma yin pa de'i tshe /
translated: Therefore, “the existence of the similar instance” and so on are not correct.

original: phyogs kyi chos nyid ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: phyogs kyi chos nyid ma yin no zhe na /
translated: But if it is not a particular, then at that time it is not the property of the subject.

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: No, it is not so.

original: mi ldan pa rnam par gcod pas khyad par du byas pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mi ldan pa rnam par gcod pas khyad par du byas pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is distinguished by the exclusion of non-possession.🔽First,

original: re zhig / chos tshig phrad tha dad byed pas //
analyzed: re zhig / chos tshig phrad tha dad byed pas //
translated: the word-endings are made different by the words,

original: mi ldan pa de ma 'brel pa'o //
analyzed: mi ldan pa de ma 'brel pa'o //
translated: and that non-possession is not connected.🔽Those that are connected with others

original: gzhan dang ldan pa dag / shin tu ma 'brel rnam gcod byed //
analyzed: gzhan dang ldan pa dag / shin tu ma 'brel rnam gcod byed //
translated: are excluded by the very non-connection.

original: rnam par gcod par byed par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rnam par gcod par byed par 'gyur ro //
translated: They will be excluded.

original: rnam pa gang gis she na /
analyzed: rnam pa gang gis she na /
translated: By what aspect?

original: khyad par zhes bya ba la sogs pa smros te /
analyzed: khyad par zhes bya ba la sogs pa smros te /
translated: He says distinction, etc.

original: gang gi tshe tshig gi phrad khyad par dang lhan cig brjod par 'gyur ba de'i de la ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: gang gi tshe tshig gi phrad khyad par dang lhan cig brjod par 'gyur ba de'i de la ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
translated: When the word-endings are expressed together with the distinction, how is it for that?

original: de la'ang tshig gi phrad sgra'i ngo gzhan dang ldan pa dang / bya ba dag dang lhan cig brjod pa na /
analyzed: de la'ang tshig gi phrad sgra'i ngo gzhan dang ldan pa dang / bya ba dag dang lhan cig brjod pa na /
translated: Even there, when the word-endings are expressed together with the other sound-forms and the actions,

original: shin tu mi srid pa rnam par gcod par byed do //
analyzed: shin tu mi srid pa rnam par gcod par byed do //
translated: the very impossibility is excluded.

original: 'o na gang la tshig gi phrad de ma thob pa de la ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na gang la tshig gi phrad de ma thob pa de la ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
translated: Well then, how is it for that which does not obtain that word-ending?

original: de la'ang tshig gi phrad sgra'i ngo bo nyid du sbyar ba med na'ang brjod 'dod las 'chad pa po'i skabs las 'ongs pa'i brjod par 'dod pa'i dbang gis don 'di nyid ni rnam par gcod pa rnam pa gsum shes par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de la'ang tshig gi phrad sgra'i ngo bo nyid du sbyar ba med na'ang brjod 'dod las 'chad pa po'i skabs las 'ongs pa'i brjod par 'dod pa'i dbang gis don 'di nyid ni rnam par gcod pa rnam pa gsum shes par 'gyur ro //
translated: Even though the connection of the words is not applied in the nature of sound, this meaning is understood by the three exclusions, by the power of the speaker's desire to express, which comes from the speaker's context.

original: ci'i phyir sgra sbyar ba med pa la rnam par gcod pa'i nges pa 'di yin no zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir sgra sbyar ba med pa la rnam par gcod pa'i nges pa 'di yin no zhe na /
translated: Why is this certainty of exclusion in the absence of applying sound?

original: de ltar gdon mi za bar yin te /
analyzed: de ltar gdon mi za bar yin te /
translated: It is definitely like that.

original: gang phyir ngag 'bras rnam gcod yin //
analyzed: gang phyir ngag 'bras rnam gcod yin //
translated: Because speech is the result of exclusion.

original: gzhan la bstan par bya ba'i phyir rab tu sbyar ba 'dis gdon mi za bar mi ldan pa la sogs pa 'ga' zhig rnam par gcod par bya ba yin no de ltar ma yin na 'chad pa po de'i brjod pa 'bras bu med par 'gyur ba dang /
analyzed: gzhan la bstan par bya ba'i phyir rab tu sbyar ba 'dis gdon mi za bar mi ldan pa la sogs pa 'ga' zhig rnam par gcod par bya ba yin no de ltar ma yin na 'chad pa po de'i brjod pa 'bras bu med par 'gyur ba dang /
translated: By applying this to teach others, it is definitely necessary to exclude some non-possession, etc. Otherwise, the speaker's expression would be fruitless,

original: rtogs pa pos rtogs pa med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rtogs pa pos rtogs pa med par 'gyur ro //
translated: and the understander would not understand.

original: mi ldan pa rnam par gcod pa la sogs pa'i dpe dag ni go rims bzhin du ston par byed do //
analyzed: mi ldan pa rnam par gcod pa la sogs pa'i dpe dag ni go rims bzhin du ston par byed do //
translated: The examples of the exclusion of the non-possession, etc., are shown respectively.

original: dper na nag pa @307b 'phong skyen nyid /
analyzed: dper na nag pa @307b 'phong skyen nyid /
translated: For example, the skill in archery of Devadatta

original: gzhan la de bkag pa med pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: gzhan la de bkag pa med pa nyid yin no //
translated: is not the exclusion of the skill in archery of Devadatta.

original: gzhan dang ldan pa la ni srid sgrub 'phong skyen pa nyid thob pa de ltar na gzhan dang 'brel pa ldog par 'gyur te /
analyzed: gzhan dang ldan pa la ni srid sgrub 'phong skyen pa nyid thob pa de ltar na gzhan dang 'brel pa ldog par 'gyur te /
translated: But when there is possession of the other, the skill in archery of Arjuna, then the exclusion of the connection with the other is as follows:

original: sid sgrub kho na 'phong skyen pa'am zhes bya ba lta bu'o //
analyzed: sid sgrub kho na 'phong skyen pa'am zhes bya ba lta bu'o //
translated: Arjuna alone is skilled in archery.

original: shin tu mi srid pa ni /
analyzed: shin tu mi srid pa ni /
translated: The impossible is as follows:

original: sngon po mtsho skyes 'gyur nyid bzhin //
analyzed: sngon po mtsho skyes 'gyur nyid bzhin //
translated: The lotus is not blue.

original: mi srid rnam par gcod pa bzhin //
analyzed: mi srid rnam par gcod pa bzhin //
translated: The exclusion of the impossible is as follows:🔽The lotus is blue.

original: de la'ang zla bo rnam gcod pa //
analyzed: de la'ang zla bo rnam gcod pa //
translated: And there also the exclusion of the other is as follows:🔽The lotus is blue, not yellow.

original: don rnams la ni /
analyzed: don rnams la ni /
translated: For objects,

original: rnam par gcod par byed pa na //
analyzed: rnam par gcod par byed pa na //
translated: when there is exclusion,

original: rtogs par 'gyur /
analyzed: rtogs par 'gyur /
translated: there is understanding.

original: rtogs par bya ba gzhan ni ma yin no //
analyzed: rtogs par bya ba gzhan ni ma yin no //
translated: There is no other object of understanding.

original: dper na lha sbyin dpa' ba kho na yin no zhes bya ba lta bu'o //
analyzed: dper na lha sbyin dpa' ba kho na yin no zhes bya ba lta bu'o //
translated: For example, Devadatta is brave alone.

original: zla bo mi dpa' ba nyid rnam par gcod pa na mi la sogs pa rnam par gcod pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: zla bo mi dpa' ba nyid rnam par gcod pa na mi la sogs pa rnam par gcod pa ni ma yin no //
translated: When one excludes the rival, the man, etc., one does not exclude the man, etc.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why?

original: de ltar grags phyir ro //
analyzed: de ltar grags phyir ro //
translated: Because that is well known.

original: 'jig rten na 'di skad du /
analyzed: 'jig rten na 'di skad du /
translated: In the world, it is well known that

original: 'dod pas dmigs pa'i zla bo gang yin pa de nyid rnam par gcod pa yin gyi gzhan ma yin no zhes grags pa yin no //
analyzed: 'dod pas dmigs pa'i zla bo gang yin pa de nyid rnam par gcod pa yin gyi gzhan ma yin no zhes grags pa yin no //
translated: the rival of the one who is the object of desire is the one who excludes him, not another.

original: chos gzhan rnam par gcod pa la blo 'gyur ba ni bla ste /
analyzed: chos gzhan rnam par gcod pa la blo 'gyur ba ni bla ste /
translated: It is better to have the mind turn away from other things.

original: de ltar yang tshig phrad de zla bo rnam par gcod pa la nus pa yod pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: de ltar yang tshig phrad de zla bo rnam par gcod pa la nus pa yod pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Thus, the word, which has the power to exclude the rival, is used.

original: gzhan yang sgra ni brjod par 'dod pa'i rjes su byed pa can yin gyi /
analyzed: gzhan yang sgra ni brjod par 'dod pa'i rjes su byed pa can yin gyi /
translated: Moreover, the word is dependent on what is desired to be expressed,

original: rang dbang can ma yin pa de ltar na /
analyzed: rang dbang can ma yin pa de ltar na /
translated: and is not independent.

original: brjod par 'dod pa'i dbang gis rnam par gcod pa can yin no //
analyzed: brjod par 'dod pa'i dbang gis rnam par gcod pa can yin no //
translated: Thus, it excludes what is desired to be expressed.

original: de yang nyan pa po 'dod pa'i rjes su byed par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de yang nyan pa po 'dod pa'i rjes su byed par 'gyur ro //
translated: And that is dependent on the desire of the hearer.

original: 'dod pas kyang zla bo phyogs rnam pa gnyis su 'jog par byed pa de ltar na /
analyzed: 'dod pas kyang zla bo phyogs rnam pa gnyis su 'jog par byed pa de ltar na /
translated: Also, by desire, one posits the counter-correlate in two ways.

original: sgra brjod 'dod rjes 'jug phyir ro //
analyzed: sgra brjod 'dod rjes 'jug phyir ro //
translated: Because of the expression of sound, and because of following desire.

original: rgyu'i phyir yang zla bo rnam par gcod pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: rgyu'i phyir yang zla bo rnam par gcod pa nyid yin no //
translated: Also, because of the cause, there is the exclusion of the counter-correlate.

original: gang gi phyir mi ldan pa rnam par gcod pa yod na yang gdon mi za par thams cad la gzhan dang ldan pa rnam par gcod pa nyid ma yin pa de ltar na byas pa nyid la sogs pa'i chos des mi ldan pa ni de dang mi ldan
analyzed: gang gi phyir mi ldan pa rnam par gcod pa yod na yang gdon mi za par thams cad la gzhan dang ldan pa rnam par gcod pa nyid ma yin pa de ltar na byas pa nyid la sogs pa'i chos des mi ldan pa ni de dang mi ldan
translated: Because, even when there is the exclusion of the non-possessor, it is inevitable that there is the exclusion of the possessor of the other, thus, the property of the probandum, such as being produced, etc., is the non-possessor of that.

original: pa'o // de rnam par gcod phyir /
analyzed: pa'o // de rnam par gcod phyir /
translated: In order to exclude that,

original: phyogs chos can chos de byas pa nyid la sogs pa khyad par yin gyi /
analyzed: phyogs chos can chos de byas pa nyid la sogs pa khyad par yin gyi /
translated: the property of the subject is the particular of that property, such as being produced, etc.

original: gzhan dang ldan pa rnam par gcod pas ni ma yin no //
analyzed: gzhan dang ldan pa rnam par gcod pas ni ma yin no //
translated: It is not the exclusion of the possessor of the other.

original: de yis khyad par byas pa'i chos //
analyzed: de yis khyad par byas pa'i chos //
translated: The property that is made particular by that

original: chos can gyi khyad par du byas pa nyid la sogs pa /
analyzed: chos can gyi khyad par du byas pa nyid la sogs pa /
translated: The particular of the property of the subject, such as being produced, etc.,

original: rjes 'gro med pa'i skyon mi rten to //
analyzed: rjes 'gro med pa'i skyon mi rten to //
translated: is not based on the fault of not following.

original: rang bzhin 'bras bu zhes bya ba la sogs pas phyogs kyi chos rnam pa dgu'i dgos pa bstan to //
analyzed: rang bzhin 'bras bu zhes bya ba la sogs pas phyogs kyi chos rnam pa dgu'i dgos pa bstan to //
translated: The author now states the purpose of the nine-fold division of the property of the subject.

original: rang bzhin 'bras bu grub @308a * //
analyzed: rang bzhin 'bras bu grub @308a * //
translated: The nature and the effect are the reason for the establishment of the pervasion of the property of the subject.

original: don du / gnyis dang gtan tshigs bzlog pa gnyis /
analyzed: don du / gnyis dang gtan tshigs bzlog pa gnyis /
translated: The two and the reversal of the reason are the two that are contradictory to the probandum.

original: rang bzhin dang 'bras bu dag ni rang gi khyab par byed pa bsgrub par bya ba la gtan tshigs nyid yin no //
analyzed: rang bzhin dang 'bras bu dag ni rang gi khyab par byed pa bsgrub par bya ba la gtan tshigs nyid yin no //
translated: The nature and the effect are the reason for the establishment of the pervasion of the property of the subject.

original: de dag nyid ni bsgrub par bya ba bzlog pa 'gal ba dag yin no zhes bstan pa'i phyir phyogs chos rnam pa bzhi bstan to //
analyzed: de dag nyid ni bsgrub par bya ba bzlog pa 'gal ba dag yin no zhes bstan pa'i phyir phyogs chos rnam pa bzhi bstan to //
translated: In order to demonstrate that these two are contradictory to the reversal of the probandum, four kinds of the property of the subject are taught.

original: sgra ni mi rtag ste /
analyzed: sgra ni mi rtag ste /
translated: Sound is impermanent.

original: byas pa nyid kyi phyir dang / brtsal ma thag tu byung ba nyid kyi phyir zhes bya ba gnyis so //
analyzed: byas pa nyid kyi phyir dang / brtsal ma thag tu byung ba nyid kyi phyir zhes bya ba gnyis so //
translated: Because it is produced and because it arises immediately after exertion.

original: de dag nyid ni sgra ni rtag pa yin no zhes bsgrub par bya ba la 'gal ba dag yin no zhes bstan par bya ba'i don du gzhan gnyis yin no //
analyzed: de dag nyid ni sgra ni rtag pa yin no zhes bsgrub par bya ba la 'gal ba dag yin no zhes bstan par bya ba'i don du gzhan gnyis yin no //
translated: In order to demonstrate that these two are contradictory to the probandum, “Sound is permanent,” two others are taught.

original: rtsod phyir tha dad spyi dag dang / ldog pa can dang rjes su 'gro ba can gyi gtan tshigs ni go bar byed pa ma yin no zhes dgag par 'dod pas /
analyzed: rtsod phyir tha dad spyi dag dang / ldog pa can dang rjes su 'gro ba can gyi gtan tshigs ni go bar byed pa ma yin no zhes dgag par 'dod pas /
translated: The reason is not a means of cognition when it is different from the property to be established, or when it is general, or when it is contradictory, or when it is inconclusive.

original: phyogs kyi chos gzhan gnyis bstan te /
analyzed: phyogs kyi chos gzhan gnyis bstan te /
translated: The other two properties of the reason are taught in order to refute the desire to deny that the reason is a means of cognition.

original: dper na mnyan par bya ba nyid yin pa'i phyir dang / gzhal bya nyid yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba lta bu'o//
analyzed: dper na mnyan par bya ba nyid yin pa'i phyir dang / gzhal bya nyid yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba lta bu'o//
translated: For example, “because it is audible” and “because it is cognizable.”

original: lhag ma ldog pa'i sgrub byed yin /🔽gtan tshigs kyi ldog pa gtso bor gyur pa bsgrub pa'i phyir //
analyzed: lhag ma ldog pa'i sgrub byed yin / gtan tshigs kyi ldog pa gtso bor gyur pa bsgrub pa'i phyir //
translated: The remainder is the proof of the contrapositive.

original: phyogs kyi chos gsum bstan te /
analyzed: phyogs kyi chos gsum bstan te /
translated: The three properties of the reason are taught in order to prove the contrapositive of the reason.

original: sgra ni brtsal ma thag tu byung ba ma yin te /
analyzed: sgra ni brtsal ma thag tu byung ba ma yin te /
translated: Sound is not produced by effort,

original: mi rtag pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes bya ba la 'di'i mthun pa'i phyogs ni /🔽glog la sogs pa yin no //
analyzed: mi rtag pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes bya ba la 'di'i mthun pa'i phyogs ni / glog la sogs pa yin no //
translated: because it is impermanent.🔽In this case, lightning, etc., are the similar instances.

original: de la me rtag pa nyid yod pa de bas na /
analyzed: de la me rtag pa nyid yod pa de bas na /
translated: Since permanence exists in fire,

original: rtogs par 'gyur na /
analyzed: rtogs par 'gyur na /
translated: if it were to be understood,

original: 'gyur ba ma yin no //
analyzed: 'gyur ba ma yin no //
translated: it would not be.

original: des na rjes su 'gro ba yod pa dag gis go par byed pa nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: des na rjes su 'gro ba yod pa dag gis go par byed pa nyid ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, the presence of concomitance is not the only factor that makes something a reason.

original: ci ste ldog pa med pa can gyi rjes su 'gro ba 'ba' zhig las rtog par mi 'dod na /
analyzed: ci ste ldog pa med pa can gyi rjes su 'gro ba 'ba' zhig las rtog par mi 'dod na /
translated: If you do not accept that a reason is established by the mere presence of a pervasion that lacks a counterexample,

original: 'o na 'dir 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'o na 'dir 'gyur te /
translated: then the following would be the case.

original: dper na sgra rtag ste /
analyzed: dper na sgra rtag ste /
translated: For example, sound is permanent

original: rig par bya ba nyid ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rig par bya ba nyid ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is not an object of knowledge.

original: de dang de mthun pa'i phyogs nam mkha' la sogs pa la yang yod cing mi mthun pa'i phyogs bum pa la sogs pa la yang med pa nyid do //
analyzed: de dang de mthun pa'i phyogs nam mkha' la sogs pa la yang yod cing mi mthun pa'i phyogs bum pa la sogs pa la yang med pa nyid do //
translated: This reason is present in the similar class, such as space, and it is also absent in the dissimilar class, such as a pot.

original: ci ste 'di la yang rtogs pa yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: ci ste 'di la yang rtogs pa yod pa ma yin te /
translated: If you say that this reason is not established,

original: mthun pa'i phyogs thams cad la med pas rjes su 'gro ba gtso bo ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mthun pa'i phyogs thams cad la med pas rjes su 'gro ba gtso bo ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: then because it is not present in all similar instances, the presence of the reason in the similar class is not the principal factor.

original: 'di la rjes su 'gro ba stobs dang ldan pa yin te /
analyzed: 'di la rjes su 'gro ba stobs dang ldan pa yin te /
translated: In this case, the presence of the reason in the similar class is the powerful factor.

original: dper na sgra ni brtsal ma thag tu byung ba yin te /
analyzed: dper na sgra ni brtsal ma thag tu byung ba yin te /
translated: For example, sound is a product

original: mi rtag pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes bya ba lta bu'o //
analyzed: mi rtag pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes bya ba lta bu'o //
translated: because it is impermanent.

original: 'di ni mthun pa'i phyogs bum pa la sogs pa thams cad la yod cing mi mthun pa'i @308b phyogs nam mkha' la sogs pa 'ga' zhig la med pa de ltar na /
analyzed: 'di ni mthun pa'i phyogs bum pa la sogs pa thams cad la yod cing mi mthun pa'i @308b phyogs nam mkha' la sogs pa 'ga' zhig la med pa de ltar na /
translated: This is not the case for all things, such as pots, and it is not the case for some things, such as space, that are not in accord with it.

original: rtogs par 'gyur na 'gyur pa yang ma yin no //
analyzed: rtogs par 'gyur na 'gyur pa yang ma yin no //
translated: If it were, it would be realized.

original: de bas na rjes su 'gro ba yod pa tsam gyis kyang ma yin zhing /
analyzed: de bas na rjes su 'gro ba yod pa tsam gyis kyang ma yin zhing /
translated: Therefore, it is not just the mere presence of the forward pervasion,

original: ldog pa dang bcas pas kyang ma yin la /
analyzed: ldog pa dang bcas pas kyang ma yin la /
translated: nor is it the counter pervasion,

original: rjes su 'gro ba gtso bos kyang rtogs pa ma yin no /
analyzed: rjes su 'gro ba gtso bos kyang rtogs pa ma yin no /
translated: nor is it the forward pervasion alone that is the realization.

original: 'on kyang thams cad las ldog par nges par byed pa'i gtan tshigs yin no zhes bstan pa'i phyir phyogs kyi chos gsum po de bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: 'on kyang thams cad las ldog par nges par byed pa'i gtan tshigs yin no zhes bstan pa'i phyir phyogs kyi chos gsum po de bstan pa yin no //
translated: However, the three properties of the subject are stated in order to teach that it is a reason that ascertains the counter pervasion of everything.

original: ci'i phyir byas pa nyid kyang rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs yin zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir byas pa nyid kyang rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs yin zhe na /
translated: Why is being a product also a natural reason?

original: 'di ltar gang gi phyir 'di'i mthun pa'i phyogs thams cad la yod pa nyid yin par gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: 'di ltar gang gi phyir 'di'i mthun pa'i phyogs thams cad la yod pa nyid yin par gsungs pa yin no //
translated: It is because it is stated that it is the presence in all that is in accord with it.

original: de las kyang ci'i phyir rang bzhin yin zhe na /
analyzed: de las kyang ci'i phyir rang bzhin yin zhe na /
translated: Why is it a nature?

original: 'di ltar / rang bzhin nyid las gzhan gyis ni //
analyzed: 'di ltar / rang bzhin nyid las gzhan gyis ni //
translated: By something other than the nature itself,

original: rtags kyis bsgrub par bya ba'i chos kyi mthun pa'i phyogs la khyab pa med do//
analyzed: rtags kyis bsgrub par bya ba'i chos kyi mthun pa'i phyogs la khyab pa med do//
translated: the logical reason does not pervade the property to be established in the similar instance.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: rgyu ni 'khrul pa srid phyir ro //
analyzed: rgyu ni 'khrul pa srid phyir ro //
translated: Because there is the possibility of error in the cause.

original: rjes su dpag pa dang rjes su dpag par bya ba'i tha snyad la nye bar sbyar ba'i rgyu ni 'bras bu la 'khrul par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rjes su dpag pa dang rjes su dpag par bya ba'i tha snyad la nye bar sbyar ba'i rgyu ni 'bras bu la 'khrul par 'gyur ro //
translated: The cause that is applied to the conventions of inference and that which is to be inferred is the effect, which is subject to error.

original: de'i phyir / rgyu'i phyir mthun pa'i phyogs la rnam pa gnyis su 'jug ces bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de'i phyir / rgyu'i phyir mthun pa'i phyogs la rnam pa gnyis su 'jug ces bya ba'i don to //
translated: Therefore, the meaning of “because of the cause, it engages in the two ways in the similar instance” is that.

original: de ltar na dngos po mi rtag pa nyid ni 'bras bu brtsal ma thag tu byung ba'i ngang tshul can gyi shes pa'i rgyu yin no //
analyzed: de ltar na dngos po mi rtag pa nyid ni 'bras bu brtsal ma thag tu byung ba'i ngang tshul can gyi shes pa'i rgyu yin no //
translated: Thus, impermanence is the cause of the cognition that has the mode of the effect that arises immediately upon the exertion.

original: mi rtag pa nyid ces bya ba thams cad 'bras bu brtsal ma thag tu byung ba'i ngang tshul can gyi shes pa skyed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: mi rtag pa nyid ces bya ba thams cad 'bras bu brtsal ma thag tu byung ba'i ngang tshul can gyi shes pa skyed pa ma yin no //
translated: Not all impermanence generates the cognition that has the mode of the effect that arises immediately upon the exertion.

original: de bas na mthun pa'i phyogs la 'bras bu rnam pa gnyis su 'jug par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bas na mthun pa'i phyogs la 'bras bu rnam pa gnyis su 'jug par 'gyur ro //
translated: Thus, the effect is twofold in the favorable side.

original: mthun pa'i phyogs thams cad la yod par 'gyur ba gang yin pa de ni rang bzhin nyid yin no //
analyzed: mthun pa'i phyogs thams cad la yod par 'gyur ba gang yin pa de ni rang bzhin nyid yin no //
translated: That which exists in all favorable cases is the nature itself.

original: brtsal ma thag tu byung ba'i ngang tshul can gyi shes pa mi rtag pa'i 'bras bu yin no zhes ji ltar shes par 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: brtsal ma thag tu byung ba'i ngang tshul can gyi shes pa mi rtag pa'i 'bras bu yin no zhes ji ltar shes par 'gyur zhe na /
translated: How do we know that the knowledge which has the nature of arising immediately upon effort is the effect of impermanence?

original: 'di ltar / rtsol ba las sngar yod pa ni //
analyzed: 'di ltar / rtsol ba las sngar yod pa ni //
translated: Thus:

original: sgra nges pa yis /
analyzed: sgra nges pa yis /
translated: The sound is ascertained by the word.

original: brtsal ma thag byung shes ma yin te /
analyzed: brtsal ma thag byung shes ma yin te /
translated: The knowledge which arises immediately upon effort is not prior to the effort.

original: mi rung ngo //
analyzed: mi rung ngo //
translated: It is not possible.

original: thams cad kyi tshe dmigs par 'gyur na brtsal ma thag tu byung ba nyid ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: thams cad kyi tshe dmigs par 'gyur na brtsal ma thag tu byung ba nyid ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: If it were prior, it would be perceived at all times, and it would not be the case that it arises immediately upon effort.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /🔽sgrib byed dbang po sgra de la //
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na / sgrib byed dbang po sgra de la //
translated: Why is that?🔽The obstruction to the sense faculty and the sound🔽Obstructs the object.

original: dmigs pa la sgrib par byed pa dang / dbang po dang sgra rnams la rtsol //🔽rnam kun nyer @309a * //
analyzed: dmigs pa la sgrib par byed pa dang / dbang po dang sgra rnams la rtsol // rnam kun nyer @309a * //
translated: The effort is in the sense faculty and the sound.🔽The knowledge is not in all aspects.

original: sbyor med phyir ro //
analyzed: sbyor med phyir ro //
translated: The application is not in all aspects.

original: cung zhig kyang mi byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: cung zhig kyang mi byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it does not produce anything at all.

original: gong du ji skad bshad zin pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: gong du ji skad bshad zin pa lta bu'o //
translated: As has been explained above.

original: de ltar na sgra ltos pa med par rtag tu 'bras bu rnam par shes pa skyed par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar na sgra ltos pa med par rtag tu 'bras bu rnam par shes pa skyed par 'gyur ro //
translated: Thus, sound, without any dependence, would always produce the effect, the cognition.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why?

original: ltos pa med pa'i sgra 'ga' zhig tshe /🔽'bras mi byed pa 'gal phyir ro //
analyzed: ltos pa med pa'i sgra 'ga' zhig tshe / 'bras mi byed pa 'gal phyir ro //
translated: Because it is contradictory that a sound, which is not dependent,🔽would not produce its effect.

original: 'bras bu mi byed pa 'gal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'bras bu mi byed pa 'gal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: It would be contradictory that it would not produce its effect.

original: de bas na shes pa de'i sgra'i /
analyzed: de bas na shes pa de'i sgra'i /
translated: Therefore, the cognition of that sound

original: res 'ga' ba'i 'bras bur grub /
analyzed: res 'ga' ba'i 'bras bur grub /
translated: is established as being the effect of the sound at some times.

original: brtsal ma thag tu byung ba'i ngang tshul can gyi shes pa /
analyzed: brtsal ma thag tu byung ba'i ngang tshul can gyi shes pa /
translated: The cognition, which has the nature of arising immediately upon the exertion,

original: de de 'dra ba sgra res 'ga' ba'i rtags yin no //
analyzed: de de 'dra ba sgra res 'ga' ba'i rtags yin no //
translated: is the mark of the sound at some times.

original: de tsam nyid kyis grub na yang /
analyzed: de tsam nyid kyis grub na yang /
translated: Even though it is established to that extent,

original: brtsam thag tu byung ba nyid kyi phyir zhes bya ba thun mong du bstan pa'i dpe 'di nyid kyi rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs rab tu grub pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: brtsam thag tu byung ba nyid kyi phyir zhes bya ba thun mong du bstan pa'i dpe 'di nyid kyi rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs rab tu grub pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
translated: the example, which is taught in common, “because of arising immediately upon exertion,” is established as a natural inference.

original: de lta na yang rang bzhin byas pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pas tha dad byas pa yin /
analyzed: de lta na yang rang bzhin byas pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pas tha dad byas pa yin /
translated: However, since it is produced, it is different.

original: gang yin pa de ni tha dad don can yin te /
analyzed: gang yin pa de ni tha dad don can yin te /
translated: That which is different has a different purpose.

original: dper na 'bras dang lhan cig rang bzhin yang bshad pa na /
analyzed: dper na 'bras dang lhan cig rang bzhin yang bshad pa na /
translated: For example, when the nature of rice is explained together with rice,

original: sgrub pa pos thams cad de ltar shes ma gyur /
analyzed: sgrub pa pos thams cad de ltar shes ma gyur /
translated: the proponent does not understand everything in that way.

original: rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs mthun pa'i phyogs la rnam pa gnyis su 'jug pa'i rang bzhin gyi rtags dang 'bras bu'i rtags yin no //
analyzed: rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs mthun pa'i phyogs la rnam pa gnyis su 'jug pa'i rang bzhin gyi rtags dang 'bras bu'i rtags yin no //
translated: The reason of nature is a reason of nature that engages in two aspects in the similar class and a reason of effect.

original: gzhan yang sgrub pa pos gtan tshigs brjod mkhas don du byas pa yin no //
analyzed: gzhan yang sgrub pa pos gtan tshigs brjod mkhas don du byas pa yin no //
translated: Moreover, the proponent's statement of the reason is for the sake of the learned.

original: ci 'dra ba zhig ce na /
analyzed: ci 'dra ba zhig ce na /
translated: What is it like?

original: rjes su dpag par bshad zin to //
analyzed: rjes su dpag par bshad zin to //
translated: Inference has already been explained.

original: rang gi don gyi rjes su dpag par gtan tshigs kyi don bshad zin pa yin yang yang byas pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: rang gi don gyi rjes su dpag par gtan tshigs kyi don bshad zin pa yin yang yang byas pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: Although the meaning of the reason has been explained in inference for oneself, that which is done again

original: mkhas pa'i don du byas pa yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: mkhas pa'i don du byas pa yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: is for the sake of the learned. This is the meaning.

original: des na / mkhas pa'i don du gtan tshigs kyi //🔽rab dbye tsam ni bshad pa na //
analyzed: des na / mkhas pa'i don du gtan tshigs kyi // rab dbye tsam ni bshad pa na //
translated: Therefore, for the sake of the wise,🔽the mere classification of reasons

original: mtshan nyid tha dad par mi 'gyur //
analyzed: mtshan nyid tha dad par mi 'gyur //
translated: is explained, without distinction of characteristics.

original: rang gi don gyi rjes su dpag par gnyis po gang yin pa de nyid thun mong du bstan pa de lta rna skyon yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: rang gi don gyi rjes su dpag par gnyis po gang yin pa de nyid thun mong du bstan pa de lta rna skyon yod pa ma yin no //
translated: There is no fault in teaching the two kinds of inference for oneself as common to both.

original: des 'dir 'bras bu'i rtags kyis ni /
analyzed: des 'dir 'bras bu'i rtags kyis ni /
translated: Here, by the reason of effect,

original: dper na rang bzhin gyi rtags kyi chos rten pa yin no //
analyzed: dper na rang bzhin gyi rtags kyi chos rten pa yin no //
translated: for example, the property of the subject is based on the reason of nature.

original: rang bzhin nyid kyang phyogs gcig rten pa bshad par 'gyur te /
analyzed: rang bzhin nyid kyang phyogs gcig rten pa bshad par 'gyur te /
translated: Nature itself is based on one part, as will be explained.

original: dper na rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs kyang phyogs gcig la 'jug pa can yin no zhes bstan par 'gyur ba lta bu'o //
analyzed: dper na rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs kyang phyogs gcig la 'jug pa can yin no zhes bstan par 'gyur ba lta bu'o //
translated: For example, it is shown that the reason of nature also applies to one part.

original: de nyid kyi phyir slob dpon gyis /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir slob dpon gyis /
translated: For this very reason, the master [Dignāga]

original: dpe 'di 'dra bar byas pa yin //
analyzed: dpe 'di 'dra bar byas pa yin //
translated: made this example.

original: gang gi zhe na /
analyzed: gang gi zhe na /
translated: What is it?

original: rtsol bas gsal dang skye ba'i /
analyzed: rtsol bas gsal dang skye ba'i /
translated: It is the clear and arising by effort.

original: @309b brtsal ma thag tu byung bas 'bras bur gyur pa dmigs pa dang / brtsal ma thag tu byung ba rang bzhin du gyur pa'i'o //🔽de ltar ni 'gyur mod kyi /🔽'di ni rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs yin la /
analyzed: @309b brtsal ma thag tu byung bas 'bras bur gyur pa dmigs pa dang / brtsal ma thag tu byung ba rang bzhin du gyur pa'i'o // de ltar ni 'gyur mod kyi / 'di ni rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs yin la /
translated: that which is based on the essential nature of the effect and that which is based on the essential nature of the cause.🔽The inference based on what is to be accomplished is of two kinds:🔽that which is based on the essential nature of the cause and that which is based on the essential nature of the effect.🔽The inference based on real fact is of two kinds:🔽that which is based on the essential nature of the effect and that which is based on the essential nature of the cause.🔽The inference based on what is to be accomplished is of two kinds:

original: 'di ni 'bras bu'i gtan tshigs yin no zhes tha dad par bstan pa la dgos pa ci zhig yod ce na /
analyzed: 'di ni 'bras bu'i gtan tshigs yin no zhes tha dad par bstan pa la dgos pa ci zhig yod ce na /
translated: that which is based on the essential nature of the cause and that which is based on the essential nature of the effect.

original: dgos pa yod pa yin no //
analyzed: dgos pa yod pa yin no //
translated: The inference based on real fact is of two kinds:🔽that which is based on the essential nature of the effect and that which is based on the essential nature of the cause.

original: de ltar na rtags can la /
analyzed: de ltar na rtags can la /
translated: The inference based on what is to be accomplished is of two kinds:

original: med na mi byung gang yod dang // rtags so //🔽bdag dang tha dad med pa gang //🔽bdag nyid du gyur pa'i bsgrub par bya ba'i rang bzhin las tha dad pa med pa'i ngo bo gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: med na mi byung gang yod dang // rtags so // bdag dang tha dad med pa gang // bdag nyid du gyur pa'i bsgrub par bya ba'i rang bzhin las tha dad pa med pa'i ngo bo gang yin pa'o //
translated: that which is based on the essential nature of the cause and that which is based on the essential nature of the effect.🔽The inference based on real fact is of two kinds:🔽that which is based on the essential nature of the effect and that which is based on the essential nature of the cause.🔽The inference based on what is to be accomplished is of two kinds:🔽that which is based on the essential nature of the cause and that which is based on the essential nature of the effect.🔽The inference based on real fact is of two kinds:

original: des te don rtags su gyur pa'o //
analyzed: des te don rtags su gyur pa'o //
translated: that which is based on the essential nature of the effect and that which is based on the essential nature of the cause.🔽The inference based on what is to be accomplished is of two kinds:

original: gang gi phyir rgyu de yis yod pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gang gi phyir rgyu de yis yod pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: that which is based on the essential nature of the cause and that which is

original: gang gi phyir tha dad pa med pa'i bdag nyid can gyi dngos po gang yin pa de nyid de dang 'khrul med can 'gyur /
analyzed: gang gi phyir tha dad pa med pa'i bdag nyid can gyi dngos po gang yin pa de nyid de dang 'khrul med can 'gyur /
translated: Because whatever thing has an identity that is not different from that, it is not mistaken with regard to that.

original: de ltar de don rab dbye yin //
analyzed: de ltar de don rab dbye yin //
translated: Thus, it is the differentiation of the object.

original: rab tu dbye ba ston pa yin no //
analyzed: rab tu dbye ba ston pa yin no //
translated: It is the teaching of the differentiation.

original: de ltar na ldan pa nyid la sogs pa ldan pa dang / 'phrod pa 'du ba dang / don gcig la 'du ba dang / rje khol gyi 'brel pa la sogs pa /
analyzed: de ltar na ldan pa nyid la sogs pa ldan pa dang / 'phrod pa 'du ba dang / don gcig la 'du ba dang / rje khol gyi 'brel pa la sogs pa /
translated: Thus, possession and so on, conjunction, the coming together of the same object, the relationship of master and slave, and so on,

original: gang dag la /
analyzed: gang dag la /
translated: in regard to which

original: 'brel pa de 'dra ba yod pa ma yin de las byung ba dang de'i mtshan nyid kyi mtshan nyid can no //
analyzed: 'brel pa de 'dra ba yod pa ma yin de las byung ba dang de'i mtshan nyid kyi mtshan nyid can no //
translated: there is no such relationship, are the arising from that and the characteristic of that.

original: de dag gtan tshigs min zhes bshad /
analyzed: de dag gtan tshigs min zhes bshad /
translated: They are explained as not being reasons.

original: don gyis bshad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: don gyis bshad par 'gyur ro //
translated: It will be explained by the meaning.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: 'khrul pa dang ni srid phyir ro //
analyzed: 'khrul pa dang ni srid phyir ro //
translated: Because of error and possibility.

original: rag ma las pa'i ngo bo rnam ni gzhan gyi mi 'khrul pa ci zhig yin /🔽ci ste 'brel pa 'dod pa nyid yin pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: rag ma las pa'i ngo bo rnam ni gzhan gyi mi 'khrul pa ci zhig yin / ci ste 'brel pa 'dod pa nyid yin pa de'i tshe /
translated: What is the non-mistakenness of another in regard to a nature that is not dependent?🔽But if the mere desire for a relationship is that,

original: 'brel pa yod pa yin na yang /
analyzed: 'brel pa yod pa yin na yang /
translated: then even when there is a relationship,

original: 'o na ni 'brel pa de nyid rtogs pa'i sgrub byed yin /
analyzed: 'o na ni 'brel pa de nyid rtogs pa'i sgrub byed yin /
translated: But the relation itself is the proof of the pervasion.

original: gzhan ldan pa la sogs pa khas blangs pas ci zhig bya /
analyzed: gzhan ldan pa la sogs pa khas blangs pas ci zhig bya /
translated: What is the use of accepting possession of the other, etc.?

original: 'di ltar sgrub par byed pa bsgrub par bya ba la 'brel pa nges pa de nyid /
analyzed: 'di ltar sgrub par byed pa bsgrub par bya ba la 'brel pa nges pa de nyid /
translated: Thus, the relation that is ascertained in the proof of the probandum is the pervasion.

original: med na mi 'byung ba yin no //
analyzed: med na mi 'byung ba yin no //
translated: If the probandum is absent, the probans is necessarily absent.

original: nges pa med pa ste 'brel pa med pa yang na sgrub byed min no //
analyzed: nges pa med pa ste 'brel pa med pa yang na sgrub byed min no //
translated: If there is no ascertainment, i.e., no relation, then the probans is not a proof.

original: re zhig ldog pa can gyi gtan tshigs la mi mthun pa'i phyogs las ldog pa nyid yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: re zhig ldog pa can gyi gtan tshigs la mi mthun pa'i phyogs las ldog pa nyid yod pa ma yin no //
translated: First, in the case of a probans that has a negative pervasion, there is no negative pervasion from the dissimilar instances.

original: 'di ltar bsgrub bya med na nges par gtan tshigs med pa'i ldog pa gang yin pa 'di ni mi 'byung ba'i phyogs las gtan tshigs /
analyzed: 'di ltar bsgrub bya med na nges par gtan tshigs med pa'i ldog pa gang yin pa 'di ni mi 'byung ba'i phyogs las gtan tshigs /
translated: Thus, if the probandum is absent, the probans is necessarily absent.

original: ldog pa nyid ni nges pa nyid yin te /
analyzed: ldog pa nyid ni nges pa nyid yin te /
translated: The negative pervasion is the ascertainment.

original: de yang ldog pa nyid ni nges pa nyid /
analyzed: de yang ldog pa nyid ni nges pa nyid /
translated: Moreover, the negative pervasion is the ascertainment.

original: med na mi 'byung ba yin par sgra yis brjod pa yin no //🔽@310a * // ldog pa nges pa nyid de yang bdag la srog la sogs pa /
analyzed: med na mi 'byung ba yin par sgra yis brjod pa yin no //🔽@310a * // ldog pa nges pa nyid de yang bdag la srog la sogs pa /
translated: The word “only” expresses the pervasion.🔽The ascertainment of the negative pervasion is the ascertainment of the pervasion.

original: 'brel pa med la med pa yin pa de bas na ldog pa 'dod pas 'brel pa yang 'dod par bya'o //
analyzed: 'brel pa med la med pa yin pa de bas na ldog pa 'dod pas 'brel pa yang 'dod par bya'o //
translated: Since there is no connection when there is no pervasion, one must accept a connection when there is pervasion.

original: de nyid phyir na /
analyzed: de nyid phyir na /
translated: For that very reason,

original: 'brel pa'i phyir /
analyzed: 'brel pa'i phyir /
translated: because there is a connection,

original: rjes 'gro gnas pa yin pa de bas na sgrub par byed pa la bsgrub par bya ba'i gtan tshigs kyi rjes su 'gro ba gnas pa yin no //
analyzed: rjes 'gro gnas pa yin pa de bas na sgrub par byed pa la bsgrub par bya ba'i gtan tshigs kyi rjes su 'gro ba gnas pa yin no //
translated: the presence of the reason in the similar instances is established.

original: rang bzhin nyid dang rgyu dngos ni grub na /
analyzed: rang bzhin nyid dang rgyu dngos ni grub na /
translated: If the nature itself and the cause are established,

original: de med na med par nges pa'i phyir de la 'brel pa'i ldog pa grub par 'gyur na /
analyzed: de med na med par nges pa'i phyir de la 'brel pa'i ldog pa grub par 'gyur na /
translated: then because it is ascertained that the reason is absent when the probandum is absent, the pervasion is established.

original: thun mong ma yin pa la rnam gnyis po de yang yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: thun mong ma yin pa la rnam gnyis po de yang yod pa ma yin no //
translated: But in the uncommon reason, those two do not exist.

original: de'i phyir na khyad par la thun mong ma yin pa la /
analyzed: de'i phyir na khyad par la thun mong ma yin pa la /
translated: Therefore, in the uncommon reason,

original: ldog pa med pa dang rjes 'gro med 'brel pa nyid yod na de dag yod pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ldog pa med pa dang rjes 'gro med 'brel pa nyid yod na de dag yod pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: there is no pervasion and no presence in similar instances. If there is a connection, then those two exist.

original: gal te 'di ltar slob dpon gyis khyad par ldog pa ma yin na /
analyzed: gal te 'di ltar slob dpon gyis khyad par ldog pa ma yin na /
translated: If the master had said that there is no pervasion in the uncommon reason,🔽then what would be the point of saying “because there is no pervasion”?

original: ji ltar mthun pa'i phyogs dang mi mthun pa'i phyogs las de ldog pa yin no zhes bshad ce na /
analyzed: ji ltar mthun pa'i phyogs dang mi mthun pa'i phyogs las de ldog pa yin no zhes bshad ce na /
translated: How can it be said that it is the counter-correlate of the similar and dissimilar instances?

original: de ni med pa las ldog pa yin pa de ltar ni ma bshad do //
analyzed: de ni med pa las ldog pa yin pa de ltar ni ma bshad do //
translated: It is not explained that it is the counter-correlate of non-existence.

original: de ma mthong ba tsam la bstan nas /
analyzed: de ma mthong ba tsam la bstan nas /
translated: Having taught that it is the mere non-seeing of that,

original: de'i ldog pa 'ba' zhig bshad pa yin /
analyzed: de'i ldog pa 'ba' zhig bshad pa yin /
translated: only the counter-correlate of that is explained.

original: gang gi phyir mi mthun pa'i phyogs la de mthong ba med pa tsam gyis ldog pa yin pa /
analyzed: gang gi phyir mi mthun pa'i phyogs la de mthong ba med pa tsam gyis ldog pa yin pa /
translated: Because it is the counter-correlate of the dissimilar instance by the mere non-seeing of that,

original: de'i phyir na ma nges pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir na ma nges pa yin no //
translated: therefore it is not ascertained.

original: gzhan du na gal te ldog pa nges par 'gyur ba de'i tshe //
analyzed: gzhan du na gal te ldog pa nges par 'gyur ba de'i tshe //
translated: Otherwise, if it were ascertained as the counter-correlate,

original: go bar byed par 'gyur gyi ma nges pa nyid yin par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: go bar byed par 'gyur gyi ma nges pa nyid yin par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: then it would be understood, and it would not be uncertain.

original: 'dir yang / srog sogs med pas bdag med la //🔽khyab pa zhes bya ba ni 'di ltar bsgrub par bya ba ldog pas sgrub par byed pa ldog pa yod na /
analyzed: 'dir yang / srog sogs med pas bdag med la // khyab pa zhes bya ba ni 'di ltar bsgrub par bya ba ldog pas sgrub par byed pa ldog pa yod na /
translated: Here also, because there is no life, etc., there is no self.🔽Pervasion means that when the probandum is negated, the probans is necessarily negated.

original: sgrub par byed pa med pas bsgrub par bya ba med pa la khyab par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sgrub par byed pa med pas bsgrub par bya ba med pa la khyab par 'gyur ro //
translated: Because the probans is absent when the probandum is absent, there is pervasion.

original: 'dir yang bdag bsgrub par bya ba ldog pa sgrub par byed pa srog la sogs pa ldog pa bum pa la sogs pa thams cad la yod pa yin no //
analyzed: 'dir yang bdag bsgrub par bya ba ldog pa sgrub par byed pa srog la sogs pa ldog pa bum pa la sogs pa thams cad la yod pa yin no //
translated: Here, the negation of the self, which is to be established, is established by the negation of life force, etc., which is present in all things, such as the pot.

original: de bas na srog la sogs pa med pas bdag med pa la khyab pa yin zhing /
analyzed: de bas na srog la sogs pa med pas bdag med pa la khyab pa yin zhing /
translated: Therefore, since life force, etc., do not exist, the nonexistence of the self is pervaded by it.

original: de yang de'i tshe bdag med pa la khyab par 'gyur na /
analyzed: de yang de'i tshe bdag med pa la khyab par 'gyur na /
translated: And if that is so, then the nonexistence of the self would pervade that.

original: gang la rang nyid mi 'gyur ba de nyid las bdag med pa'i bdag nyid khyab par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba 'di ni phyogs snga ma'i bsam pa yin no //
analyzed: gang la rang nyid mi 'gyur ba de nyid las bdag med pa'i bdag nyid khyab par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba 'di ni phyogs snga ma'i bsam pa yin no //
translated: This is the intention of the opponent, who thinks that the self is pervaded by the nonexistence of the self, which is not itself.

original: bdag ldog pa na yang /
analyzed: bdag ldog pa na yang /
translated: When the self is negated,

original: srog la sogs kyang ldog 'gyur na //
analyzed: srog la sogs kyang ldog 'gyur na //
translated: life force, etc., are also negated.

original: zhes bsam par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: zhes bsam par 'gyur ro //
translated: This is what he thinks.

original: de @310b bas na bdag bsgrub par bya ba ldog pa srog la sogs pa sgrub par byed pa gdon mi za bar ldog pa de ltar na srog la sogs pa ldog par rtogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de @310b bas na bdag bsgrub par bya ba ldog pa srog la sogs pa sgrub par byed pa gdon mi za bar ldog pa de ltar na srog la sogs pa ldog par rtogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, the negation of the self, which is to be established, is established by the negation of life force, etc., which is present in all things.

original: gang de min te /
analyzed: gang de min te /
translated: This is not so.

original: mi rung ngo //
analyzed: mi rung ngo //
translated: It is not tenable.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why?

original: gzhan ni khyab par byed pa nyid du ma grub pa bdag ldog pa yis gzhan te /
analyzed: gzhan ni khyab par byed pa nyid du ma grub pa bdag ldog pa yis gzhan te /
translated: The other is not established as the pervader.

original: de la rag las med pa'i srog la sogs pa /
analyzed: de la rag las med pa'i srog la sogs pa /
translated: The self is not dependent on life, etc.

original: ldog par mi rung ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: ldog par mi rung ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: because it is not suitable to be reversed.

original: rgyu'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rgyu'i phyir ro //
translated: Because of the cause.

original: ci'i phyir srog la sogs pa med pas bdag med pa la khyab par 'gyur //
analyzed: ci'i phyir srog la sogs pa med pas bdag med pa la khyab par 'gyur //
translated: Why is it that the nonexistence of life, etc. pervades the nonexistence of the self?

original: gang gis na khyab pa'i phyir bdag ldog pas srog la sogs pa ldog par 'gyur /🔽de ltar de 'gyur mod kyi /
analyzed: gang gis na khyab pa'i phyir bdag ldog pas srog la sogs pa ldog par 'gyur / de ltar de 'gyur mod kyi /
translated: Because of the pervasion, the reversal of life, etc. would occur by the reversal of the self.

original: gal te de bdag de las byung //
analyzed: gal te de bdag de las byung //
translated: That is so, but if that arises from the self,

original: bdag gi dang bdag nyid du gyur pa'i srog la sogs pa'am /
analyzed: bdag gi dang bdag nyid du gyur pa'i srog la sogs pa'am /
translated: life, etc. would be related to the self.

original: bdag las byung zhing skyes pa de bas na de'i 'brel pa yin no //
analyzed: bdag las byung zhing skyes pa de bas na de'i 'brel pa yin no //
translated: If that arises from the self, it would be related to the self.

original: de bas na 'brel pa yod pas na de ltar na /
analyzed: de bas na 'brel pa yod pas na de ltar na /
translated: Therefore, because of the existence of the relation, in that way,

original: bdag ldog pa'i phyir de ldog pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: bdag ldog pa'i phyir de ldog pa yin no zhe na /
translated: the reversal of that occurs by the reversal of the self.

original: 'dir re zhig de'i bdag nyid ni rigs pa ma yin zhing /
analyzed: 'dir re zhig de'i bdag nyid ni rigs pa ma yin zhing /
translated: Here, first, it is not reasonable that it is of the nature of that,

original: gzhan yang 'dod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: gzhan yang 'dod pa ma yin no //
translated: and it is also not asserted as another.

original: 'on kyang 'brel ba'i yul de tsam du 'gyur na 'gyur ba ma yin pa de ltar na /
analyzed: 'on kyang 'brel ba'i yul de tsam du 'gyur na 'gyur ba ma yin pa de ltar na /
translated: But if the object of the relation is not different, then the relation is not possible.

original: 'di bkod pa yin no //
analyzed: 'di bkod pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, this is the arrangement.

original: de las byung ba'i mtshan nyid 'gyur grang na /
analyzed: de las byung ba'i mtshan nyid 'gyur grang na /
translated: If the characteristic of origination is the relation,

original: bdag la srog la sogs pa de yang yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: bdag la srog la sogs pa de yang yod pa ma yin no //
translated: then the self does not exist, and life force, etc. do not exist.

original: de ltar na ;
analyzed: de ltar na ;
translated: Thus,

original: de ni bdag la dmigs ba na /
analyzed: de ni bdag la dmigs ba na /
translated: when the self is not perceived,

original: srog la sogs pa de dmigs /
analyzed: srog la sogs pa de dmigs /
translated: life force, etc. are not perceived.

original: bdag rtogs pa med na ni /
analyzed: bdag rtogs pa med na ni /
translated: If the self is not perceived,

original: srog la sogs pa yang rtogs pa med na 'ang grub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: srog la sogs pa yang rtogs pa med na 'ang grub par 'gyur ro //
translated: life force, etc. are not perceived.

original: 'dir rgyud 'bras bur rtogs pa'i thabs de ni 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'dir rgyud 'bras bur rtogs pa'i thabs de ni 'di lta ste /
translated: Here, the method of understanding the effect from the cause is as follows:

original: dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid kyi gyur pa gang sngar mi dmigs ba dang / gang dmigs pa yod na dmigs par 'gyur pa dang / mi dmigs par 'gyur ba de ni de'i 'bras bu yin no zhes bya bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid kyi gyur pa gang sngar mi dmigs ba dang / gang dmigs pa yod na dmigs par 'gyur pa dang / mi dmigs par 'gyur ba de ni de'i 'bras bu yin no zhes bya bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Whatever transformation with the characteristic of an object is not perceived before, and when it is perceived, it is perceived as the effect of that.

original: bdag dang lhan cig srog la sogs pa dag ni de lta bu'i rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po rtogs pa yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: bdag dang lhan cig srog la sogs pa dag ni de lta bu'i rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po rtogs pa yod pa ma yin te /
translated: The self and life force, etc. do not exist as such things that are cause and effect.

original: bdag ni rtag tu mi dmigs pa'i rang bzhin nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bdag ni rtag tu mi dmigs pa'i rang bzhin nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the self is by nature always imperceptible.

original: de bas na bdag shin tu lkog tu gyur pa la /
analyzed: de bas na bdag shin tu lkog tu gyur pa la /
translated: Therefore, the self is extremely hidden.

original: rnam pa 'ga' zhig ltar yang /
analyzed: rnam pa 'ga' zhig ltar yang /
translated: In no way whatsoever

original: mthong dang ma mthong de mi 'grub //
analyzed: mthong dang ma mthong de mi 'grub //
translated: is its seeing or not seeing established.

original: de ltar na srog la sogs pa de dang 'brel pa'i rang bzhin nyid du ma yin na /
analyzed: de ltar na srog la sogs pa de dang 'brel pa'i rang bzhin nyid du ma yin na /
translated: Thus, if life force and so on are not the nature of that self,🔽then how could the cessation of the self

original: gang gis na bdag ldog pas de ldog par @311a * //
analyzed: gang gis na bdag ldog pas de ldog par @311a * //
translated: cause their cessation?

original: 'gyur / gzhan la yang la lar mthong ba gang yin pa de dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid kyis gyur ba gal te gzhan la mi dmigs pa de'i tshe med do zhes shes par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'gyur / gzhan la yang la lar mthong ba gang yin pa de dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid kyis gyur ba gal te gzhan la mi dmigs pa de'i tshe med do zhes shes par 'gyur ro //
translated: Moreover, if the seeing of something in one place is the characteristic of perception, then when it is not perceived in another place, one would know that it does not exist.

original: mi snang ba de'i rang bzhin yang la lar 'jug pa dang / ldog pa rtogs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: mi snang ba de'i rang bzhin yang la lar 'jug pa dang / ldog pa rtogs pa ma yin te /
translated: But the nonappearance of that nature in some place is not the understanding of its engagement or cessation.

original: rgyud gzhan la yod pa'i rnam par rtog pa'i khyad par bzhin no //
analyzed: rgyud gzhan la yod pa'i rnam par rtog pa'i khyad par bzhin no //
translated: It is like the specific conceptions that exist in other continua.

original: bdag 'ga' zhig la ma mthong ba de yang /
analyzed: bdag 'ga' zhig la ma mthong ba de yang /
translated: Moreover, the nonseeing of some self in one place

original: gzhan la lar mthong med ngo bo can du 'gyur ba /
analyzed: gzhan la lar mthong med ngo bo can du 'gyur ba /
translated: would be the nature of its nonseeing in another place.

original: bum pa sogs la bdag med ces bya ba de nyid gang las yin te /
analyzed: bum pa sogs la bdag med ces bya ba de nyid gang las yin te /
translated: What is the basis for saying that a pot and so on is selfless?

original: ma yin pa nyid do //
analyzed: ma yin pa nyid do //
translated: It is not so!

original: de ltar med pa mi shes pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: de ltar med pa mi shes pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: If one does not know that it does not exist,

original: ldog pa shes pa med pa'i ldog pa'i khyab pa gang las yin /
analyzed: ldog pa shes pa med pa'i ldog pa'i khyab pa gang las yin /
translated: how could one know that the absence of the pot pervades the absence of the pot?

original: ldog pa ste /
analyzed: ldog pa ste /
translated: The absence of the pot is the absence of the pot.

original: med pa mi shes pa gang yin pa de ni ldog pa mi shes pa bdag nyid ldog pa'i srog la sogs pa gang yin pa de med pas khyab pa gang las yin te /
analyzed: med pa mi shes pa gang yin pa de ni ldog pa mi shes pa bdag nyid ldog pa'i srog la sogs pa gang yin pa de med pas khyab pa gang las yin te /
translated: If one does not know that it does not exist, how could one know that the absence of the pot pervades the absence of the pot?

original: ma yin pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: ma yin pa nyid yin no //
translated: It is not so!

original: gzhan yang / srog sogs la lar mthong ba yin //
analyzed: gzhan yang / srog sogs la lar mthong ba yin //
translated: Moreover, life and so on are seen in some places.

original: la lar mthong ba nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: la lar mthong ba nyid kyi phyir /
translated: Because they are seen in some places,

original: gson po'i lus la yod nyid dang / bum pa la sogs pa la med pa nyid rtogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gson po'i lus la yod nyid dang / bum pa la sogs pa la med pa nyid rtogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: one would understand that they exist in the body of the living being and do not exist in a pot and so on.

original: gal te de ltar srog la sogs pa bzhin du bdag mthong ba de'i tshe de'i gson po'i lus la yod nyid dang / bum pa la sogs pa la med nyid rtogs par 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: gal te de ltar srog la sogs pa bzhin du bdag mthong ba de'i tshe de'i gson po'i lus la yod nyid dang / bum pa la sogs pa la med nyid rtogs par 'gyur gyi /
translated: If the self were seen in the same way that life and so on are seen, one would understand that it exists in the body of the living being and does not exist in a pot and so on.

original: gzhan du ni ma yin no //
analyzed: gzhan du ni ma yin no //
translated: But it is not so in other cases.

original: gal te gson po'i lus bdag dang bcas pa ma yin pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: gal te gson po'i lus bdag dang bcas pa ma yin pa de'i tshe /
translated: If the living body is not associated with a self,

original: 'di'i srog la sogs pa dang bral bar thal bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'di'i srog la sogs pa dang bral bar thal bar 'gyur te /
translated: then it follows that it is devoid of life and so on.

original: bdag med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: bdag med pa'i phyir /
translated: Because it would be without a self,🔽like a pot and so on.

original: bum pa la sogs pa bzhin no zhes bya ba'i thal ba brjod pa gang yin pa de yang ma nges pa yin te /
analyzed: bum pa la sogs pa bzhin no zhes bya ba'i thal ba brjod pa gang yin pa de yang ma nges pa yin te /
translated: The reductio argument that is stated is inconclusive,

original: rgyu ma yin pa bkag pas srog la sogs pa gsal ba mi rung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rgyu ma yin pa bkag pas srog la sogs pa gsal ba mi rung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because the absence of a cause is not established, since it is not possible to clarify life and so on.

original: de ltar na blo dang lus phul du byung ba'i rtsol ba la sogs pa /
analyzed: de ltar na blo dang lus phul du byung ba'i rtsol ba la sogs pa /
translated: Thus, the effort of the body and the mind, and so on,

original: gtan tshigs gang dag med pa yis //
analyzed: gtan tshigs gang dag med pa yis //
translated: are not the reasons

original: bum pa la srog la sogs pa snang mi 'gyur ro //🔽gal te lus la'ang de srog la sogs pa'i gtan tshigs kyis mthong bar nus pa can gyi blo la sogs pa mi 'gyur ba de'i tshe rang gi rgyu ldog pa'i phyir /
analyzed: bum pa la srog la sogs pa snang mi 'gyur ro // gal te lus la'ang de srog la sogs pa'i gtan tshigs kyis mthong bar nus pa can gyi blo la sogs pa mi 'gyur ba de'i tshe rang gi rgyu ldog pa'i phyir /
translated: by which life and so on would appear in a pot.

original: lus la srog la sogs pa med pa rigs pa yin /
analyzed: lus la srog la sogs pa med pa rigs pa yin /
translated: If the body also is not seen to have the capacity to have a mind and so on, by the reason of life and so on, then it is reasonable that the body is devoid of life and so on, because its cause is absent.

original: srid pa ma yin /
analyzed: srid pa ma yin /
translated: It is not possible.

original: srid pa yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: srid pa yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: Existence is the meaning of the term.

original: rgyu nyid du ma grub pa'i bdag nyid ldog pas kyang ma yin te /🔽@311b 'di ltar gang zhig gang la rag las par 'gyur pa de khyab par byed pa ldog pa na ldog pa rjes su dpag par bya ba yin pa'am /
analyzed: rgyu nyid du ma grub pa'i bdag nyid ldog pas kyang ma yin te / @311b 'di ltar gang zhig gang la rag las par 'gyur pa de khyab par byed pa ldog pa na ldog pa rjes su dpag par bya ba yin pa'am /
translated: Nor is it the case that the self is not established as a cause, because it is excluded.🔽Thus, when the pervasion is excluded, it is inferred that the excluded is excluded.

original: rag las pa de yod pas khyab par byed pa de yod pa rjes su dpag par bya ba yin gyi /
analyzed: rag las pa de yod pas khyab par byed pa de yod pa rjes su dpag par bya ba yin gyi /
translated: Or, when the existence of the pervaded is inferred, it is inferred that the existence of the pervader exists.

original: gzhan la rag las pa ma yin pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: gzhan la rag las pa ma yin pa ni ma yin no //
translated: But it is not the case that it is not dependent on another.

original: gang 'ga' zhig chos mthud pa nyid mthong ba'i phyir 'ga' zhig yod pa dang med pa rjes su dpog par byed do //
analyzed: gang 'ga' zhig chos mthud pa nyid mthong ba'i phyir 'ga' zhig yod pa dang med pa rjes su dpog par byed do //
