translated: Because it is seen that some things are similar to some things, it is inferred that some things exist or do not exist.

original: cung zad tsam du chos mthun phyir //
analyzed: cung zad tsam du chos mthun phyir //
translated: Because of mere similarity.

original: ji skad du bshad pa'i rag las pa'i mtshan nyid med par /
analyzed: ji skad du bshad pa'i rag las pa'i mtshan nyid med par /
translated: Without the characteristic of dependence, as explained,

original: gal te bdag med pa nyid la sogs pa mi dmigs pa tsam gyis gson po'i lus la srog la sogs pa yod pa'i phyir /
analyzed: gal te bdag med pa nyid la sogs pa mi dmigs pa tsam gyis gson po'i lus la srog la sogs pa yod pa'i phyir /
translated: if the nonexistence of the self and so on were merely not observed, then life and so on would exist in the living body.

original: de nyid du rtogs par 'gyur te /
analyzed: de nyid du rtogs par 'gyur te /
translated: Therefore, it would be understood in that way.

original: bdag gi dngos po rjes su dpog pa de'i tshe /🔽gzhal bya nyid phyir /
analyzed: bdag gi dngos po rjes su dpog pa de'i tshe / gzhal bya nyid phyir /
translated: When you infer the existence of the self,🔽then, because of being an object of knowledge,

original: gtan tshigs kyi phyir bum sogs rnams /
analyzed: gtan tshigs kyi phyir bum sogs rnams /
translated: like pots and so on,

original: bdag dang bcas par te /
analyzed: bdag dang bcas par te /
translated: the self would be possessed,

original: gson po'i lus bzhin du /
analyzed: gson po'i lus bzhin du /
translated: like the living body,

original: bdag bcas cis mi dpog /
analyzed: bdag bcas cis mi dpog /
translated: so why not infer the existence of the self?

original: de ltar ni 'gyur mod kyi /
analyzed: de ltar ni 'gyur mod kyi /
translated: This is how it would be,

original: gal te mi 'dod na ste /
analyzed: gal te mi 'dod na ste /
translated: but if you do not accept this,

original: bum pa la sogs pa grub pa'i mtha' la bdag dang bcas par mi 'dod pa de bas na bsgrub par bya ba ma yin no //
analyzed: bum pa la sogs pa grub pa'i mtha' la bdag dang bcas par mi 'dod pa de bas na bsgrub par bya ba ma yin no //
translated: then pots and so on would not be accepted in your philosophical system as possessing a self, and therefore they would not be established.

original: de ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de ni ma yin te /
translated: This is not so,

original: 'di ltar tshad ma ni /
analyzed: 'di ltar tshad ma ni /
translated: because in this way, valid cognition

original: 'dod pa thams cad kyi rgyu yin /
analyzed: 'dod pa thams cad kyi rgyu yin /
translated: is the cause of all assertions.

original: de bas na tshad ma nyid kyis grub pa gang yin pa de 'dod par bya ba yin no //
analyzed: de bas na tshad ma nyid kyis grub pa gang yin pa de 'dod par bya ba yin no //
translated: Therefore, whatever is established by valid cognition must be accepted.

original: de bas na khyod kyi 'dod pas gzhal bya nyid la sogs pa yang /
analyzed: de bas na khyod kyi 'dod pas gzhal bya nyid la sogs pa yang /
translated: Therefore, because of your assertion that the object of knowledge and so on

original: bum pa la sogs pa la bdag nye bar 'jog pa yin pa de ltar na bdag nyid ci'i phyir de dag bdag dang bcas par mi 'dod /
analyzed: bum pa la sogs pa la bdag nye bar 'jog pa yin pa de ltar na bdag nyid ci'i phyir de dag bdag dang bcas par mi 'dod /
translated: are posited in relation to pots and so on, why do you not accept that they possess a self?

original: de ltar na tshad ma de med par ni dngos po dang / dngos med rnam gzhag ste /
analyzed: de ltar na tshad ma de med par ni dngos po dang / dngos med rnam gzhag ste /
translated: Thus, without that valid cognition, how could one posit the existence of things and non-things,

original: 'di yod pa yin zhing 'di med pa yin no zhes rnam par 'jog par byed pa gang gis nus /
analyzed: 'di yod pa yin zhing 'di med pa yin no zhes rnam par 'jog par byed pa gang gis nus /
translated: saying, “This exists, and this does not exist”?

original: de ltar tshad mas bstan pa nyid gdon mi za bar 'dod par bya ba yin no //
analyzed: de ltar tshad mas bstan pa nyid gdon mi za bar 'dod par bya ba yin no //
translated: Therefore, one should certainly accept that things are taught by valid cognition.

original: gal te khyed cag kyang ci'i phyir de ltar mi 'dzin ce na /
analyzed: gal te khyed cag kyang ci'i phyir de ltar mi 'dzin ce na /
translated: If you ask, “Why don’t you accept that?”

original: 'di ltar kho bo cag gi de 'dra ba'i gtan tshigs go bar byed pa nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: 'di ltar kho bo cag gi de 'dra ba'i gtan tshigs go bar byed pa nyid ma yin no //
translated: We say, “Because our reason is not established.”

original: go bar byed pa nyid gang yin pa de ni bstan zin te //
analyzed: go bar byed pa nyid gang yin pa de ni bstan zin te //
translated: We have already shown that it is not established.

original: gal te ston par 'gyur na gzung bar bya ba nyid yin no //
analyzed: gal te ston par 'gyur na gzung bar bya ba nyid yin no //
translated: If it were established, it would be apprehended.

original: dran dang 'dod zhes bya ba la sogs pas srog la sogs pa'i gtan tshigs gang yin pa bdag nyid ldog pa na ldog par byed pa de @312a * //
analyzed: dran dang 'dod zhes bya ba la sogs pas srog la sogs pa'i gtan tshigs gang yin pa bdag nyid ldog pa na ldog par byed pa de @312a * //
translated: The words “memory, desire, and so on” show that the reason, such as life-force, is refuted when the self is refuted.

original: ston par byed do //
analyzed: ston par byed do //
translated: We have already shown that.

original: de la 'di dran pa la sogs pa ci rigs par rgyu nyid yin par rtogs par bya'o //🔽dper na 'ga' zhig mthong ba ma bsnams pa na /🔽gzhan lce'i dbang po 'gyur ba 'gram chu ldang ba'i dran pa dang 'dod pa la sogs pa lta bu dang / lus kyi nus pa dang blo dang rtsol ba la sogs pa ni dbugs dbyung ba dang / rngub pa dang / mig 'byed pa dang /
analyzed: de la 'di dran pa la sogs pa ci rigs par rgyu nyid yin par rtogs par bya'o // dper na 'ga' zhig mthong ba ma bsnams pa na / gzhan lce'i dbang po 'gyur ba 'gram chu ldang ba'i dran pa dang 'dod pa la sogs pa lta bu dang / lus kyi nus pa dang blo dang rtsol ba la sogs pa ni dbugs dbyung ba dang / rngub pa dang / mig 'byed pa dang /
translated: The cause of memory, etc., should be understood in the same way.🔽For example, when someone sees something, he remembers and desires the taste of something else, such as molasses, which causes his mouth to water.

original: 'dzums pa'i rgyu nyid yin pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: 'dzums pa'i rgyu nyid yin pa lta bu'o //
translated: The capacity of the body, the mind, and the effort are the cause of the exhalation and inhalation of breath, the opening and closing of the eyes, etc.

original: de bzhin gzhan dag la yang rtogs par bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gzhan dag la yang rtogs par bya'o //
translated: The cause of memory, desire, etc., should be understood in the same way.

original: de dag 'byung ba dran pa dang 'dod pa la sogs pa de yang ci rigs pa nyid du yul dbang blo las 'byung /
analyzed: de dag 'byung ba dran pa dang 'dod pa la sogs pa de yang ci rigs pa nyid du yul dbang blo las 'byung /
translated: Memory, desire, etc., arise from the object, the sense faculty, and the mind, as appropriate.

original: nyams su myong dang bdag nyid ji lta ba bzhin gyi rkyen las dran pa dang / de bzhin du 'dod pa dang rtsol ba dag yin no //
analyzed: nyams su myong dang bdag nyid ji lta ba bzhin gyi rkyen las dran pa dang / de bzhin du 'dod pa dang rtsol ba dag yin no //
translated: Memory arises from the experience of the object, and desire and effort arise from the mind.

original: de dag ste /
analyzed: de dag ste /
translated: These,

original: yul dang // dbang po dang blo dag kyang /
analyzed: yul dang // dbang po dang blo dag kyang /
translated: the object, the sense faculty, and the mind,🔽arise from the self.

original: rang rigs las byung dang / rigs mthun pa'i nye bar len pa'i rgyu las skye ba yin no //
analyzed: rang rigs las byung dang / rigs mthun pa'i nye bar len pa'i rgyu las skye ba yin no //
translated: It arises from a cause that is of the same type as itself, that is, from a homogeneous immediately preceding condition.

original: de yang nye bar len pa'i rkyen 'ba' zhig las skye ba ma yin gyi /
analyzed: de yang nye bar len pa'i rkyen 'ba' zhig las skye ba ma yin gyi /
translated: Moreover, it does not arise from the condition of the appropriating aggregates alone.

original: 'on kyang phan rkyen la ltos pa yin /
analyzed: 'on kyang phan rkyen la ltos pa yin /
translated: It also depends on contributory conditions.

original: bdag nyid ji lta ba bzhin gyi lhan cig byed pa'i rkyen la ltos nas 'jug pa can yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: bdag nyid ji lta ba bzhin gyi lhan cig byed pa'i rkyen la ltos nas 'jug pa can yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: It operates in dependence on the contributory conditions that are appropriate to itself.

original: blo drug po dag gi nang nas mi gal sogs pa'i blo'i 'bras bu ldog pa las mig la sogs pa'i nus pa mthong ba dang / yul gzhan la g-yengs pa dang thogs pa las rnam par shes pa phyi ma mi skye ba dang / rnam par g-yengs pa mthong ba'i phyir yid la byed pa blo thams cad la nus pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: blo drug po dag gi nang nas mi gal sogs pa'i blo'i 'bras bu ldog pa las mig la sogs pa'i nus pa mthong ba dang / yul gzhan la g-yengs pa dang thogs pa las rnam par shes pa phyi ma mi skye ba dang / rnam par g-yengs pa mthong ba'i phyir yid la byed pa blo thams cad la nus pa nyid yin no //
translated: Among the six kinds of awareness, the result of the awareness of non-attention, etc., is seen in the potential of the eye, etc., in the absence of the reversal of the potential of the eye, etc., in the non-arising of subsequent consciousness due to distraction or obstruction with regard to an object, and in the distraction that is seen. Therefore, attention is the potential of all awarenesses.

original: dbugs dbyung ba dang / rngub pa dang / dbang po la sogs pa dag gi sngar gyi skal pa mnyam pa'i gnas skabs kyi khyad par nye bar len pa dang / blo rkyen yin te de dag dang ba dang / rnyog pa dag las dbang po rnams la phan 'dogs pa dang gnod pa mthong ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dbugs dbyung ba dang / rngub pa dang / dbang po la sogs pa dag gi sngar gyi skal pa mnyam pa'i gnas skabs kyi khyad par nye bar len pa dang / blo rkyen yin te de dag dang ba dang / rnyog pa dag las dbang po rnams la phan 'dogs pa dang gnod pa mthong ba'i phyir ro //
translated: The conditions for the arising of the life-faculties, etc., are the prior state of the life-faculties, etc., and the mind, because the faculties are seen to be benefited or harmed by the clarity or turbidity of the mind.

original: srog la sogs pa'i 'jug pa dang / ldog pa ni de dag dang 'brel pa can yin no //🔽de ltar na de tsam la ste /
analyzed: srog la sogs pa'i 'jug pa dang / ldog pa ni de dag dang 'brel pa can yin no // de ltar na de tsam la ste /
translated: The operation and cessation of the life-faculties, etc., are related to those.

original: rgyu tshogs pa la /
analyzed: rgyu tshogs pa la /
translated: Thus, the mere collection of causes,

original: bdag gi dngos po 'di /
analyzed: bdag gi dngos po 'di /
translated: the state of being a self,

original: skye mched drug gi mtshan nyid can //
analyzed: skye mched drug gi mtshan nyid can //
translated: the characteristics of the six sense bases,

original: rjes 'gro ldog pa dag la brten //
analyzed: rjes 'gro ldog pa dag la brten //
translated: and the arising and cessation of the life-faculties, etc.,🔽are the conditions for the arising of the mind.

original: gal te yang ji lta ba bzhin du nus pa 'dir bdag la sogs pa gzhan yang rgyu nyid du @312b rtogs par 'gyur ba de'i tshe /
analyzed: gal te yang ji lta ba bzhin du nus pa 'dir bdag la sogs pa gzhan yang rgyu nyid du @312b rtogs par 'gyur ba de'i tshe /
translated: If you think that other things, such as a self, also have the ability to be causes in this way,

original: gzhan du rtogs na thug pa med //
analyzed: gzhan du rtogs na thug pa med //
translated: then there would be an infinite regress.

original: gzhan dang gzhan yang brtag par bya ba yin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gzhan dang gzhan yang brtag par bya ba yin par 'gyur ro //
translated: If you think that other things are causes, then other things would have to be posited as causes of those, and so on.

original: de bas na nus pa mthong ba med pa can gyi bdag ldog pa na srog la sogs pa ldog pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de bas na nus pa mthong ba med pa can gyi bdag ldog pa na srog la sogs pa ldog pa ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, when the self is refuted, which is not seen to have the capacity, life force, etc. are not refuted.🔽Moreover,

original: gzhan yang / mnyan bya nyid dang srog la sogs //
analyzed: gzhan yang / mnyan bya nyid dang srog la sogs //
translated: The object of hearing, life force, etc.

original: de mtshungs 'khrul pa nyid phyir ro //
analyzed: de mtshungs 'khrul pa nyid phyir ro //
translated: Are similar to that, because they are erroneous.

original: de ltar ni 'gyur mod kyi /
analyzed: de ltar ni 'gyur mod kyi /
translated: This is so, but

original: ma yin de la 'khrul med phyir //
analyzed: ma yin de la 'khrul med phyir //
translated: That is not so, because there is no error in that.

original: gal te ldog pa yin na'ang //
analyzed: gal te ldog pa yin na'ang //
translated: If it is a negation,

original: srog la sogs pa mi mthun pa'i phyogs nyid las ldog par 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: srog la sogs pa mi mthun pa'i phyogs nyid las ldog par 'gyur gyi /
translated: Life force, etc. are negated only in relation to what is discordant.

original: mthun pa'i phyogs las ldog pa ni ma yin te /🔽med pa la ldog pa mi rung ba'i phyir /
analyzed: mthun pa'i phyogs las ldog pa ni ma yin te / med pa la ldog pa mi rung ba'i phyir /
translated: They are not negated in relation to what is concordant,🔽Because it is not possible to negate what does not exist.

original: 'di ni ldog pa 'khrul pa med pa can nyid yin no //
analyzed: 'di ni ldog pa 'khrul pa med pa can nyid yin no //
translated: This is because negation is not erroneous.

original: de bzhin du mnyan par bya ba nyid ni ma yin no zhe na /🔽ji ltar te /
analyzed: de bzhin du mnyan par bya ba nyid ni ma yin no zhe na / ji ltar te /
translated: In the same way, the object of hearing is not so.🔽How?

original: ji ltar na /
analyzed: ji ltar na /
translated: How?

original: re zhig mnyan par bya ba nyid kyi ldog pa 'khrul pa can yin no zhes dris pa na /🔽bsgrub min de las de'i /
analyzed: re zhig mnyan par bya ba nyid kyi ldog pa 'khrul pa can yin no zhes dris pa na / bsgrub min de las de'i /
translated: First, when asked, “Is the negation of the object of hearing erroneous?”

original: ldog med do zhes smra ba ste /
analyzed: ldog med do zhes smra ba ste /
translated: It is replied, “It is not established, because there is no negation of that.”

original: mi mthun pa'i phyogs nyid las mnyan par bya ba ldog pa nyid ma yin gyi /
analyzed: mi mthun pa'i phyogs nyid las mnyan par bya ba ldog pa nyid ma yin gyi /
translated: It is not that the quality of being heard is absent from the discordant side alone.

original: 'on kyang mthun pa'i phyogs nyid las kyang mnyan par bya ba nyid ldog pa yin par smra bas /
analyzed: 'on kyang mthun pa'i phyogs nyid las kyang mnyan par bya ba nyid ldog pa yin par smra bas /
translated: But it is said that the quality of being heard is absent from the concordant side as well.

original: don gyis de mnyan par bya ba nyid bsgrub bya ste /
analyzed: don gyis de mnyan par bya ba nyid bsgrub bya ste /
translated: So the meaning is that the quality of being heard is the probandum.

original: mthun pa'i phyogs la rjes su 'jug pa med brjod de mthun pa'i phyogs la srog la sogs pa rjes su 'gro ba nyid yod dam zhes dri ba la /
analyzed: mthun pa'i phyogs la rjes su 'jug pa med brjod de mthun pa'i phyogs la srog la sogs pa rjes su 'gro ba nyid yod dam zhes dri ba la /
translated: When asked, “Is the presence of life, etc. on the concordant side?”

original: gdon mi za bar ma yin no zhes brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: gdon mi za bar ma yin no zhes brjod par bya'o //
translated: one must reply, “Undoubtedly not.”

original: de ltar na mthun pa'i phyogs la rjes su 'jug pa /🔽de gzhan la yang de mtshungs pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: de ltar na mthun pa'i phyogs la rjes su 'jug pa / de gzhan la yang de mtshungs pa ma yin nam /
translated: So the presence of the quality of being heard on the concordant side

original: srog la sogs pa la'o //
analyzed: srog la sogs pa la'o //
translated: is not the same as the presence of life, etc. on the discordant side.🔽Life, etc. are the same as the quality of being heard.

original: de ltar srog la sogs pa mnyan par bya ba dang mtshungs pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: de ltar srog la sogs pa mnyan par bya ba dang mtshungs pa nyid yin no //
translated: So life, etc. are the same as the quality of being heard.

original: ldog pa gzhan ma yin zhing rjes su 'gro ba med pa yang gzhan ma yin no //
analyzed: ldog pa gzhan ma yin zhing rjes su 'gro ba med pa yang gzhan ma yin no //
translated: Absence of the quality of being heard is not one thing, and the absence of life, etc. is not another.🔽Absence of the quality of being heard is not one thing,

original: ldog pa med pa'ang gzhan ma yin zhing /
analyzed: ldog pa med pa'ang gzhan ma yin zhing /
translated: and the absence of life, etc. is not another.

original: rjes su 'gro ba yang gzhan ma yin no //
analyzed: rjes su 'gro ba yang gzhan ma yin no //
translated: and the pervasion is not different.

original: gzhan yang srog la sogs pa /
analyzed: gzhan yang srog la sogs pa /
translated: Moreover, the thesis of life-force, etc.

original: bsgrub bya med nyid las /🔽mi mthun pa'i phyogs nyid las so rnam gcod de /
analyzed: bsgrub bya med nyid las / mi mthun pa'i phyogs nyid las so rnam gcod de /
translated: is not established because of the absence of the probandum.🔽The exclusion is from the discordant side.

original: ldog pa gang yin pa /
analyzed: ldog pa gang yin pa /
translated: That which is the counter-correlate

original: de ltar brjod pa na /
analyzed: de ltar brjod pa na /
translated: is stated in that way.

original: de ltar don gyis go ba yis //
analyzed: de ltar don gyis go ba yis //
translated: By implication, the meaning is understood.

original: bsgrub par bya ba la mthun pa'i phyogs la yod brjod bya ste /
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba la mthun pa'i phyogs la yod brjod bya ste /
translated: The probandum is stated to exist in the similar instance.

original: rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dag phan tshun spangs te gnas pa'i mtshan nyid can yin pa'i phyir ro//
analyzed: rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dag phan tshun spangs te gnas pa'i mtshan nyid can yin pa'i phyir ro//
translated: Because pervasion and counter-correlate have the characteristic of being mutually exclusive.

original: @313a * // de'i phyir gcig gis gnyis bstan par bya ste /
analyzed: @313a * // de'i phyir gcig gis gnyis bstan par bya ste /
translated: Therefore, one should teach both.

original: yang don gyis go bas gang yang rung bas gnyig rab tu bstan pa'i phyir ro zhes bya bas bshad zin to //
analyzed: yang don gyis go bas gang yang rung bas gnyig rab tu bstan pa'i phyir ro zhes bya bas bshad zin to //
translated: Again, by implication, the meaning is understood. Because either one teaches both. This has already been explained.

original: de ltar rjes su 'gro ba med pa la srog la sogs pa ldog pa ma nges pa can yin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar rjes su 'gro ba med pa la srog la sogs pa ldog pa ma nges pa can yin par 'gyur ro //
translated: Thus, in the absence of pervasion, the counter-correlate of life-force, etc. would be uncertain.

original: gang gi phyir ldog pa nges pa ni rjes su 'gro ba 'phen pa nyid yin par 'gyur ba /
analyzed: gang gi phyir ldog pa nges pa ni rjes su 'gro ba 'phen pa nyid yin par 'gyur ba /
translated: Because the certainty of the counter-correlate would itself imply the pervasion.

original: de'i phyir de 'dra'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs las ldog pa 'khrul pa med pa gtan tshigs rjes 'gro med la grub med dang / gzhan yang srog la sogs pa mthun pa'i phyogs la med pa ma yin no zhes bkag pa 'gog par byed pa ni /
analyzed: de'i phyir de 'dra'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs las ldog pa 'khrul pa med pa gtan tshigs rjes 'gro med la grub med dang / gzhan yang srog la sogs pa mthun pa'i phyogs la med pa ma yin no zhes bkag pa 'gog par byed pa ni /
translated: Therefore, the opposite of such a discordant factor is the non-erroneous, which is not established in the absence of the forward pervasion, and moreover, life, etc. are not non-existent in the similar instances.

original: gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: gang yin pa de ni /
translated: What is it that refutes the refutation?

original: bsgrub pa las gzhan ci 'dra zhig /'gyur bar 'dod /
analyzed: bsgrub pa las gzhan ci 'dra zhig /'gyur bar 'dod /
translated: What could it be that is other than the probandum?

original: bsgrub pa ni med pa 'gog pa'i mtshan nyid yin pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: bsgrub pa ni med pa 'gog pa'i mtshan nyid yin pa'i phyir te /
translated: Because the probandum is the definition of the negation of non-existence,

original: de sgrub par byed pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: de sgrub par byed pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: because it is the very establishment of that.

original: de bas na mthun pa'i phyogs nyid la yod pa nyid yin pa de ltar ldog pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de bas na mthun pa'i phyogs nyid la yod pa nyid yin pa de ltar ldog pa ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is not the case that existence in just the similar instances is the opposite.

original: 'di ltar phan tshun spangs te gnas pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi chos gnyis po la chos gcig gi yul ma yin pa de gzhan gyi yul yin no //
analyzed: 'di ltar phan tshun spangs te gnas pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi chos gnyis po la chos gcig gi yul ma yin pa de gzhan gyi yul yin no //
translated: Thus, the two phenomena that are characterized by mutually exclusive presence are such that the object of one is the object of the other.

original: gal te rtag pa dang mi rtag pa dag gi nang nas gcig gi yul ma yin pa med pa gzhan gyi yul ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: gal te rtag pa dang mi rtag pa dag gi nang nas gcig gi yul ma yin pa med pa gzhan gyi yul ma yin no zhe na /
translated: If you say that the object of neither is not the object of either an existent or a nonexistent,

original: ma yin te de dag gi dngos po nyid kyi de nyid mtshan nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ma yin te de dag gi dngos po nyid kyi de nyid mtshan nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: that is not so, because the nature of those things is the characteristic of that.

original: dngos po'i chos nyid yin pa'i phyir 'di dag med pa la 'jug pa ma yin no //
analyzed: dngos po'i chos nyid yin pa'i phyir 'di dag med pa la 'jug pa ma yin no //
translated: Because it is the nature of things, it does not engage with nonexistence.

original: de la yang rnam par gcod pa tsam brjod par 'dod pa yod na dgag pa la de'i mtshan nyid yod pa yin no //
analyzed: de la yang rnam par gcod pa tsam brjod par 'dod pa yod na dgag pa la de'i mtshan nyid yod pa yin no //
translated: And if you assert that it is the mere exclusion of that, then the characteristic of negation exists.

original: gzhan yang bsgrub bya med las te //
analyzed: gzhan yang bsgrub bya med las te //
translated: Moreover, it is from the absence of the probandum.

original: mthun pa'i phyogs med pa las srog la sogs pa ldog pa yin no //
analyzed: mthun pa'i phyogs med pa las srog la sogs pa ldog pa yin no //
translated: Life force and so on are negated in the absence of the concordant class.

original: de'i phyir bsgrub bya med pa las /
analyzed: de'i phyir bsgrub bya med pa las /
translated: Therefore, it is from the absence of the probandum.

original: bsgrub par bya ba'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs nyid la srog la sogs pa de med pa ste /🔽yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs nyid la srog la sogs pa de med pa ste / yod pa ma yin no //
translated: Life force and so on do not exist in the discordant class, which is the absence of the probandum.

original: mthun pa'i phyogs la yang med pa yin no //🔽gal te de ltar yin pa de'i tshe //
analyzed: mthun pa'i phyogs la yang med pa yin no // gal te de ltar yin pa de'i tshe //
translated: They also do not exist in the concordant class.🔽If that is so,

original: med las te /
analyzed: med las te /
translated: then it is from the absence of the probandum.

original: mthun pa'i phyogs las ldog pa'i ldog pa de nyid ci phyir 'dod /
analyzed: mthun pa'i phyogs las ldog pa'i ldog pa de nyid ci phyir 'dod /
translated: Why do you assert that the reversal of the compatible is the logical reason?

original: med pa la gtan tshigs ldog pa yod pa ma yin no zhes smra bas ldog pa'i ldog par brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: med pa la gtan tshigs ldog pa yod pa ma yin no zhes smra bas ldog pa'i ldog par brjod pa yin no //
translated: You say that a non-thing does not have a logical reason that is a reversal. Thus, you state that the reversal is a reversal.

original: de yang med pa la khyed kyi gzhung gis dgag pa'i ngo bo nyid yin par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de yang med pa la khyed kyi gzhung gis dgag pa'i ngo bo nyid yin par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Moreover, that which is a non-thing is not the nature of a negation according to your texts.

original: de ji ltar na yod pa yin zhes tshig @313b 'gal bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: de ji ltar na yod pa yin zhes tshig @313b 'gal bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: How could that be a thing? The words are contradictory. This is the meaning.

original: gzhan yang gtan tshigs ldog pa med pa gang yin pa de bsgrub pa yin no //
analyzed: gzhan yang gtan tshigs ldog pa med pa gang yin pa de bsgrub pa yin no //
translated: Moreover, the logical reason that is not a reversal is the proof.

original: bsgrub pa de yang dngos po yod pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: bsgrub pa de yang dngos po yod pa nyid yin no //
translated: That proof is the existence of a thing.

original: de yang med na yang yod pa ma yin /
analyzed: de yang med na yang yod pa ma yin /
translated: If that does not exist, it is not a thing.

original: med du zin kyang yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: med du zin kyang yod pa ma yin no //
translated: Even if it does not exist, it is not a thing.

original: dngos po med pa 'dir rigs pas thob pa gang yin pa de yang yod min zhes de skad smra ba'i mthong ba blun pos sbyar ba yin /
analyzed: dngos po med pa 'dir rigs pas thob pa gang yin pa de yang yod min zhes de skad smra ba'i mthong ba blun pos sbyar ba yin /
translated: The wise one who sees that this non-thing is not obtained through reasoning says, “That also does not exist.” This is the application of the foolish one’s view.

original: de ltar na dngos por gyur pa'i gtan tshigs med pa la med pa smra bas gtan tshigs de de la yod par bstan pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar na dngos por gyur pa'i gtan tshigs med pa la med pa smra bas gtan tshigs de de la yod par bstan pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
translated: Thus, the proponent of nonexistence would be teaching that the reason, which is a non-existent, exists in the dissimilar class.

original: de ltar med pa la shin tu 'gal ba'i gtan tshigs 'jug par byed pa dang mi 'jug pa 'gal ba yin no //
analyzed: de ltar med pa la shin tu 'gal ba'i gtan tshigs 'jug par byed pa dang mi 'jug pa 'gal ba yin no //
translated: Thus, it is contradictory to engage a reason that is utterly contradictory in the non-existent.

original: med pa la 'gal ba med du zin kyang ldog pa 'gog par byed pa blun po yin no zhes nges par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: med pa la 'gal ba med du zin kyang ldog pa 'gog par byed pa blun po yin no zhes nges par 'gyur ro //
translated: Even if there were no contradiction in the non-existent, it would be certain that the one who refutes the reversal is a fool.

original: de lta ma yin na ji ltar blo byang ba dag de skad du smra bar 'gyur /🔽gzhan yang / gal te de la med pa la //
analyzed: de lta ma yin na ji ltar blo byang ba dag de skad du smra bar 'gyur / gzhan yang / gal te de la med pa la //
translated: Otherwise, how could the intelligent speak in that way?

original: gtan tshigs ldog med mi 'dod na //
analyzed: gtan tshigs ldog med mi 'dod na //
translated: Moreover, if you do not assert that the reason does not occur in the non-existent,

original: gtan tshigs 'jug par 'dod dam ci //
analyzed: gtan tshigs 'jug par 'dod dam ci //
translated: then do you assert that the reason does occur?

original: zhes dris pa na gzhan gyis min te zhes smra'o //
analyzed: zhes dris pa na gzhan gyis min te zhes smra'o //
translated: If you say “no,”

original: 'o na gal te de lta yin na de yang ste /🔽gtan tshigs 'jug pa med pa nyid yin pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: 'o na gal te de lta yin na de yang ste /🔽gtan tshigs 'jug pa med pa nyid yin pa de'i tshe /
translated: then if that is so,🔽that reason does not occur.

original: gtan tshigs med pa la 'di 'gog pa yin par bdag nyid kyis dam bcas par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gtan tshigs med pa la 'di 'gog pa yin par bdag nyid kyis dam bcas par 'gyur ro //
translated: If there were no reason, then it would be your own assertion that this is a refutation.

original: de ltar na yang gzhan gyis de nyid /
analyzed: de ltar na yang gzhan gyis de nyid /
translated: In that case, others would say:

original: ldog pa yod pa ci'i phyir mi 'dod //
analyzed: ldog pa yod pa ci'i phyir mi 'dod //
translated: Why not accept that there is an existent that is an exclusion?

original: rigs pas grub pa bdag nyid 'dod pa yin pa de ltar na gzhan dag kyang de smra ba la rigs pa ma yin pa byed pa bsam par mi bya'o //
analyzed: rigs pas grub pa bdag nyid 'dod pa yin pa de ltar na gzhan dag kyang de smra ba la rigs pa ma yin pa byed pa bsam par mi bya'o //
translated: If you accept that it is established by reasoning, then you should not think that others are acting unreasonably when they state that.

original: de ltar rnam par gcad pa tsam las gzhan ma yin pa dngos po la reg ba med pa dgag pa'i brjod par 'dod pa yin no /
analyzed: de ltar rnam par gcad pa tsam las gzhan ma yin pa dngos po la reg ba med pa dgag pa'i brjod par 'dod pa yin no /
translated: Thus, it is the mere exclusion that is not different from the thing that is the object of negation, which is not contacted by the thing.

original: // / tshad ma rnam 'grel gyi 'grel pa /
analyzed: // / tshad ma rnam 'grel gyi 'grel pa /
translated: Commentary on Valid Knowledge

original: bam po bzhi bcu pa /🔽ci ste yang rnam par gcod pas /
analyzed: bam po bzhi bcu pa / ci ste yang rnam par gcod pas /
translated: Book 40

original: med pa la dngos po'i khyad par gtan tshigs 'gog par byed par 'gyur /
analyzed: med pa la dngos po'i khyad par gtan tshigs 'gog par byed par 'gyur /
translated: But if you refute the reason that is a particular thing that does not exist due to exclusion,

original: 'gog par byed pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: 'gog par byed pa de'i tshe /
translated: when you refute it,

original: zla bo'i dngos po grub pa gzhan nyid yin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: zla bo'i dngos po grub pa gzhan nyid yin par 'gyur ro //
translated: then it would be a different thing that is an object of negation that is established.

original: de ltar gtan tshigs mthun pa'i phyogs dang / mi mthun pa'i phyogs la med pa ston par 'dod pa yin te /
analyzed: de ltar gtan tshigs mthun pa'i phyogs dang / mi mthun pa'i phyogs la med pa ston par 'dod pa yin te /
translated: Thus, the reason is shown to be absent in the dissimilar class and not present in the similar class.

original: de'i tshe med par dgag pa brjod par 'dod pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //🔽ma yin par dgag pas bsgrub par bya ba las bzlog pa'i dngos @314a * //
analyzed: de'i tshe med par dgag pa brjod par 'dod pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro // ma yin par dgag pas bsgrub par bya ba las bzlog pa'i dngos @314a * //
translated: At that time, it is just the desire to express a negative negation.🔽It is not the case that the positive is touched by the positive,

original: la reg pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: la reg pa ni ma yin no //
translated: because the probandum is the opposite of the probandum.🔽If it were otherwise, then in order to show the distinction of the opponent, it would be necessary to teach the unwanted consequence.

original: de lta ma yin na rtag pa ni ma byas pa yin no zhes zla bo khyad par byed pa bstan par bya ba'i phyir mi 'dod pa ston par byed pa'i phyir skabs su bab pa'i sgrub par byed pa bsgrub par bya ba'i chos ldog na ldog par ma
analyzed: de lta ma yin na rtag pa ni ma byas pa yin no zhes zla bo khyad par byed pa bstan par bya ba'i phyir mi 'dod pa ston par byed pa'i phyir skabs su bab pa'i sgrub par byed pa bsgrub par bya ba'i chos ldog na ldog par ma
translated: Therefore, when the property of the probandum is negated in the context of the proof, the probative reason is not shown to be negated.

original: bstan pa de ltar na 'brel pa med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: bstan pa de ltar na 'brel pa med pa'i phyir /
translated: If it were otherwise, then because there would be no relation,

original: gtan tshigs go bar byed pa nyid du ma bstan par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gtan tshigs go bar byed pa nyid du ma bstan par 'gyur ro //
translated: the reason would not be shown to be a proof.

original: de bas na rnam par gcod pa tsam nyid 'dod pa dang 'gal ba med pa gang yin pa de nyid byed pa yin pa de ltar na kha na ma tho ba med pa yin no //
analyzed: de bas na rnam par gcod pa tsam nyid 'dod pa dang 'gal ba med pa gang yin pa de nyid byed pa yin pa de ltar na kha na ma tho ba med pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, when one is not in conflict with the mere exclusion of what is other, and when one is engaged in that, then one is free from fault.

original: gzhan yang bsgrub dang dgag pa ste /
analyzed: gzhan yang bsgrub dang dgag pa ste /
translated: Moreover, there is affirmation and negation,

original: rnam par gcod pa tsam gyi mtshan nyid do//
analyzed: rnam par gcod pa tsam gyi mtshan nyid do//
translated: which have the characteristic of mere exclusion.

original: ma rtogs par sgra las byung ba'i tha snyad gzhan yod min de yang /
analyzed: ma rtogs par sgra las byung ba'i tha snyad gzhan yod min de yang /
translated: There is no other verbal convention that arises from a word without an object.

original: bsgrub dang dgag pa ste mtshan nyid can sgra las byung ba'i tha snyad do //
analyzed: bsgrub dang dgag pa ste mtshan nyid can sgra las byung ba'i tha snyad do //
translated: That is, verbal convention arises from words that have the characteristic of affirmation and negation.

original: khyed kyi gzhung gis med la med //
analyzed: khyed kyi gzhung gis med la med //
translated: In your system, there is no nonexistence.

original: de ltar 'di la mi smra thob bsgrub dang dgag pa dag gis sgra'i 'jug pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ltar 'di la mi smra thob bsgrub dang dgag pa dag gis sgra'i 'jug pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Thus, you have not attained the state of being a proponent of nonexistence, because there is no engagement of words through affirmation and negation.

original: gzhan yang yod pa gang yin pa de dag dgag par nus pa ma yin te /
analyzed: gzhan yang yod pa gang yin pa de dag dgag par nus pa ma yin te /
translated: Moreover, what exists cannot be negated,

original: dper na ta la'i 'bras bu dang / skyu ru ra'i dngos po bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na ta la'i 'bras bu dang / skyu ru ra'i dngos po bzhin no //
translated: like the existence of a palm fruit and a myrobalan fruit.

original: yod pa rnams la dgag pa med na med pa rnams la 'gog par byed par 'gyur na /
analyzed: yod pa rnams la dgag pa med na med pa rnams la 'gog par byed par 'gyur na /
translated: If what exists is not negated, then what does not exist is negated.

original: de yang khyed kyi 'dod pas med la 'jug mi 'gyur /
analyzed: de yang khyed kyi 'dod pas med la 'jug mi 'gyur /
translated: Moreover, it is not the case that the non-existent is the object of negation, because it does not exist.

original: ma yin par dgag pa'i ngo bo ma yin pa dag kyang ngo //
analyzed: ma yin par dgag pa'i ngo bo ma yin pa dag kyang ngo //
translated: Nor is the non-existent the object of negation, because it is not the nature of an affirming negation.

original: de la yang dgag pa med na gang de'i yul du 'gyur /
analyzed: de la yang dgag pa med na gang de'i yul du 'gyur /
translated: If there is no negation, then what is its object?

original: de bas na mi rung ba'i phyir dgag pa nyid yod pa ma yin pa de ltar na /
analyzed: de bas na mi rung ba'i phyir dgag pa nyid yod pa ma yin pa de ltar na /
translated: Therefore, because it is not tenable, the negation itself does not exist.

original: rigs pa 'di yis 'gro ba la //
analyzed: rigs pa 'di yis 'gro ba la //
translated: By this reasoning,

original: dgag pa'i don yang med pa ste //
analyzed: dgag pa'i don yang med pa ste //
translated: the object of negation is also non-existent.

original: dgag pa'i don de 'jig par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dgag pa'i don de 'jig par 'gyur ro //
translated: The object of negation is destroyed.

original: gal te med pa la yul du 'gog pa na /
analyzed: gal te med pa la yul du 'gog pa na /
translated: If the non-existent is negated as an object,

original: dgag pa'i don bsnyon du med pa yin gyi /
analyzed: dgag pa'i don bsnyon du med pa yin gyi /
translated: the object of negation is undeniably non-existent.

original: rnam pa thams cad du ni ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad du ni ma yin no zhe na /
translated: But it is not non-existent in every way.

original: de ni de lta ma yin te /
analyzed: de ni de lta ma yin te /
translated: That is not so,

original: dgag pa rnam pa gnyi ga yang mi rung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dgag pa rnam pa gnyi ga yang mi rung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because both types of negation are untenable.

original: ji ltar yod pa ste /
analyzed: ji ltar yod pa ste /
translated: How is it existent?

original: rnam pa gang gis don yod pa de ltar ni mi dgag go //
analyzed: rnam pa gang gis don yod pa de ltar ni mi dgag go //
translated: In whatever way the object exists, it is not negated in that way.

original: ji ltar dngos po med pa khyed kyi gzhung gis /
analyzed: ji ltar dngos po med pa khyed kyi gzhung gis /
translated: How is it non-existent?

original: de ltar yang ni 'gog mi 'gyur //
analyzed: de ltar yang ni 'gog mi 'gyur //
translated: In that way, it is not negated by your system.

original: med pa 'gog par khas ma blangs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: med pa 'gog par khas ma blangs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because we do not accept that nonexistence is refuted.

original: gal te de ltar ni 'gyur mod kyi /
analyzed: gal te de ltar ni 'gyur mod kyi /
translated: If that is so,

original: yod pa la 'ga' zhig dang rnam pa 'ga' zhig gis bya ba dang byed pa po dang chos dang chos can gyi tha snyad kyi 'brel pa can du 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: yod pa la 'ga' zhig dang rnam pa 'ga' zhig gis bya ba dang byed pa po dang chos dang chos can gyi tha snyad kyi 'brel pa can du 'gyur gyi /
translated: then existence would be related to the conventions of action and agent and of property and possessor of property in some way or other,

original: ji ltar khyed kyi yang med pa la yang de'i rten can gyi tha snyad yin @314b zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar khyed kyi yang med pa la yang de'i rten can gyi tha snyad yin @314b zhe na /
translated: but how could it be that for you, nonexistence is the basis of those conventions?

original: kho bo cag la skyon de yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: kho bo cag la skyon de yod pa ma yin te /
translated: We do not have that fault.

original: 'di ltar khyed cag bzhin du kho bo cag ni phyi rol gyi rang gi mtshan nyid la brten nas bsgrub pa dang dgag pa'i tha snyad ston pa ma yin gyi /'on kyang blo la snang ba la yin te /
analyzed: 'di ltar khyed cag bzhin du kho bo cag ni phyi rol gyi rang gi mtshan nyid la brten nas bsgrub pa dang dgag pa'i tha snyad ston pa ma yin gyi /'on kyang blo la snang ba la yin te /
translated: Because we do not teach the conventions of affirmation and negation based on external objects that have their own characteristics, as you do, but rather we do so based on what appears to the mind.

original: phyi rol la bsgrub pa dang dgag pa reg par nus pa nyid ma yin pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: phyi rol la bsgrub pa dang dgag pa reg par nus pa nyid ma yin pa'i phyir te /
translated: Because external objects are not capable of being affirmed or negated.

original: de ltar ni mang du bshad zin to //
analyzed: de ltar ni mang du bshad zin to //
translated: This has been explained many times.

original: dngos dang dngos med rten can /
analyzed: dngos dang dngos med rten can /
translated: Existence and nonexistence are based on that.

original: phyi rol ming rten sgra'i don la dngos por zhen pa can gyi blo la snang ba de ni dngos po la brten pa'i dngos po med pa'i zhen pa can la snang ba ni med pa la brten pa'o //
analyzed: phyi rol ming rten sgra'i don la dngos por zhen pa can gyi blo la snang ba de ni dngos po la brten pa'i dngos po med pa'i zhen pa can la snang ba ni med pa la brten pa'o //
translated: The appearance to the mind of those who are attached to the meaning of the sound that is the basis of the external name is the appearance of non-entityness based on entityness.

original: de la brten nas blo la snang ba'i don to //
analyzed: de la brten nas blo la snang ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning that appears to the mind in dependence on that is the object.

original: 'dir bsgrub pa dang / dgag pa thams cad 'dod pa yin /
analyzed: 'dir bsgrub pa dang / dgag pa thams cad 'dod pa yin /
translated: Here, all affirmations and negations are accepted.

original: phyi rol gyi don la brten nas ma yin no //
analyzed: phyi rol gyi don la brten nas ma yin no //
translated: They are not based on external objects.

original: de de ltar na bsgrub pa dang dgag pa don dam pa ma yin na yang /
analyzed: de de ltar na bsgrub pa dang dgag pa don dam pa ma yin na yang /
translated: In that case, although affirmation and negation are not ultimate,

original: de 'dra med na yang /
analyzed: de 'dra med na yang /
translated: even though such do not exist,

original: bsgrub pa dang dgag pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi phyi rol gyi don de 'dra med na yang /
analyzed: bsgrub pa dang dgag pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi phyi rol gyi don de 'dra med na yang /
translated: even though external objects that are characterized by affirmation and negation do not exist in that way,

original: chos can de /
analyzed: chos can de /
translated: the subject

original: de dag dang ni 'brel par snang ba yin no //
analyzed: de dag dang ni 'brel par snang ba yin no //
translated: appears to be related to them.

original: de yang bsgrub pa dang dgag pa'i tha snyad ston par 'dod pa yin no //
analyzed: de yang bsgrub pa dang dgag pa'i tha snyad ston par 'dod pa yin no //
translated: Moreover, it is asserted that the conventions of affirmation and negation are taught.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /🔽sgra'i 'jug phyir na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na / sgra'i 'jug phyir na /
translated: Why is that?🔽Because of the engagement of sound.

original: sgra 'jug pa na der blo la snang ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sgra 'jug pa na der blo la snang ba'i phyir ro //
translated: When sound engages, it appears to the mind.

original: yod do zhe na dngos su de nyid la ltos pa med par 'dod pa'o //
analyzed: yod do zhe na dngos su de nyid la ltos pa med par 'dod pa'o //
translated: If you say that it does, then you are asserting that it is directly perceived without depending on that.

original: de ltar min na /
analyzed: de ltar min na /
translated: If it is not like that,

original: gal te blo la snang ba'i don gyi yul la bsgrub pa dang dgag pa mi 'dod pa de'i tshe /🔽dngos don rnams bsgrub par bya ba'am /🔽dgag par bya ba'i chos gang yin pa de dag / phyir rol dngos po las gzhan ma yin pa'am /
analyzed: gal te blo la snang ba'i don gyi yul la bsgrub pa dang dgag pa mi 'dod pa de'i tshe / dngos don rnams bsgrub par bya ba'am / dgag par bya ba'i chos gang yin pa de dag / phyir rol dngos po las gzhan ma yin pa'am /
translated: then when you do not assert that the object that appears to the mind is established or refuted,🔽then whatever phenomena are to be established or refuted🔽are either not different from external things or they are different.

original: gzhan nyid yin pa zhes bya ba'i rnam par rtog pa gnyis su 'gyur grang na /
analyzed: gzhan nyid yin pa zhes bya ba'i rnam par rtog pa gnyis su 'gyur grang na /
translated: These are the two alternatives.

original: de la rnam par rtog pa dang po ni /
analyzed: de la rnam par rtog pa dang po ni /
translated: With regard to that, the first alternative is

original: chos gcig la ni bsgrub pa dang / dgag pa yin na /🔽byed pa yin na bdag nyid dag / thams cad dgag bsgrub byed 'gyur te //
analyzed: chos gcig la ni bsgrub pa dang / dgag pa yin na / byed pa yin na bdag nyid dag / thams cad dgag bsgrub byed 'gyur te //
translated: if one phenomenon is established or refuted,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i chos thams cad bsgrub pa dang dgag par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i chos thams cad bsgrub pa dang dgag par 'gyur ro //
translated: then all of the phenomena that are to be established or refuted would be established or refuted by it.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: This is because

original: du ma'i bdag nyid med phyir ro //🔽chos can las chos rnams so //
analyzed: du ma'i bdag nyid med phyir ro // chos can las chos rnams so //
translated: they do not have a nature that is multiple.

original: tha dad pa la /
analyzed: tha dad pa la /
translated: The phenomena are different from the subject.🔽With regard to that,

original: chos can gcig la bsgrub pa dang / dgag pa'i tshogs pa med pa yin //
analyzed: chos can gcig la bsgrub pa dang / dgag pa'i tshogs pa med pa yin //
translated: There is no collection of affirmations and negations in one basis.

original: gzhi mthun pa ma yin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gzhi mthun pa ma yin par 'gyur ro //
translated: There is no common locus.

original: ci 'dra bar zhe na /
analyzed: ci 'dra bar zhe na /
translated: What is it like?

original: du ma dgag bsgrub bzhin /
analyzed: du ma dgag bsgrub bzhin /
translated: Like the negation of many and the affirmation of one.

original: gal te khyed cag gi yang ji ltar yin zhe na /
analyzed: gal te khyed cag gi yang ji ltar yin zhe na /
translated: What about you?

original: @315a * // 'dir don dam par chos can nam de'i chos 'ga' zhig kyang bsgrub pa'am dgag pa brjod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: @315a * // 'dir don dam par chos can nam de'i chos 'ga' zhig kyang bsgrub pa'am dgag pa brjod pa ma yin no //
translated: Here, ultimately, there is no affirmation or negation of any phenomenon or property of a phenomenon.

original: 'o na ci yin zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ci yin zhe na /
translated: What is it then?

original: ji ltar blo ni /
analyzed: ji ltar blo ni /
translated: Just as the mind

original: chos can gcig cig bstan pa'i ni chos du ma'i /
analyzed: chos can gcig cig bstan pa'i ni chos du ma'i /
translated: is the basis of many properties when one phenomenon is indicated,

original: rten can bzhin du chos gcig bsgrub pa na /
analyzed: rten can bzhin du chos gcig bsgrub pa na /
translated: in the same way, when one property is affirmed,

original: chos can de la de brten pa yin te /
analyzed: chos can de la de brten pa yin te /
translated: it is based on that phenomenon,

original: bsgrub pa'i chos de dang chos can 'brel ba bzhin no //
analyzed: bsgrub pa'i chos de dang chos can 'brel ba bzhin no //
translated: just like the connection between the property of affirmation and the phenomenon.

original: gzhan dag bsgrub pa dang dgag pa dag gis ma reg pa'i ngo bo can gyi chos rnams /
analyzed: gzhan dag bsgrub pa dang dgag pa dag gis ma reg pa'i ngo bo can gyi chos rnams /
translated: Other phenomena, whose natures are not touched by affirmation or negation,

original: yongs su spong bar byed pa bzhin no //
analyzed: yongs su spong bar byed pa bzhin no //
translated: are abandoned.

original: chos gcig 'gog pa yin na des dpen pa ste /
analyzed: chos gcig 'gog pa yin na des dpen pa ste /
translated: When one phenomenon is negated, by that, the other is implied.

original: 'grib pa'i ngo bo bzhin no //
analyzed: 'grib pa'i ngo bo bzhin no //
translated: like the nature of decrease.

original: de las gzhan pa ste /
analyzed: de las gzhan pa ste /
translated: Other than that,

original: bkag pa ma yin pa spong mi byed pa bzhin du /
analyzed: bkag pa ma yin pa spong mi byed pa bzhin du /
translated: like not abandoning what is not to be abandoned.

original: chos can bstan nas /
analyzed: chos can bstan nas /
translated: Having taught the subject,

original: rnam par rtog pa'i blo //🔽med pa'i don can gyi /
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa'i blo // med pa'i don can gyi /
translated: the conceptual mind🔽teaches the conventional

original: tha snyad rab tu ston par byed do //
analyzed: tha snyad rab tu ston par byed do //
translated: that has the meaning of non-existence.

original: sgra las byung ba'i tha snyad /
analyzed: sgra las byung ba'i tha snyad /
translated: The conventional that arises from words🔽is taught as the object of the mind,🔽but it is not the ultimate.

original: de de ltar ni don dam par chos dang chos can gyi dngos po med du zin kyang blos rnam par brtags nas te /
analyzed: de de ltar ni don dam par chos dang chos can gyi dngos po med du zin kyang blos rnam par brtags nas te /
translated: Even though in the ultimate truth the entity of subject and object does not exist, having imagined it with the mind,

original: don dam par yod pa nyid dam med pa nyid du'o //
analyzed: don dam par yod pa nyid dam med pa nyid du'o //
translated: in the ultimate truth, it is taught as either existent or non-existent.

original: blo'i yul du bstan pa'i tha snyad de ni don tha dad rten te /
analyzed: blo'i yul du bstan pa'i tha snyad de ni don tha dad rten te /
translated: The conventional that is taught as the object of the mind is a conventional that is based on a different object,

original: gzhan sel ba la brten pa'i skyes bu rjes 'gro ba /
analyzed: gzhan sel ba la brten pa'i skyes bu rjes 'gro ba /
translated: based on the exclusion of other, following the person.

original: 'jig rten pa'i sgra'i don la gnod mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'jig rten pa'i sgra'i don la gnod mi 'gyur ro //
translated: It does not contradict the meaning of worldly words.

original: ci 'dra ba zhig che na /
analyzed: ci 'dra ba zhig che na /
translated: What is it like?

original: thog med bag chags las byung ba'i //
analyzed: thog med bag chags las byung ba'i //
translated: It arises from beginningless latent tendencies.

original: thog ma med pa'i tha snyad kyi bag chags las kun nas 'byung ba'i rnam par rtog pa'i blos bstan pa'o //
analyzed: thog ma med pa'i tha snyad kyi bag chags las kun nas 'byung ba'i rnam par rtog pa'i blos bstan pa'o //
translated: It is taught by the mind that arises from the habitual tendencies of verbalization that have been active since beginningless time.

original: de lta ma yin na tha snyad mi rung ba de ltar na blo la snang ba'i don nyid la tha snyad 'di kha na ma tho ba med pa yin no //
analyzed: de lta ma yin na tha snyad mi rung ba de ltar na blo la snang ba'i don nyid la tha snyad 'di kha na ma tho ba med pa yin no //
translated: If it were not so, then verbalization would be impossible. Thus, the verbalization is faultless with regard to the very object that appears to the mind.

original: ji ltar na don tha dad pa dang tha dad pa la rten pa'i tha snyad la rten pa'i skyes bu dag gis ji ltar na /
analyzed: ji ltar na don tha dad pa dang tha dad pa la rten pa'i tha snyad la rten pa'i skyes bu dag gis ji ltar na /
translated: How is it that persons, who are based on the verbalization that is based on the difference and non-difference of objects,

original: de yang tha snyad kyi lam thob par 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: de yang tha snyad kyi lam thob par 'gyur zhe na /
translated: obtain the path of verbalization?

original: bshad pa 'di ltar mig gi dbang po mig gi rnams par shes pa'i 'bras bu can dang / sgra'i shes pa'i 'bras bu can ma yin zhing /
analyzed: bshad pa 'di ltar mig gi dbang po mig gi rnams par shes pa'i 'bras bu can dang / sgra'i shes pa'i 'bras bu can ma yin zhing /
translated: It is explained as follows: The eye faculty is the effect of the eye consciousness and not the effect of the auditory consciousness,

original: rna ba la sogs pa'i 'bras bu can ma yin pa dang / sgra'i shes pa'i 'bras bu can yin pa de de ltar na /
analyzed: rna ba la sogs pa'i 'bras bu can ma yin pa dang / sgra'i shes pa'i 'bras bu can yin pa de de ltar na /
translated: and so on up to: it is the effect of the auditory consciousness and not the effect of the eye faculty.

original: de 'bras can dang de 'bras yin //
analyzed: de 'bras can dang de 'bras yin //
translated: Thus, it is the effect of that and that is its effect.

original: de de las tha dad don gcig / gang dang gang las tha dad pa de ni /🔽de dang de'i 'bras bu can ma yin pa dag dang / de'i 'bras bu can dag las ldog pas byas pa'i tha dad pa la brten nas chos tha dad par sgro 'dogs pa dang / skur @315b pa 'debs pa'i bslad pa mtha' yas pa nyid 'jug par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de de las tha dad don gcig / gang dang gang las tha dad pa de ni / de dang de'i 'bras bu can ma yin pa dag dang / de'i 'bras bu can dag las ldog pas byas pa'i tha dad pa la brten nas chos tha dad par sgro 'dogs pa dang / skur @315b pa 'debs pa'i bslad pa mtha' yas pa nyid 'jug par 'gyur ro //
translated: That which is different from this or that🔽is different from those that do not have that as their effect and those that do have that as their effect.🔽On the basis of the difference that is made by the exclusion of those that do not have that as their effect, there is the superimposition of difference in regard to phenomena and the denigration of difference in regard to the object.

original: bslad pa de dang de dag gis so //
analyzed: bslad pa de dang de dag gis so //
translated: The superimposition and denigration of difference in regard to the object is due to the superimposition and denigration of difference in regard to the object.

original: ci 'dra ba zhig che na /
analyzed: ci 'dra ba zhig che na /
translated: What is the nature of that superimposition and denigration?

original: de ltar 'gyur ba'i don de la 'phel 'grib thob pa can bzhin gyi'o //
analyzed: de ltar 'gyur ba'i don de la 'phel 'grib thob pa can bzhin gyi'o //
translated: The object that is the basis of superimposition and denigration is like something that increases and decreases.

original: de ltar min yang /
analyzed: de ltar min yang /
translated: Even though it is not like that,🔽it is seen as if it increases and decreases.

original: don dam par 'phel ba dang 'grib pa dang bral ba yin na yang don de mthong ba la 'jug pa ste /
analyzed: don dam par 'phel ba dang 'grib pa dang bral ba yin na yang don de mthong ba la 'jug pa ste /
translated: Even though it is free from increase and decrease in reality, the object is seen as if it increases and decreases.

original: grags pa'i yul la 'jug par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: grags pa'i yul la 'jug par 'gyur ro //
translated: One engages in the object of renown.

original: gang las she na /
analyzed: gang las she na /
translated: From what?

original: 'jug pa dang ldog pa'i don gyi 'brel ba ni 'ga' zhig las te /
analyzed: 'jug pa dang ldog pa'i don gyi 'brel ba ni 'ga' zhig las te /
translated: From the connection between the object of engagement and the object of disengagement.

original: 'brel pas tha snyad kyi lam la 'jug par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'brel pas tha snyad kyi lam la 'jug par 'gyur ro //
translated: One engages in the path of convention by means of the connection.

original: bslad pa de dag ci 'dra ba zhig gis she na /
analyzed: bslad pa de dag ci 'dra ba zhig gis she na /
translated: What kind of error is this?

original: tha dad rten can gyis ldog pa la brten pa can dag gis so //
analyzed: tha dad rten can gyis ldog pa la brten pa can dag gis so //
translated: It is based on the exclusion that is based on the difference.

original: de nyid kyi phyir dngos po dang 'brel pa med pas sgra las bslad pa zhes tha snyad du byas pa yin no //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir dngos po dang 'brel pa med pas sgra las bslad pa zhes tha snyad du byas pa yin no //
translated: For this very reason, since it is not related to the thing, it is conventionally called “error based on sound.”

original: gang gi phyir yod pa ma yin na yang yod pa bzhin du ston par byed pa de'i phyir sgra de dag kyang mi shes bslad can /
analyzed: gang gi phyir yod pa ma yin na yang yod pa bzhin du ston par byed pa de'i phyir sgra de dag kyang mi shes bslad can /
translated: Since it shows as if it existed, even though it does not exist, therefore, these sounds are also erroneous,

original: rnam par mi shes pa can yang dag par ma gyur pa dngos po tha snyad pa la brten pas 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rnam par mi shes pa can yang dag par ma gyur pa dngos po tha snyad pa la brten pas 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because they engage based on the conventional thing, which is not known, not cognized, and not real.

original: sgrub par byed pa la 'brel pa yod pa de las de de lta bur gyur pa ma yin pa tha dad pa'i dngos po la mi slu ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sgrub par byed pa la 'brel pa yod pa de las de de lta bur gyur pa ma yin pa tha dad pa'i dngos po la mi slu ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Since the proof is related to it, it is not deceptive with regard to the different things that are not like that.

original: gzhan yang bdag med pa nyid kyi phyir mthun pa'i phyogs la srog la sogs pa yod pa ma yin no zhes brjod pa gang yin pa de yang rigs pa ma yin no //
analyzed: gzhan yang bdag med pa nyid kyi phyir mthun pa'i phyogs la srog la sogs pa yod pa ma yin no zhes brjod pa gang yin pa de yang rigs pa ma yin no //
translated: Moreover, since there is no self, it is not the case that life and so on exist in the similar class.

original: de ltar re zhig ston par byed pas bdag med pa nges pa nyid du nges pa yin no zhes brjod par rigs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de ltar re zhig ston par byed pas bdag med pa nges pa nyid du nges pa yin no zhes brjod par rigs pa ma yin te /
translated: Thus, it is not reasonable to say that the teacher has ascertained selflessness.

original: don dam par med pa nyid du nges pa yin mod kyi /🔽yod nyid sgrub byed 'jug pa'i phyir //
analyzed: don dam par med pa nyid du nges pa yin mod kyi / yod nyid sgrub byed 'jug pa'i phyir //
translated: He has ascertained that it does not exist ultimately.🔽Because he engages in establishing its existence,

original: bdag de nyid la yang yod pa nyid du sgrub par byed pa 'jug pa de ltar na /
analyzed: bdag de nyid la yang yod pa nyid du sgrub par byed pa 'jug pa de ltar na /
translated: he engages in establishing the existence of that self.

original: ston par byed pa'i gnas skabs khas len pa nyid kyi phyir des de yod pa nyid du nges par 'dod par 'gyur te /
analyzed: ston par byed pa'i gnas skabs khas len pa nyid kyi phyir des de yod pa nyid du nges par 'dod par 'gyur te /
translated: Thus, because he accepts the position of the teacher, he would be asserting that he has ascertained its existence.

original: de med par nges pa dang / de yod pa nyid du sgrub par byed pa'i tshig dag 'gal bar byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de med par nges pa dang / de yod pa nyid du sgrub par byed pa'i tshig dag 'gal bar byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because he would be contradicting his own words that ascertain its nonexistence and establish its existence.

original: de bas na 'chad pa por 'gyur ba des de yod pa nyid du nges pas khas blangs pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: de bas na 'chad pa por 'gyur ba des de yod pa nyid du nges pas khas blangs pa de'i tshe /
translated: Therefore, when the teacher accepts that he has ascertained its existence,

original: 'di ltar re zhig ston par byed pa la bdag med pa ma yin no //
analyzed: 'di ltar re zhig ston par byed pa la bdag med pa ma yin no //
translated: then the teacher does not have selflessness.

original: bstan par bya ba la yang ma yin te /
analyzed: bstan par bya ba la yang ma yin te /
translated: Nor does the taught have it.

original: 'di ltar gzhan las shes par 'dod cing /
analyzed: 'di ltar gzhan las shes par 'dod cing /
translated: Thus, when you wish to know something from another person,

original: nyan par 'dod pa na de yang the tshom med par ma yin no //
analyzed: nyan par 'dod pa na de yang the tshom med par ma yin no //
translated: and you wish to listen, you do not do so without doubt.

original: @316a * // de lta ma yin na yod pa dang med pa nyid du nges pa can shes par mi 'dod na yang /
analyzed: @316a * // de lta ma yin na yod pa dang med pa nyid du nges pa can shes par mi 'dod na yang /
translated: If that were not so, then even if you did not wish to know something that is ascertained as existent or nonexistent,

original: gzhan yang sgrub par byed pa nyan pa la gus par mi byed pa de ltar na de la ston par byed pas yod pa nyid sgrub par byed pa la 'jug par mi 'gyur na /
analyzed: gzhan yang sgrub par byed pa nyan pa la gus par mi byed pa de ltar na de la ston par byed pas yod pa nyid sgrub par byed pa la 'jug par mi 'gyur na /
translated: Moreover, if you do not respect the proof that you hear, then the one who teaches it will not engage in proving that it exists.

original: 'jug par yang 'gyur ba de'i phyir bstan par bya ba nyid /🔽nyan pa po nyid kyi gnas skabs khas len pa nyid kyi phyir bdag nyid yod pa la /
analyzed: 'jug par yang 'gyur ba de'i phyir bstan par bya ba nyid / nyan pa po nyid kyi gnas skabs khas len pa nyid kyi phyir bdag nyid yod pa la /
translated: But since you do engage in it,🔽you accept the state of being a listener yourself. Therefore, you accept a self that is doubtful about its own existence.

original: the tshom za ba can gyi bdag khas len pa de ltar na yod pa nyid sgrub par byed pa la 'jug par 'gyur te /
analyzed: the tshom za ba can gyi bdag khas len pa de ltar na yod pa nyid sgrub par byed pa la 'jug par 'gyur te /
translated: Thus you engage in proving that it exists.

original: yod nyid sgrub byed 'jug pa'i phyir /
analyzed: yod nyid sgrub byed 'jug pa'i phyir /
translated: Because you engage in proving that it exists,

original: rgyu'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rgyu'i phyir ro //
translated: it is the cause.

original: mthun pa'i phyogs de med pa yin te /
analyzed: mthun pa'i phyogs de med pa yin te /
translated: The concordant class does not exist.

original: bstan par bya ba la ltos nas so //
analyzed: bstan par bya ba la ltos nas so //
translated: It is in relation to the object to be proven.

original: 'o na ci yin zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ci yin zhe na /
translated: What is it?

original: ci yod dam med ces the tshom du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ci yod dam med ces the tshom du 'gyur ro //
translated: It is doubt as to whether it exists or not.

original: ci ste yang na yongs su dpyod pa'i dus na yod pa nyid sgrub par byed pa 'jug pa'i phyir bstan par bya ba la the tshom za bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: ci ste yang na yongs su dpyod pa'i dus na yod pa nyid sgrub par byed pa 'jug pa'i phyir bstan par bya ba la the tshom za bar 'gyur te /
translated: Or, if at the time of thorough analysis, the proof of existence is engaged, then there is doubt in relation to the object to be proven.

original: don dam par tshad mas med pa nyid du nges pa la de mi rung ba'i phyir dang / tshad ma dang cig shos dag 'gal ba med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: don dam par tshad mas med pa nyid du nges pa la de mi rung ba'i phyir dang / tshad ma dang cig shos dag 'gal ba med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because it is not suitable for valid cognition to ascertain nonexistence ultimately, and because there is no contradiction between valid cognition and the opposite of that.

original: gal te bdag med do zhes bstan par bya bas khas blangs pa de'i mthun pa'i phyogs la the tshom za ba med pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: gal te bdag med do zhes bstan par bya bas khas blangs pa de'i mthun pa'i phyogs la the tshom za ba med pa yin no zhe na /
translated: If one accepts the object to be proven, “There is no self,” then there is no doubt in relation to the concordant class.

original: de ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de ni ma yin te /
translated: That is not so.

original: 'di ltar 'di la yang bstan par bya ba des tshad mas de dag med pa nyid du dam bcas pa yin nam /
analyzed: 'di ltar 'di la yang bstan par bya ba des tshad mas de dag med pa nyid du dam bcas pa yin nam /
translated: In this way, in this context, does the object to be proven assert that those do not exist by way of valid cognition?

original: khas len pa tsam ste /
analyzed: khas len pa tsam ste /
translated: Or is it merely an assertion?

original: gal te tshad mas yin pa de'i tshe tshad ma gang las med pa nyid du khas len pa de nyid las ston par byed pas kyang med pa nyid du rtogs pa nyid du rigs pa yin no //
analyzed: gal te tshad mas yin pa de'i tshe tshad ma gang las med pa nyid du khas len pa de nyid las ston par byed pas kyang med pa nyid du rtogs pa nyid du rigs pa yin no //
translated: If it is by a valid cognition, then since the one who accepts nonexistence on the basis of a valid cognition would also realize nonexistence on the basis of that very valid cognition, it is reasonable.

original: de ltar na de yod pa nyid du sgrub par byed pa 'jug pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de ltar na de yod pa nyid du sgrub par byed pa 'jug pa ma yin no //
translated: Thus, the proof of its existence does not apply.

original: ci ste khas len pa tsam las yin pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: ci ste khas len pa tsam las yin pa de'i tshe /
translated: But if it is by mere acceptance,

original: tshad ma med pa khas len phyir //
analyzed: tshad ma med pa khas len phyir //
translated: then because of accepting the nonexistence of valid cognitions,

original: bdag med pa nyid ni rung ma yin //
analyzed: bdag med pa nyid ni rung ma yin //
translated: nonself would not be tenable.

original: de ltar na sgrub par byed pa dang / gnod pa can gyi tshad ma dag mthong ba med par don de la the tshom za ba nyid yin pa de ltar na gzhan gyis khas blangs pa yin pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: de ltar na sgrub par byed pa dang / gnod pa can gyi tshad ma dag mthong ba med par don de la the tshom za ba nyid yin pa de ltar na gzhan gyis khas blangs pa yin pa de'i tshe /
translated: Thus, without seeing a proof or a valid refutation, one would doubt that object. But if it is accepted by the other,

original: de kho na nyid dpyod pa'i dus na rigs pa shes pa rnams khas blang bar bya ba ma yin no //
analyzed: de kho na nyid dpyod pa'i dus na rigs pa shes pa rnams khas blang bar bya ba ma yin no //
translated: then when analyzing reality, the wise do not accept it.

original: de des de ltar khas blangs pas tshod ma ma yin pa de nyid khas len pa'i phyir med par 'gyur pa ma yin na /
analyzed: de des de ltar khas blangs pas tshod ma ma yin pa de nyid khas len pa'i phyir med par 'gyur pa ma yin na /
translated: Since it is accepted that it is not a non-existent, it is not non-existent.

original: gang gis na de la ldog pa rigs par 'gyur @316b na ;
analyzed: gang gis na de la ldog pa rigs par 'gyur @316b na ;
translated: By what is it reasonable to turn away from it?

original: ngo bo nyid kyis med pa la ldog pa mi rung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid kyis med pa la ldog pa mi rung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is not reasonable to turn away from what is non-existent by its very nature.

original: mthun pa'i phyogs ma yin pa las nges par ldog pa'i phyir dngos su gtan tshigs go bar byed pa yin par 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: mthun pa'i phyogs ma yin pa las nges par ldog pa'i phyir dngos su gtan tshigs go bar byed pa yin par 'gyur gyi /
translated: The reason is understood directly because of the exclusion from the dissimilar class.

original: yang dag pa ma yin par khas len pa nye bar btags pa las ni ma yin te /
analyzed: yang dag pa ma yin par khas len pa nye bar btags pa las ni ma yin te /
translated: But not from the mere designation of an unreal acceptance,

original: byas pa nyid kyi gtan tshigs kyang yang dag pa ma yin pa rtogs pa'i gtan tshigs nyid du mi 'gyur pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: byas pa nyid kyi gtan tshigs kyang yang dag pa ma yin pa rtogs pa'i gtan tshigs nyid du mi 'gyur pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the reason of being produced would not be a reason for understanding what is unreal.

original: de ltar na re zhig srog la sogs pa rgyu mthun pa'i phyogs ma yin pa nyid las ldog pa nyid du khas len pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de ltar na re zhig srog la sogs pa rgyu mthun pa'i phyogs ma yin pa nyid las ldog pa nyid du khas len pa'i phyir /
translated: Thus, first, because of the acceptance of the exclusion from the dissimilar class of life, etc.,

original: mthun pa'i phyogs las ldog pa med pa ma yin no zhes bstan to //
analyzed: mthun pa'i phyogs las ldog pa med pa ma yin no zhes bstan to //
translated: it is shown that there is no exclusion from the similar class.

original: de ltar med pa nyid las te /
analyzed: de ltar med pa nyid las te /
translated: Thus, in the absence of a similar instance,

original: mthun pa'i phyogs las ldog pa med na yang khas len par byed na srog la sogs pa de /🔽mthun phyogs las ldog the tshom za ba nyid yin no //
analyzed: mthun pa'i phyogs las ldog pa med na yang khas len par byed na srog la sogs pa de / mthun phyogs las ldog the tshom za ba nyid yin no //
translated: if you accept that there is no reversal, then the life force, etc.🔽are uncertain with regard to the similar instance.

original: mthun pa'i phyogs la the tshom za phyir ro //
analyzed: mthun pa'i phyogs la the tshom za phyir ro //
translated: Because of doubt with regard to the similar instance.

original: rgyu'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rgyu'i phyir ro //
translated: Because of the reason.

original: de ltar na mthun pa'i phyogs med pa nyid la brten nas ldog pa nyid med do zhes brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: de ltar na mthun pa'i phyogs med pa nyid la brten nas ldog pa nyid med do zhes brjod pa yin no //
translated: Thus, it is said that in the absence of a similar instance, there is no reversal.

original: de yang mthun pa'i phyogs la med pa nyid du the tshom za na yang ma nges pa de ltar na dgag par nus pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de yang mthun pa'i phyogs la med pa nyid du the tshom za na yang ma nges pa de ltar na dgag par nus pa ma yin te /
translated: Moreover, if there is doubt as to the absence of a similar instance, then it is uncertain. Thus, it is not possible to negate,

original: dgag pa'i rten la the tshom za ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dgag pa'i rten la the tshom za ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because there is doubt as to the basis of negation.

original: de nyid kyi phyir mthun pa'i phyogs las srog la sogs pa ldog pa la the tshom za pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir mthun pa'i phyogs las srog la sogs pa ldog pa la the tshom za pa'i phyir /
translated: For that very reason, there is doubt as to the reversal of the life force, etc. with regard to the similar instance.

original: mi mthun pa'i phyogs las ldog pa la 'ang the tshom za ba nyid yin no //
analyzed: mi mthun pa'i phyogs las ldog pa la 'ang the tshom za ba nyid yin no //
translated: Thus, there is doubt as to the reversal with regard to the dissimilar instance.

original: de ltar ni /
analyzed: de ltar ni /
translated: Thus,

original: gcig la nges pa grub pa ni //
analyzed: gcig la nges pa grub pa ni //
translated: the establishment of certainty with regard to one

original: gzhan la ldog pa grub par 'gyur //
analyzed: gzhan la ldog pa grub par 'gyur //
translated: The opposite of that is established for the other.

original: gal te srog la sogs pa mthun pa'i phyogs nyid yod par grub pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: gal te srog la sogs pa mthun pa'i phyogs nyid yod par grub pa de'i tshe /
translated: If life force and so on are established as existing in the similar class,

original: de dag mi mthun pa'i phyogs thams cad la med par rtogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de dag mi mthun pa'i phyogs thams cad la med par rtogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: then it is understood that they do not exist in all dissimilar classes.

original: ji ltar bdag dang bcas pa la yod pa dang med pa nyid nges par med pa'i phyir gcig so sor nges pa yod pa ma yin pa de ltar na mthun pa'i phyogs ma yin pa la 'ang yod pa dang med pa ma nges pa nyid yin pas na
analyzed: ji ltar bdag dang bcas pa la yod pa dang med pa nyid nges par med pa'i phyir gcig so sor nges pa yod pa ma yin pa de ltar na mthun pa'i phyogs ma yin pa la 'ang yod pa dang med pa ma nges pa nyid yin pas na
translated: Just as existence and nonexistence are not ascertained in the case of the self, and thus there is no single individual ascertainment, in the same way, existence and nonexistence are not ascertained in the case of the dissimilar class.

original: / mthun pa'i phyogs dang mi mthun pa'i phyogs la yod pa dang med par the tshom za ba yin no //
analyzed: / mthun pa'i phyogs dang mi mthun pa'i phyogs la yod pa dang med par the tshom za ba yin no //
translated: Therefore, there is doubt as to whether they exist or do not exist in the similar class and dissimilar class.

original: de ltar na bdag dang bcas pa bdag med pa la phung po gsum pa gzhan yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de ltar na bdag dang bcas pa bdag med pa la phung po gsum pa gzhan yod pa ma yin no //
translated: Thus, in the case of the self, there is no third alternative apart from existence and nonexistence.

original: 'ga' zhig la 'jug pa yin na 'di dag las gcig la srog la sogs pa yod par 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'ga' zhig la 'jug pa yin na 'di dag las gcig la srog la sogs pa yod par 'gyur te /
translated: If they exist in some, then life force and so on would exist in one of these.

original: gcig la 'jug pa dang ldog pa'i sgrub par byed pa'i tshad ma @317a * //
analyzed: gcig la 'jug pa dang ldog pa'i sgrub par byed pa'i tshad ma @317a * //
translated: The valid knowledge that establishes the engaging in and disengaging from one.🔽

original: med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: med pa'i phyir /
translated: Because there is no valid cognition that establishes the presence or absence of life in one thing.

original: de la the tshom za ba yin no //🔽de de ltar ni 'gyur mod kyi /
analyzed: de la the tshom za ba yin no // de de ltar ni 'gyur mod kyi /
translated: Therefore, there is doubt.

original: bdag dang bcas pa dang bdag med pa la srog la sogs pa ldog pa mthong pa de'i tshe phung po gsum med pa'i phyir don gyis bdag dang bcas pa nyid la srog la sogs pa 'jug pas 'di'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs las ldog pa la the tshom za
analyzed: bdag dang bcas pa dang bdag med pa la srog la sogs pa ldog pa mthong pa de'i tshe phung po gsum med pa'i phyir don gyis bdag dang bcas pa nyid la srog la sogs pa 'jug pas 'di'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs las ldog pa la the tshom za
translated: This may be so, but when one sees the cessation of life and so on in that which has a self and that which is selfless, then because the third possibility does not exist, one understands that life and so on exist in that which has a self.

original: ba ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: ba ma yin no zhe na /
translated: Therefore, one does not doubt the cessation of its opposite.

original: gal te yang phung po gnyis la srog la sogs pa bum pa la sogs pa bdag med pa 'ga' zhig la ma mthong ba de ltar yang /
analyzed: gal te yang phung po gnyis la srog la sogs pa bum pa la sogs pa bdag med pa 'ga' zhig la ma mthong ba de ltar yang /
translated: Even if one does not see life and so on in some things, such as pots, which are without a self,

original: la lar srog la sogs pa mthong ba med na yang /
analyzed: la lar srog la sogs pa mthong ba med na yang /
translated: even though one does not see life and so on in some things,

original: 'ga' zhig mthong ba med pa the tshom 'gyur /
analyzed: 'ga' zhig mthong ba med pa the tshom 'gyur /
translated: one doubts that it does not exist in some things.

original: de dag srog la sogs pa mthong ba med pa can du mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de dag srog la sogs pa mthong ba med pa can du mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, one does not understand that they are without life and so on.

original: de ltar ni 'dir mthong ba dang / mthong ba med pa la brten nas ni /
analyzed: de ltar ni 'dir mthong ba dang / mthong ba med pa la brten nas ni /
translated: In this way, based on seeing and not seeing,🔽

original: sgrub par byed pa ni ma yin gyi /
analyzed: sgrub par byed pa ni ma yin gyi /
translated: In this way, the existence of the universal is not established on the basis of the existence of the particular, nor is the particular established on the basis of the existence of the universal.🔽Nor is the universal established on the basis of the particular, nor is the particular established on the basis of the universal.

original: 'on kyang tshad ma dang ldan pa'i khyab ba la yin no //
analyzed: 'on kyang tshad ma dang ldan pa'i khyab ba la yin no //
translated: But the universal is established on the basis of the pervasion that is associated with the valid cognition.

original: gsal la khyab byed ma yin pa //
analyzed: gsal la khyab byed ma yin pa //
translated: The universal is not a pervader.

original: rigs de yod can don yod na'ang //
analyzed: rigs de yod can don yod na'ang //
translated: Even if the universal exists, the object does not exist.

original: rigs pa yod pa can yin na'ang gsal ba'i khyad par ma lus pa la khyab par byed pa can gyi don yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: rigs pa yod pa can yin na'ang gsal ba'i khyad par ma lus pa la khyab par byed pa can gyi don yod pa ma yin te /
translated: Even if the universal exists, the object that is a pervader of all the particulars of the universal does not exist.

original: de dag 'ga' zhig kho na la yod pa yin no //
analyzed: de dag 'ga' zhig kho na la yod pa yin no //
translated: It exists in only some of them.

original: gsal ba'i khyad par nyung zad mthong bas zhes bya ba mthong ba tsam gyis la lar te gsal ba'i khyad par ma lus pa mtshungs par nges par byed par nus pa ma yin te /
analyzed: gsal ba'i khyad par nyung zad mthong bas zhes bya ba mthong ba tsam gyis la lar te gsal ba'i khyad par ma lus pa mtshungs par nges par byed par nus pa ma yin te /
translated: One cannot ascertain that all the particulars of the universal are the same merely by seeing a few particulars of the universal.

original: ji ltar 'di la yod pa de ltar /
analyzed: ji ltar 'di la yod pa de ltar /
translated: Just as it exists in this one,

original: rigs pa yod pa can gyi gsal ba'i thams cad la yod par 'gyur /
analyzed: rigs pa yod pa can gyi gsal ba'i thams cad la yod par 'gyur /
translated: the universal would exist in all the particulars of the universal.

original: ci dang 'dra bar zhe na /
analyzed: ci dang 'dra bar zhe na /
translated: In what way?

original: 'thas pa mtshon gyis bcad pa bzhin //
analyzed: 'thas pa mtshon gyis bcad pa bzhin //
translated: Like a piece of wood cut by an axe.

original: dper na rdo rje la sogs pa 'thas pa la la la lcags kyis bcad pa nyid 'ga' zhig gis ji lta ba bzhin du mthong ba med par 'gyur zhing /
analyzed: dper na rdo rje la sogs pa 'thas pa la la la lcags kyis bcad pa nyid 'ga' zhig gis ji lta ba bzhin du mthong ba med par 'gyur zhing /
