translated: For example, some people do not see a diamond or other hard substance being cut by a saw,

original: shing la sogs pa 'thas pa gzhan dag la yang ches mang du mtshon gyis bcad pa mthong ba yin no //
analyzed: shing la sogs pa 'thas pa gzhan dag la yang ches mang du mtshon gyis bcad pa mthong ba yin no //
translated: but others do see wood and other hard substances being cut by a saw.

original: de tsam gyis des 'di skad du /
analyzed: de tsam gyis des 'di skad du /
translated: But just because of that, one cannot say:

original: gsal ba 'thas pa thams cad mtshon gyis bcad pa bzhin te /
analyzed: gsal ba 'thas pa thams cad mtshon gyis bcad pa bzhin te /
translated: “All hard substances are being cut by a saw,

original: 'thas pa nyid yin pa'i phyir shing dang rtsva la sogs pa bzhin no zhes brjod par nus pa ma yin /🔽de bas na bdag med pa la la la srog la sogs pa dang bral bar 'gyur ba 'am /
analyzed: 'thas pa nyid yin pa'i phyir shing dang rtsva la sogs pa bzhin no zhes brjod par nus pa ma yin / de bas na bdag med pa la la la srog la sogs pa dang bral bar 'gyur ba 'am /
translated: like wood and grass, because they are hard substances.”🔽Therefore, there is no certainty that someone without a self will be deprived of life,

original: bdag dang bcas pa la srog la sogs pa dang ldan par 'gyur pa yin no @317b zhes bya ba'i nges pa 'di med pa yin ba de ltar bdag med pa yang srog la sogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bdag dang bcas pa la srog la sogs pa dang ldan par 'gyur pa yin no @317b zhes bya ba'i nges pa 'di med pa yin ba de ltar bdag med pa yang srog la sogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: or that someone with a self will possess life.

original: gzhan yang srog la sogs pa mi mthun pa'i phyogs la yod ba 'gal ba ma mthong na /
analyzed: gzhan yang srog la sogs pa mi mthun pa'i phyogs la yod ba 'gal ba ma mthong na /
translated: Moreover, if one does not see the contradiction of life force, etc. existing in the discordant class,

original: gang gis the tshom ldog par 'gyur /
analyzed: gang gis the tshom ldog par 'gyur /
translated: how can one reverse doubt?

original: bdag med pa dang lhan cig srog la sogs pa 'gal ba rnam pa gnyis su bshad pa'i mtshan nyid can ma grub pa'i rgyu'i phyir bdag med pa las ldog pa la the tshom za ba yin no //
analyzed: bdag med pa dang lhan cig srog la sogs pa 'gal ba rnam pa gnyis su bshad pa'i mtshan nyid can ma grub pa'i rgyu'i phyir bdag med pa las ldog pa la the tshom za ba yin no //
translated: Since the reason for establishing the two types of contradiction with selflessness is not established, one doubts the reversal from selflessness.

original: bdag med pa dang 'gal ba'i bdag gi srog la sogs pa la khyab bar 'gyur ba de bas na /
analyzed: bdag med pa dang 'gal ba'i bdag gi srog la sogs pa la khyab bar 'gyur ba de bas na /
translated: Since the self that is the contradiction of selflessness is pervaded by life force, etc.,

original: de dag brgyud pas bdag med ba dang lhan cig 'gal bar 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: de dag brgyud pas bdag med ba dang lhan cig 'gal bar 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: then by that, they would be the contradiction concomitant with selflessness.

original: de yang ste /
analyzed: de yang ste /
translated: That is so,

original: de 'dra ba'i 'gal ba'o //
analyzed: de 'dra ba'i 'gal ba'o //
translated: but that is the contradiction of that type.

original: de 'bras dang bdag nyid srog la sogs pa bdag gi 'bras bu nyid dam rang bzhin nyid kyis la lar te bdag la /
analyzed: de 'bras dang bdag nyid srog la sogs pa bdag gi 'bras bu nyid dam rang bzhin nyid kyis la lar te bdag la /
translated: That result and the self itself are the result of the self or the nature of the self somewhere, i.e., in the self.

original: rnam nges phyir gzhan ci zhig yin te /
analyzed: rnam nges phyir gzhan ci zhig yin te /
translated: For the sake of ascertaining that, what else is there?

original: gzhan nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: gzhan nyid ma yin no //
translated: There is nothing else.

original: bdag dang srog la sogs pa so sor nges pa 'di yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: bdag dang srog la sogs pa so sor nges pa 'di yod pa ma yin no //
translated: The self, life-force, and so on are not ascertained individually.

original: de la gang gi phyir 'di ltar dngos su 'gal ba ma yin zhing /
analyzed: de la gang gi phyir 'di ltar dngos su 'gal ba ma yin zhing /
translated: In this regard, because it is not directly contradictory,

original: bdag med pa dang 'gal ba'i bdag gis khyab ba nyid kyi phyir brgyud pas kyang ma yin pa des na /
analyzed: bdag med pa dang 'gal ba'i bdag gis khyab ba nyid kyi phyir brgyud pas kyang ma yin pa des na /
translated: and because self is not pervaded by selflessness, it is not indirectly contradictory either.

original: bdag med pa las kyang srog la sogs pa 'di ni /🔽ldog pa la the tshom za ba yin no //
analyzed: bdag med pa las kyang srog la sogs pa 'di ni / ldog pa la the tshom za ba yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is uncertain whether life-force and so on would be reversed in the absence of self.

original: bdag med pa las srog la sogs pa ldog cing srog la sogs pa yod na gson po'i lus la bdag ldog par 'gyur ba ni bla ste /
analyzed: bdag med pa las srog la sogs pa ldog cing srog la sogs pa yod na gson po'i lus la bdag ldog par 'gyur ba ni bla ste /
translated: It is possible that life-force and so on would be reversed in the absence of self, but it is impossible that the self would be reversed in the living body if life-force and so on exist.

original: de lta yin yang /
analyzed: de lta yin yang /
translated: Even though that is the case,

original: bdag med phyir /
analyzed: bdag med phyir /
translated: because there is no self,

original: rgyu'i phyir / gson po'i lus la bdag grub min no //
analyzed: rgyu'i phyir / gson po'i lus la bdag grub min no //
translated: the self is not established in the living body.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /🔽gang gis de ni ldog pa yis //
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na / gang gis de ni ldog pa yis //
translated: Why is that?🔽Because it is not asserted that

original: med pa dngos la 'dod ma yin //🔽dper na srog sogs mthun phyogs las //
analyzed: med pa dngos la 'dod ma yin // dper na srog sogs mthun phyogs las //
translated: nonexistence is a thing that is reversed.🔽For example, just as it is not asserted that🔽life-force and so on exist in the absence of their concordant factors,

original: ldog pa med pa de dag mthun phyogs la yod par mi 'dod pa de bzhin du /
analyzed: ldog pa med pa de dag mthun phyogs la yod par mi 'dod pa de bzhin du /
translated: in the same way,

original: bdag ldog pa bdag med med na yang /
analyzed: bdag ldog pa bdag med med na yang /
translated: But even if the self were refuted,

original: bdag des 'dod par bya ba ma yin no //
analyzed: bdag des 'dod par bya ba ma yin no //
translated: the self would not be the object of desire.

original: de ltar ni 'gyur mod kyi /
analyzed: de ltar ni 'gyur mod kyi /
translated: This is true, but

original: mthun pa'i phyogs med pa la srog la sogs pa ldog pa med na yang yod pa 'gal ba yin na /
analyzed: mthun pa'i phyogs med pa la srog la sogs pa ldog pa med na yang yod pa 'gal ba yin na /
translated: if the life-force and so on are not refuted in the absence of a concordant class, then existence is contradictory.

original: de ltar gson po'i lus yod pa yin na ma yin no //
analyzed: de ltar gson po'i lus yod pa yin na ma yin no //
translated: If the living body exists, it is not nonexistent.

original: gang gis na de la bdag med pa ldog pa de'i zla bo mi 'gyur ba yin na /🔽phung @318a * //
analyzed: gang gis na de la bdag med pa ldog pa de'i zla bo mi 'gyur ba yin na / phung @318a * //
translated: If the self is not refuted, then what is its opposite?

original: po gsum pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: po gsum pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: There is no third alternative.

original: gang la yod pa yang ma yin zhing med pa yang ma yin par 'gyur ba /
analyzed: gang la yod pa yang ma yin zhing med pa yang ma yin par 'gyur ba /
translated: If something exists that is neither existent nor nonexistent,

original: de yod na ni der 'gyur na /
analyzed: de yod na ni der 'gyur na /
translated: then that would be the case,

original: de yang rigs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de yang rigs pa ma yin te /
translated: but that is illogical.

original: 'di ltar dngos po dang dngos po med pa dag gis ma bsdus pa'i phung po gzhan ni yod pa pa ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: 'di ltar dngos po dang dngos po med pa dag gis ma bsdus pa'i phung po gzhan ni yod pa pa ma yin no zhe na /
translated: Thus, there is no other class that is not included in things and nonthings.

original: de ni de ltar yin mod kyi /
analyzed: de ni de ltar yin mod kyi /
translated: This is true, but

original: yod pa 'gog pa ni ldog pa yin la /
analyzed: yod pa 'gog pa ni ldog pa yin la /
translated: the refutation of existence is a negation.

original: de yang mthun pa'i phyogs ma yin pa la /
analyzed: de yang mthun pa'i phyogs ma yin pa la /
translated: And that is not a concordant class.

original: khyod rang nyid 'dod pa yin te /
analyzed: khyod rang nyid 'dod pa yin te /
translated: You yourself accept this,

original: yod pa mi 'dod pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: yod pa mi 'dod pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: because you do not accept that they exist.🔽At that time, you say that the refutation of life force, etc.,

original: de'i tshe de la srog la sogs pa ldog par gyur ba dag / de la yod pa nyid 'gal ba yin mod kyi /
analyzed: de'i tshe de la srog la sogs pa ldog par gyur ba dag / de la yod pa nyid 'gal ba yin mod kyi /
translated: is contradictory, because it contradicts their existence.

original: 'on kyang yod pa ldog pa med na /
analyzed: 'on kyang yod pa ldog pa med na /
translated: However, if their existence is not refuted,

original: yang yod pa mi brjod pa'i phyir tshig 'jug pa 'gal ba yin no zhes de skad du brjod do //
analyzed: yang yod pa mi brjod pa'i phyir tshig 'jug pa 'gal ba yin no zhes de skad du brjod do //
translated: then it is contradictory to say that they do not exist.🔽For example, although life force, etc., are not absent from the similar class, you do not accept that they exist in the similar class.

original: dper na srog la sogs pa mthun pa'i phyogs las ldog pa med pa yin yang mthun pa'i phyogs la yod par mi 'dod pa de bzhin du bdag ldog pa med pa med na yang /
analyzed: dper na srog la sogs pa mthun pa'i phyogs las ldog pa med pa yin yang mthun pa'i phyogs la yod par mi 'dod pa de bzhin du bdag ldog pa med pa med na yang /
translated: In the same way, although the self is not absent,

original: khyod kyis bdag yod pa nyid du 'dod par bya ba ma yin no //🔽de de ltar na /🔽gal te rtags mthun phyogs ldog med //
analyzed: khyod kyis bdag yod pa nyid du 'dod par bya ba ma yin no // de de ltar na / gal te rtags mthun phyogs ldog med //
translated: you should not accept that the self exists.🔽If you say that the reason is not absent from the similar class,🔽but is absent from the dissimilar class,

original: gal te mthun pa'i phyogs las ldog pa yod pa ma yin pa'i gtan tshigs srog la sogs pa gang yin pa de yang 'dod pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: gal te mthun pa'i phyogs las ldog pa yod pa ma yin pa'i gtan tshigs srog la sogs pa gang yin pa de yang 'dod pa de'i tshe /
translated: then at that time, you accept that the reason, life force, etc.,

original: de'i phyir / mthun pa'i phyogs las ldog pa med pa'i rgyu'i phyir /🔽gtan tshigs rjes 'gro can yin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i phyir / mthun pa'i phyogs las ldog pa med pa'i rgyu'i phyir / gtan tshigs rjes 'gro can yin par 'gyur ro //
translated: the reason is inconclusive because of the absence of an invariable relation with the similar class.

original: de bas na ldog pa can zhes brjod par bya ba ma yin no //
analyzed: de bas na ldog pa can zhes brjod par bya ba ma yin no //
translated: Hence, it is not to be stated as having the nature of a negative concomitance.

original: gal te ldog med rjes 'gro med //
analyzed: gal te ldog med rjes 'gro med //
translated: If there is no invariable relation, there is no negative concomitance.

original: ci ste mthun pa'i phyogs la srog la sogs pa ldog pa med na yang de la srog la sogs pa yod par khas mi len pa de'i tshe /🔽bdag med med phyir bdag bcas min te /🔽grub pa ma yin no //
analyzed: ci ste mthun pa'i phyogs la srog la sogs pa ldog pa med na yang de la srog la sogs pa yod par khas mi len pa de'i tshe / bdag med med phyir bdag bcas min te / grub pa ma yin no //
translated: If, although there is no absence of life, etc., in the similar class, you do not accept that life, etc., exist in that class,🔽then, because of the absence of a self, it is not established that the living body is endowed with a self.

original: 'di la bdag med pa nyid yin yang gson po'i lus ni bdag dang bcas par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'di la bdag med pa nyid yin yang gson po'i lus ni bdag dang bcas par mi 'gyur te /
translated: For, although there is no self, the living body is not endowed with a self,

original: ldog pa med pa la yang yod par khas mi len pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ldog pa med pa la yang yod par khas mi len pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because, even in the absence of an invariable relation, you do not accept that it exists.

original: 'dis kyang bdag yod pa ma yin na srog la sogs pa ldog par mi 'gyur te /🔽'di ltar / gang rang bdag nyid 'jug pa la //
analyzed: 'dis kyang bdag yod pa ma yin na srog la sogs pa ldog par mi 'gyur te / 'di ltar / gang rang bdag nyid 'jug pa la //
translated: This also shows that if the self does not exist, life, etc., would not be absent.🔽For,

original: gang zhig med na mi 'byung grub //
analyzed: gang zhig med na mi 'byung grub //
translated: that which is established as not occurring in the absence of a particular thing🔽is invariably related to that thing.

original: rtags gang gi rang gi bdag nyid khyab bar byed pa gang 'jug pa ste /
analyzed: rtags gang gi rang gi bdag nyid khyab bar byed pa gang 'jug pa ste /
translated: The reason is that which pervades itself, and that which is engaged.

original: yod la yod pa nyid kyis med na mi @318b 'byung bar grub cing /🔽khyab par byed pa de ldog pa na rag las ba de ldog byed nyid de'i phyir /
analyzed: yod la yod pa nyid kyis med na mi @318b 'byung bar grub cing / khyab par byed pa de ldog pa na rag las ba de ldog byed nyid de'i phyir /
translated: When existence is established as existent, and non-existence is established as non-existent,🔽then when the pervader is eliminated, the dependent is eliminated.

original: rag las ba de 'jug pa'i yang ste /
analyzed: rag las ba de 'jug pa'i yang ste /
translated: Therefore, the dependent is engaged.

original: khyab par byed pa de yod na /
analyzed: khyab par byed pa de yod na /
translated: When the pervader exists,

original: 'jug byed yin zhing shes par byed pa yin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'jug byed yin zhing shes par byed pa yin par 'gyur ro //
translated: it is the engager and the explainer.

original: med na mi 'byung de yang ni //🔽bshad ma thag pa der nges pa//
analyzed: med na mi 'byung de yang ni // bshad ma thag pa der nges pa//
translated: That non-existence without which🔽this is not possible is ascertained.

original: sgrub par byed la ldog pa yin //
analyzed: sgrub par byed la ldog pa yin //
translated: The proof is the elimination of that.

original: sgrub par byed pa de yang ci zhig yin zhe na /
analyzed: sgrub par byed pa de yang ci zhig yin zhe na /
translated: What is that proof?🔽It is said:

original: bshad pa / 'bras la mthong dang ma mthong ba //
analyzed: bshad pa / 'bras la mthong dang ma mthong ba //
translated: The effect is seen or unseen,

original: dmigs pa dang mi dmigs pa dag go //
analyzed: dmigs pa dang mi dmigs pa dag go //
translated: observed or not observed.

original: mthong ba dang ma mthong ba de dag rgyu dang 'bras bu nyid /
analyzed: mthong ba dang ma mthong ba de dag rgyu dang 'bras bu nyid /
translated: That which is seen and unseen is cause and effect.

original: de dag med pa gang yin pa de dag ni rgyu dang 'bras bu nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: de dag med pa gang yin pa de dag ni rgyu dang 'bras bu nyid ma yin no //
translated: That which is not their non-existence is not cause and effect.

original: de nyid kyi phyir de dag go bar bya ba dang go bar byed pa nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir de dag go bar bya ba dang go bar byed pa nyid ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, they are not the means of understanding and the object of understanding.

original: de bas na don gzhan te /
analyzed: de bas na don gzhan te /
translated: Therefore, the self is not the object of the expression “I” because it is a different object.

original: bdag gi srog la sogs pa 'bras bu ma yin pa'i phyir rtogs pa yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: bdag gi srog la sogs pa 'bras bu ma yin pa'i phyir rtogs pa yod pa ma yin no //
translated: The self does not exist because life force, etc., are not its effects.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: de yod na ste /
analyzed: de yod na ste /
translated: Because if it exists,

original: don gzhan du gyur ba srog la sogs pa 'bras bu ma yin pa yod na bdag ni yod des med phyir ro //
analyzed: don gzhan du gyur ba srog la sogs pa 'bras bu ma yin pa yod na bdag ni yod des med phyir ro //
translated: if life force, etc., which are different objects, are not its effects, then the self does not exist.

original: rjes su 'gro tsam las rgyu'i nus ba rtogs pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: rjes su 'gro tsam las rgyu'i nus ba rtogs pa ma yin gyi /
translated: The power of a cause is not understood merely from its presence,

original: 'on kyang ldog pa las kyang ngo //
analyzed: 'on kyang ldog pa las kyang ngo //
translated: but also from its absence.

original: de yang 'di la yod pa ma yin te /🔽rtag tu yod pa can te /
analyzed: de yang 'di la yod pa ma yin te / rtag tu yod pa can te /
translated: And that is not present in this case.🔽Because the self is always present.

original: bdag rtag pa med na /
analyzed: bdag rtag pa med na /
translated: If the self is permanent,

original: srog la sogs pa /
analyzed: srog la sogs pa /
translated: then life force, etc.,

original: de dag med mi srid phyir ro //
analyzed: de dag med mi srid phyir ro //
translated: cannot be absent when it is present.

original: rtag pa nyid kyi phyir bdag ldog pa med pas de med na srog la sogs pa ldog pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: rtag pa nyid kyi phyir bdag ldog pa med pas de med na srog la sogs pa ldog pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: The meaning is that because the self is permanent, it does not cease, and therefore life force, etc., do not cease when it does not exist.

original: bdag ni 'ga' zhig gi tshe yang 'ga' zhig la ldog pa ma yin te /
analyzed: bdag ni 'ga' zhig gi tshe yang 'ga' zhig la ldog pa ma yin te /
translated: The self is not the reverse of anything,

original: rtag pa nyid kyi phyir dang thams cad la zhugs pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: rtag pa nyid kyi phyir dang thams cad la zhugs pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: because it is permanent and because it is engaged in everything.

original: de med na srog la sogs pa med pa me srid pas bdag ni srog la sogs pa la nus pa med pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: de med na srog la sogs pa med pa me srid pas bdag ni srog la sogs pa la nus pa med pa nyid yin no //
translated: Since it is impossible for life, etc. to exist without the self, the self is not the cause of life, etc.🔽Since the self is not the effect of life, etc., it is not cognized by the knowledge of life, etc.

original: de'i 'bras bu ma yin pa'i phyir srog la sogs pa las bdag rtogs pa ma yin no zhes bshad pa la ldog pa las gdon mi za bar rgyu dang 'bras bu'i so sor nges pa ma yin na /
analyzed: de'i 'bras bu ma yin pa'i phyir srog la sogs pa las bdag rtogs pa ma yin no zhes bshad pa la ldog pa las gdon mi za bar rgyu dang 'bras bu'i so sor nges pa ma yin na /
translated: If the reverse of existence does not necessarily determine the relation of cause and effect,

original: gang gis na de ltar 'gyur /
analyzed: gang gis na de ltar 'gyur /
translated: how is it that the reverse of existence determines the relation of cause and effect?

original: 'o na ci yin zhen /
analyzed: 'o na ci yin zhen /
translated: What is it?

original: yod na yod pa can gyi mtshan nyid can gyi rjes su 'gro ba 'ba' zhig las kyang yin no zhes gzhan dag sems so //
analyzed: yod na yod pa can gyi mtshan nyid can gyi rjes su 'gro ba 'ba' zhig las kyang yin no zhes gzhan dag sems so //
translated: Others think that it is the mere forward pervasion, i.e., if it exists, it has the nature of existence.

original: de ltar dogs pa las 'bras bu'i rang bzhin zhes bya ba la sogs pas 'gog par byed do //
analyzed: de ltar dogs pa las 'bras bu'i rang bzhin zhes bya ba la sogs pas 'gog par byed do //
translated: Thus, he refutes this doubt with the words, “The effect is not of the nature of the cause, etc.”

original: re zhig 'bras bu'i rang bzhin tha dad pa glo bur ba ni rigs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: re zhig 'bras bu'i rang bzhin tha dad pa glo bur ba ni rigs pa ma yin te /
translated: First, it is not logical that the nature of the effect is different and adventitious.

original: @319a * // yod na thams cad du thams cad kyi tshe bdag nyid thams cad yod par thal ba'i phyir ro //🔽de ltar na rgyu dag las 'bras bu rnams kyi so sor nges pa'i rang bzhin gyi bye brag yin pas na /
analyzed: @319a * // yod na thams cad du thams cad kyi tshe bdag nyid thams cad yod par thal ba'i phyir ro // de ltar na rgyu dag las 'bras bu rnams kyi so sor nges pa'i rang bzhin gyi bye brag yin pas na /
translated: If it existed, it would follow that it would exist in all ways and at all times.🔽Thus, the nature of the effect is a specific type that is determined in relation to its causes.

original: 'bras bu'i rang bzhin tha dad rnams //
analyzed: 'bras bu'i rang bzhin tha dad rnams //
translated: Therefore, the different natures of effects

original: rgyu rnams las ni byung ba'i phyir //🔽rgyu'i phyir rgyu rnams kyis 'bras bu cung zad cig cig car skyed pa gang yin pa'i rgyu /🔽de dag med par ji ltar yongs su mthong ba'i rgyu las gzhan la 'byung ba ste /
analyzed: rgyu rnams las ni byung ba'i phyir // rgyu'i phyir rgyu rnams kyis 'bras bu cung zad cig cig car skyed pa gang yin pa'i rgyu / de dag med par ji ltar yongs su mthong ba'i rgyu las gzhan la 'byung ba ste /
translated: arise from causes.🔽The causes of whatever effect the causes produce are not seen to be different from the causes that are seen.

original: 'bras bu 'ga' zhig go //
analyzed: 'bras bu 'ga' zhig go //
translated: How could an effect arise from something other than the causes that are seen?

original: de skyed de /
analyzed: de skyed de /
translated: It does not arise.

original: ji ltar yongs su mthong ba'i rgyu las skyes pa'i ngo bo gang las 'gyur /
analyzed: ji ltar yongs su mthong ba'i rgyu las skyes pa'i ngo bo gang las 'gyur /
translated: How could the nature that arises from the causes that are seen arise from something else?

original: 'bras bu ji ltar 'gyur ba yin /
analyzed: 'bras bu ji ltar 'gyur ba yin /
translated: How could it be an effect?

original: 'gyur ba nyid ma yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: 'gyur ba nyid ma yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: It would not be.

original: de ltar na /
analyzed: de ltar na /
translated: Thus,

original: tshogs pa'i nus pa tha dad phyir //
analyzed: tshogs pa'i nus pa tha dad phyir //
translated: Because the power of the collection is different,

original: dngos rnams sna tshogs ngo bo nyid //
analyzed: dngos rnams sna tshogs ngo bo nyid //
translated: Things have a variety of natures.

original: rgyu tha dad pa las skye ba tha dad pa yin zhing /🔽tha dad pa ma yin pa las tha dad pa med pa yin pa de ltar na /
analyzed: rgyu tha dad pa las skye ba tha dad pa yin zhing / tha dad pa ma yin pa las tha dad pa med pa yin pa de ltar na /
translated: Things that are different arise from different causes.🔽Things that are not different do not arise from different causes.

original: dngos po rnams kyi sna tshogs ni rgyu tha dad pas byas ba yin no //
analyzed: dngos po rnams kyi sna tshogs ni rgyu tha dad pas byas ba yin no //
translated: Thus, the variety of things is produced by different causes.

original: 'bras bu bdag nyid ji ltar ba bzhin du tshogs pa gal te de tha dad byed min de'i tshe 'ga' zhig las kyang dngos po rnams kyi tha dad pa 'byung ba yod pa ma yin pa /
analyzed: 'bras bu bdag nyid ji ltar ba bzhin du tshogs pa gal te de tha dad byed min de'i tshe 'ga' zhig las kyang dngos po rnams kyi tha dad pa 'byung ba yod pa ma yin pa /
translated: If the collection of causes is not different in accordance with the effect, then the difference of things does not arise from any cause at all.

original: de ltar na tha dad pa med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de ltar na tha dad pa med pa'i phyir /
translated: Thus, because there is no difference,

original: 'gro ba'i ngo bo gcig thob 'gyur //
analyzed: 'gro ba'i ngo bo gcig thob 'gyur //
translated: The nature of the world would be one.

original: gang gi tshe dngos po rnams rgyu las tha dad pa ma yin pa de'i tshe tha dad pa nyid kyang ma yin no //
analyzed: gang gi tshe dngos po rnams rgyu las tha dad pa ma yin pa de'i tshe tha dad pa nyid kyang ma yin no //
translated: When things are not different from their causes, then they are not different.

original: de ltar na gang gi tshe rgyu tha dad pa las 'bras bu tha dad par skye ba ma yin pa de'i tshe rgyu'i tha dad pa med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de ltar na gang gi tshe rgyu tha dad pa las 'bras bu tha dad par skye ba ma yin pa de'i tshe rgyu'i tha dad pa med pa'i phyir /
translated: Thus, when an effect does not arise from a different cause, then because there is no difference in the cause,

original: tha dad pa bzhin du 'bras bu'i tha dad pa med pa ma yin te /
analyzed: tha dad pa bzhin du 'bras bu'i tha dad pa med pa ma yin te /
translated: the difference in the effect does not exist as if it were different.

original: rgyu'i nus pa so sor nges pa la ltos pa med pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: rgyu'i nus pa so sor nges pa la ltos pa med pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: This is because it is not dependent on the individual determination of the power of the cause.

original: ltos pa yin na yang rgyu'i tha dad pa las kyang tha dad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ltos pa yin na yang rgyu'i tha dad pa las kyang tha dad par 'gyur ro //
translated: Even if it were dependent, the difference in the effect would not arise from the difference in the cause.

original: ci ste tha dad na yang mi 'gyur na ni tha dad pa med par yang mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ci ste tha dad na yang mi 'gyur na ni tha dad pa med par yang mi 'gyur ro //
translated: But if it were not so, then even if there were no difference, there would be no difference.

original: tha dad pa dang tha dad pa med pa'i rang bzhin las 'das pa'i dngos po yod pa ni ma yin pa de ltar na 'ga' zhig kyang rgyu dang 'bras bu can du mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: tha dad pa dang tha dad pa med pa'i rang bzhin las 'das pa'i dngos po yod pa ni ma yin pa de ltar na 'ga' zhig kyang rgyu dang 'bras bu can du mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Since there is no entity that transcends the nature of being different or not different, nothing would be a cause or an effect.

original: de ltar na bsgrub par bya ba nges pa la sgrub par byed pa nye bar sbyor ba la sogs pa med par thal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar na bsgrub par bya ba nges pa la sgrub par byed pa nye bar sbyor ba la sogs pa med par thal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Thus, it follows that there would be no application of a proof in the ascertainment of a probandum.

original: 'di tha dad byed tha dad min //
analyzed: 'di tha dad byed tha dad min //
translated: It is not different from that.

original: ngo bo tha dad med nyid nyams //
analyzed: ngo bo tha dad med nyid nyams //
translated: If it were different, it would not be the nature of that.

original: de ltar ni 'gyur mod @319b kyi ;
analyzed: de ltar ni 'gyur mod @319b kyi ;
translated: This is true, but

original: du ba la sogs pa skyed par byed pa'i tshogs pa gcig las don gzhan du gyur pa'i tshogs pa gang yin pa de'i rang bzhin gcig po de'i 'bras bu'i tha dad pa des na tha dad pa'i rgyu'i phyir dang du ba la sogs pa'i 'bras bu yod cing
analyzed: du ba la sogs pa skyed par byed pa'i tshogs pa gcig las don gzhan du gyur pa'i tshogs pa gang yin pa de'i rang bzhin gcig po de'i 'bras bu'i tha dad pa des na tha dad pa'i rgyu'i phyir dang du ba la sogs pa'i 'bras bu yod cing
translated: the nature of the collection that produces smoke, etc. is one. The effect is different from that. Therefore, because the cause is different, the effect, smoke, etc. exists.

original: tha dad pa med pa'i rang bzhin gzhan yang yod pa yin /
analyzed: tha dad pa med pa'i rang bzhin gzhan yang yod pa yin /
translated: And the nature that is not different from that exists.

original: gang gi tshogs pa mi 'dra ba snga mas skyed pa'i rang bzhin can gyi du bskyed par byed pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: gang gi tshogs pa mi 'dra ba snga mas skyed pa'i rang bzhin can gyi du bskyed par byed pa yin no zhe na /
translated: The nature that is produced by the previous dissimilar collection is the producer of smoke.

original: 'di ltar tshogs pa 'di'i tha dad byed pa tha dad min na /
analyzed: 'di ltar tshogs pa 'di'i tha dad byed pa tha dad min na /
translated: If the difference of this collection is not different from that,

original: ngo bo tha dad med nyid nyams //
analyzed: ngo bo tha dad med nyid nyams //
translated: then the nondifference of nature is undermined.

original: gcig la tha dad par byed pa dang tha dad par byed pa ma yin pa phan tshun 'gal ba'i rang bzhin rigs pa ma yin no //
analyzed: gcig la tha dad par byed pa dang tha dad par byed pa ma yin pa phan tshun 'gal ba'i rang bzhin rigs pa ma yin no //
translated: It is not logical for the single nature of one thing to have the mutually contradictory natures of being different and not being different.

original: don dam par dngos po gcig tha dad pa'i ngo bo yin pa de ltar na yang gcig ni du ba'i dngos nyid na ste khas len par byed na /
analyzed: don dam par dngos po gcig tha dad pa'i ngo bo yin pa de ltar na yang gcig ni du ba'i dngos nyid na ste khas len par byed na /
translated: In reality, a thing is of the nature of being different from a single thing.

original: me dang cig shos gzugs gnyis yin /
analyzed: me dang cig shos gzugs gnyis yin /
translated: If one accepts that, then fire and the other, form, are two.

original: tha dad par byed pa ma yin pa'i rang gi ngo bo gang yin pa de gang gis me la sogs pa'i tshogs pas skyed par byed pa'i rang bzhin can gyi bar du skyed par 'gyur ba de ma yin zhing tha dad par byed pa gang yin pa de
analyzed: tha dad par byed pa ma yin pa'i rang gi ngo bo gang yin pa de gang gis me la sogs pa'i tshogs pas skyed par byed pa'i rang bzhin can gyi bar du skyed par 'gyur ba de ma yin zhing tha dad par byed pa gang yin pa de
translated: That which is not made different, whose nature is not produced by the collection of fire and so on, is not different from that which is produced.

original: ni me ma yin no //
analyzed: ni me ma yin no //
translated: That which is made different is not fire.

original: de'i phyir me la sogs pa'i tshogs pas du ba skyed par byed pa gang yin pa de /
analyzed: de'i phyir me la sogs pa'i tshogs pas du ba skyed par byed pa gang yin pa de /
translated: Therefore, that which is produced by the collection of fire and so on is not

original: du ba skyed byed ngo bo ni /
analyzed: du ba skyed byed ngo bo ni /
translated: the nature of that which produces smoke.

original: ngo bo de nyid kyang gal te gzhan yin /
analyzed: ngo bo de nyid kyang gal te gzhan yin /
translated: If that nature is different,

original: 'khrul ba'i yul nyid du 'dod pa yin na yang /
analyzed: 'khrul ba'i yul nyid du 'dod pa yin na yang /
translated: even if one asserts that it is the object of error,

original: de'i tshe de nyid me la sogs pa'i tshogs pa de nyid yin no //
analyzed: de'i tshe de nyid me la sogs pa'i tshogs pa de nyid yin no //
translated: then at that time it is just the collection of fire and so on.

original: de ltar me la sogs pa'i tshogs pa gang yin pa de du ba skyed par byed pa'i rang bzhin can yin no //
analyzed: de ltar me la sogs pa'i tshogs pa gang yin pa de du ba skyed par byed pa'i rang bzhin can yin no //
translated: Thus, whatever the collection of fire and so on is, it has the nature of producing smoke.

original: ci ste de du ba skyed pa'i ngo bo ma yin na /
analyzed: ci ste de du ba skyed pa'i ngo bo ma yin na /
translated: But if it is not the nature of producing smoke,

original: de'i tshe du ba skyed par byed pa'i rang bzhin can ma yin pa /
analyzed: de'i tshe du ba skyed par byed pa'i rang bzhin can ma yin pa /
translated: then at that time it does not have the nature of producing smoke.

original: de las du ba la sogs pa'i 'bras bu /
analyzed: de las du ba la sogs pa'i 'bras bu /
translated: From that, the effect such as smoke

original: de 'byung ji ltar yin //
analyzed: de 'byung ji ltar yin //
translated: how could it arise?

original: gang gi phyir du ba la sogs pa skyed par byed pa'i rang bzhin can gyi med yin gyi /
analyzed: gang gi phyir du ba la sogs pa skyed par byed pa'i rang bzhin can gyi med yin gyi /
translated: Because it is not the nature of producing smoke,

original: de skyed par byed pa'i rang bzhin can ma yin pa las du ba mi 'byung ba /
analyzed: de skyed par byed pa'i rang bzhin can ma yin pa las du ba mi 'byung ba /
translated: smoke does not arise from that which is not the nature of producing it.🔽Therefore, cause and effect

original: de phyir rgyu dang 'bras bu dag / phan tshun rang bzhin nges pa yin //
analyzed: de phyir rgyu dang 'bras bu dag / phan tshun rang bzhin nges pa yin //
translated: are ascertained as having each other’s nature.

original: ji ltar du ba skyed par byed pa gang yin pa de me la sogs pa tshogs pa'i khyad par gyis skyed pa gang yin pa de ltar na rgyu dang 'bras bu'i rang bzhin nges pa yin no //
analyzed: ji ltar du ba skyed par byed pa gang yin pa de me la sogs pa tshogs pa'i khyad par gyis skyed pa gang yin pa de ltar na rgyu dang 'bras bu'i rang bzhin nges pa yin no //
translated: Just as whatever produces smoke is produced by the specific collection of fire and so on, in the same way cause and effect are ascertained as having each other’s nature.

original: de'i phyir rang gis mthong bzhin /
analyzed: de'i phyir rang gis mthong bzhin /
translated: Therefore, just as you see

original: ji ltar @320a * //
analyzed: ji ltar @320a * //
translated: How?

original: me las dngos su 'byung ba'i rgyu'i yul can gyi shes pa las /🔽de rgyur rtogs 'gyur de bzhin du 'bras bu ste /
analyzed: me las dngos su 'byung ba'i rgyu'i yul can gyi shes pa las / de rgyur rtogs 'gyur de bzhin du 'bras bu ste /
translated: From a cognition that has as its object the cause that directly produces fire,

original: rtags su gyur ba mthong na'ang de rgyu yin par rtogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rtags su gyur ba mthong na'ang de rgyu yin par rtogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: one understands that this is the cause. In the same way, when one sees the effect, which is the sign, one understands that this is the cause.

original: de ltar na 'bras bu'i rtags ni rang gi rgyu las 'khrul ba med pa can yin no //
analyzed: de ltar na 'bras bu'i rtags ni rang gi rgyu las 'khrul ba med pa can yin no //
translated: Thus the sign of the effect is nonerroneous with regard to its cause.

original: de ltar ni 'gyur mod kyi /
analyzed: de ltar ni 'gyur mod kyi /
translated: This is true, but🔽How can one effect arise from many causes,

original: chu dang 'o ma'i rul pa bzhin //🔽du ma las gcig ji ltar yin //
analyzed: chu dang 'o ma'i rul pa bzhin // du ma las gcig ji ltar yin //
translated: like sour milk from milk and rice?

original: 'bras bu gcig las mthong ba yang rigs mi mthun pa gzhan las kyang 'byung ba mthong ba yin te /
analyzed: 'bras bu gcig las mthong ba yang rigs mi mthun pa gzhan las kyang 'byung ba mthong ba yin te /
translated: One also sees that a single effect arises from many causes that are of a different type.

original: dper na 'o mas de dang 'brel ba can gyi rdzas rul pa'i rang bzhin gzugs dang reg bya la sogs pa rnam par gyur pa rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ba'i mtshan nyid can yang /
analyzed: dper na 'o mas de dang 'brel ba can gyi rdzas rul pa'i rang bzhin gzugs dang reg bya la sogs pa rnam par gyur pa rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ba'i mtshan nyid can yang /
translated: For example, sour milk arises from milk and rice, and the transformation of the form, texture, etc., of the substance that is related to the milk is a transformation of its nature.

original: 'o ma'i mtshan nyid med pa chu las kyang de nyid du 'gyur ba de ltar du ba la yang 'gyur ba lta bu'o /
analyzed: 'o ma'i mtshan nyid med pa chu las kyang de nyid du 'gyur ba de ltar du ba la yang 'gyur ba lta bu'o /
translated: The characteristic of milk would be nonexistent even in water, just as it is in smoke.

original: zhe na / skyon de yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: zhe na / skyon de yod pa ma yin te /
translated: There is no such fault.

original: 'di ltar 'o ma dang chu tha dad pa dag gi rul ba'i 'bras bu yang tha dad pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: 'di ltar 'o ma dang chu tha dad pa dag gi rul ba'i 'bras bu yang tha dad pa nyid yin no //
translated: Because the rotten fruits of milk and water are different.

original: ci ste 'bras bu rul ba'i spyi la brten nas 'bras bu tha dad pa med par brjod pa de ltar na de'i rgyu'i spyi'i tha snyad kyang de dag las 'gal ba med pa yin no //
analyzed: ci ste 'bras bu rul ba'i spyi la brten nas 'bras bu tha dad pa med par brjod pa de ltar na de'i rgyu'i spyi'i tha snyad kyang de dag las 'gal ba med pa yin no //
translated: If you say that the absence of different fruits is stated on the basis of the universal of rotten fruit, then the convention of the universal of its cause is not contradicted in those two.

original: 'di ltar rnam pa tha dad pa yin pa de dag kyang dngos po'i zhu ba'i nus ba zhu bar nus gang las /🔽'bras la sogs pa rul pa gang yin pa ni rul ba'i nus par bye brag med pas gnyis kyi yang /
analyzed: 'di ltar rnam pa tha dad pa yin pa de dag kyang dngos po'i zhu ba'i nus ba zhu bar nus gang las / 'bras la sogs pa rul pa gang yin pa ni rul ba'i nus par bye brag med pas gnyis kyi yang /
translated: Because those two, which are different in aspect, are the same in the capacity of the thing that is capable of causing decay.🔽Since the rottenness of rice, etc., is not differentiated by the capacity of rottenness, both milk and water are the same in that respect.

original: 'o ma dang chu dag gis gcig nyid yin pa de ltar na skyon yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: 'o ma dang chu dag gis gcig nyid yin pa de ltar na skyon yod pa ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, there is no fault.

original: de ltar ni 'gyur mod kyi /
analyzed: de ltar ni 'gyur mod kyi /
translated: This is so, but

original: 'di bdag ci'i tha dad pa dang / tha dad med gal te gnyi ga nus pa gcig yin pa de'i tshe nus pa'i bdag nyid tha dad pa med pa gcig gi rang bzhin yin zhing /
analyzed: 'di bdag ci'i tha dad pa dang / tha dad med gal te gnyi ga nus pa gcig yin pa de'i tshe nus pa'i bdag nyid tha dad pa med pa gcig gi rang bzhin yin zhing /
translated: If the two are one, then the nature of the two is not different from the nature of one.

original: snang ba tha dad pa'i phyir gzhan gyi rang bzhin tha dad pa yin pa de ltar na gcig kyang tha dad pa dang tha dad pa med pa'i rang bzhin du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: snang ba tha dad pa'i phyir gzhan gyi rang bzhin tha dad pa yin pa de ltar na gcig kyang tha dad pa dang tha dad pa med pa'i rang bzhin du 'gyur ro //
translated: But because their appearances are different, their natures are different. In that case, one would be both different and not different.

original: zhe na / tha dad pa dang tha dad pa med pa'i rang bzhin ma yin no //
analyzed: zhe na / tha dad pa dang tha dad pa med pa'i rang bzhin ma yin no //
translated: But they are not different and not non-different.

original: 'o na ci yin zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ci yin zhe na /
translated: What are they then?

original: tha dad pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: tha dad pa nyid yin no //
translated: They are different.

original: gal te 'o ma las chu tha dad pa yin pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: gal te 'o ma las chu tha dad pa yin pa de'i tshe /
translated: If milk is different from water,

original: 'o ma dang chu tha dad zho nyid ngo bo gcig ji ltar yin te /
analyzed: 'o ma dang chu tha dad zho nyid ngo bo gcig ji ltar yin te /
translated: then how can milk and water, which are different, be the same nature of curd?

original: gang las rul ba yin par 'gyur bar 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: gang las rul ba yin par 'gyur bar 'gyur zhe na /
translated: From what would curd be produced?

original: bden te / ji ltar /
analyzed: bden te / ji ltar /
translated: It is true, but

original: rang rang gtso bo la gnas phyir //
analyzed: rang rang gtso bo la gnas phyir //
translated: because each is the principal one,

original: dngos po thams cad phan tshun 'dres pa ma yin pa @320b de ltar bdag nyid du gyur ba'i nus pa de dag dang de'i 'bras bu rnams ni phan tshun 'dres pa ma yin no //
analyzed: dngos po thams cad phan tshun 'dres pa ma yin pa @320b de ltar bdag nyid du gyur ba'i nus pa de dag dang de'i 'bras bu rnams ni phan tshun 'dres pa ma yin no //
translated: The capacities that are the nature of all things, and their effects, are not mutually mixed, even though they are not mutually exclusive.

original: 'on kyang ngo bo nyid kyis tha dad pa yin na yang kha cig 'bras bu gcig byed pa yin no //
analyzed: 'on kyang ngo bo nyid kyis tha dad pa yin na yang kha cig 'bras bu gcig byed pa yin no //
translated: Even though they are different by virtue of their intrinsic natures, some produce a single effect.

original: 'bras bu gcig rtogs pa'i blo gcig yin te /
analyzed: 'bras bu gcig rtogs pa'i blo gcig yin te /
translated: There is a single cognition that understands a single effect,

original: nyams su myong ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: nyams su myong ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is an experience.

original: 'bras bu tha dad pa gzhan la yang /
analyzed: 'bras bu tha dad pa gzhan la yang /
translated: Even in regard to other different effects,

original: gcig nyid du zhen par byed pa skye par 'gyur te /
analyzed: gcig nyid du zhen par byed pa skye par 'gyur te /
translated: a cognition that conceives of them as one arises,

original: rang bzhin gyis 'khrul ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rang bzhin gyis 'khrul ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is naturally deluded.

original: de ltar na blo de'i dngos te /
analyzed: de ltar na blo de'i dngos te /
translated: Thus, the nature of that cognition

original: rtogs pa'i ngo bo gcig tha dad med phyir /
analyzed: rtogs pa'i ngo bo gcig tha dad med phyir /
translated: is not different from the nature of the single effect.

original: rgyu'i phyir / nus pa thad dad pa med pa yin zhes brjod /
analyzed: rgyu'i phyir / nus pa thad dad pa med pa yin zhes brjod /
translated: Therefore, it is said that the capacities are not different.

original: dngos po rnams kyi tha dad pa dang tha dad pa med pa 'di rnam par shes pa gcig dang du ma skyed pa gang yin pa de'i de dang de dag ni rigs mthun pa dang mi mthun pa rnam par gzhag pa'i rgyu mtshan yin no //
analyzed: dngos po rnams kyi tha dad pa dang tha dad pa med pa 'di rnam par shes pa gcig dang du ma skyed pa gang yin pa de'i de dang de dag ni rigs mthun pa dang mi mthun pa rnam par gzhag pa'i rgyu mtshan yin no //
translated: The difference and non-difference of things is the reason for positing the sameness and difference of consciousnesses that are produced from them.

original: rnam par shes pa gcig dang du ma skyes pa'i rang bzhin des 'bras bu yang rnam par shes pa gcig dang du ma skyes pa'i rang bzhin gyi rgyur 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa gcig dang du ma skyes pa'i rang bzhin des 'bras bu yang rnam par shes pa gcig dang du ma skyes pa'i rang bzhin gyi rgyur 'gyur ro //
translated: By the nature of being produced from one consciousness or many, the effect also becomes the cause of consciousnesses that are produced from one consciousness or many.

original: gang gi phyir de ltar na dngos po tha dad pa yin na yang rang bzhin gang gis 'bras bu de dag skyed par byed pa'i rang bzhin de nyid kyi shes pa rtog pa'i ngo bo gcig gi rgyur gyur pa don dam par tha dad pa yin na yang
analyzed: gang gi phyir de ltar na dngos po tha dad pa yin na yang rang bzhin gang gis 'bras bu de dag skyed par byed pa'i rang bzhin de nyid kyi shes pa rtog pa'i ngo bo gcig gi rgyur gyur pa don dam par tha dad pa yin na yang
translated: Therefore, even though things are different, the nature that produces those effects is the cause of a single conceptual cognition.

original: tha dad pa med par zhen par 'gyur ba /
analyzed: tha dad pa med par zhen par 'gyur ba /
translated: Even though they are ultimately different, they are conceived to be non-different.

original: de bzhin tha dad yin 'ang cha gang gis te /
analyzed: de bzhin tha dad yin 'ang cha gang gis te /
translated: In the same way, even though they are different, by what part

original: rang bzhin gyis me ni mi shes pa'i rten yin /
analyzed: rang bzhin gyis me ni mi shes pa'i rten yin /
translated: The nature of fire is the basis of the non-cognition of smoke.

original: me rtogs pa'i shes pa tha dad pa med pa'i rgyu yin no //
analyzed: me rtogs pa'i shes pa tha dad pa med pa'i rgyu yin no //
translated: It is the cause of the non-difference of the cognition that realizes fire.

original: rang bzhin des na du skyed pa //
analyzed: rang bzhin des na du skyed pa //
translated: By that nature, it produces smoke.

original: du ba skyed par byed pa ste /
analyzed: du ba skyed par byed pa ste /
translated: It is the producer of smoke.

original: du ba'i me ni rten du gyur pa yin no //
analyzed: du ba'i me ni rten du gyur pa yin no //
translated: Fire is the basis of smoke.

original: rgyu gang gis me ma yin pa las ldog pa'i cha nyid kyis /
analyzed: rgyu gang gis me ma yin pa las ldog pa'i cha nyid kyis /
translated: By what cause, by the aspect of the exclusion of non-fire,

original: me du ba skyed par byed pa'i rgyu /
analyzed: me du ba skyed par byed pa'i rgyu /
translated: fire is the cause of the production of smoke.

original: des na du ba'i rtags de las me de ltar na /
analyzed: des na du ba'i rtags de las me de ltar na /
translated: Therefore, from that sign of smoke, fire is thus.

original: me ma yin pa rnam par gcad pa nyid kyi sgo gnas kyang rtogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: me ma yin pa rnam par gcad pa nyid kyi sgo gnas kyang rtogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: By the exclusion of non-fire alone, the cognition of fire is also established.

original: de ltar na gzhan ltos pa'i ste /
analyzed: de ltar na gzhan ltos pa'i ste /
translated: In that way, depending on another,

original: shing gi khyad par gyis lhan cig byed pa'i rkyen la ltos pa'i me'i cha nyid las ni /
analyzed: shing gi khyad par gyis lhan cig byed pa'i rkyen la ltos pa'i me'i cha nyid las ni /
translated: by the particular wood, the aspect of fire that depends on the cooperative conditions,

original: me rtogs pa'i shes ba sgrub par byed pa nyid kyi me'i mtshan nyid las du ba yang 'byung ba'i phyir /
analyzed: me rtogs pa'i shes ba sgrub par byed pa nyid kyi me'i mtshan nyid las du ba yang 'byung ba'i phyir /
translated: from the characteristic of fire that establishes the cognition that realizes fire, smoke also arises.

original: rgyu'i phyir / du ba de las 'khrul med can //
analyzed: rgyu'i phyir / du ba de las 'khrul med can //
translated: Because of that cause, that smoke is infallible.

original: zhes bya ba de nyid ni ji ltar du ba 'khrul ba med pa can yin pa /
analyzed: zhes bya ba de nyid ni ji ltar du ba 'khrul ba med pa can yin pa /
translated: This is the thesis.

original: de ltar @321a * //
analyzed: de ltar @321a * //
translated: Just as smoke is invariably concomitant with fire,

original: de bzhin 'khrul pa med pa can gyi 'bras bu gzhan grub par rig par bya'o zhes bya bas gzhung btsugs pa yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin 'khrul pa med pa can gyi 'bras bu gzhan grub par rig par bya'o zhes bya bas gzhung btsugs pa yin no //
translated: so too should one understand that the effect is invariably concomitant with the cause.

original: ci phyir du ba me la 'khrul pa med pa can yin no zhe na /
analyzed: ci phyir du ba me la 'khrul pa med pa can yin no zhe na /
translated: Why is smoke invariably concomitant with fire?

original: bshad pa 'di ltar me zhes bya ba'i gzhan 'ga' zhig kyang yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: bshad pa 'di ltar me zhes bya ba'i gzhan 'ga' zhig kyang yod pa ma yin no //
translated: Because there is no fire apart from that which produces the transformation of smoke and fuel.

original: 'o na ci yin zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ci yin zhe na /
translated: What is it?

original: du ba dang bud shing gi 'gyur ba skyed par byed pa gang yin pa de'i yan lag gi dngos po'i rten de la /
analyzed: du ba dang bud shing gi 'gyur ba skyed par byed pa gang yin pa de'i yan lag gi dngos po'i rten de la /
translated: It is the basis of the state of being a part of that which produces the transformation of smoke and fuel.

original: du ba bud shing 'gyur yan lag / rten la ste /
analyzed: du ba bud shing 'gyur yan lag / rten la ste /
translated: Smoke is a part of the transformation of fuel,

original: dngos la me ni gnas phyir te /
analyzed: dngos la me ni gnas phyir te /
translated: because fire is its basis.

original: tha snyad du byas pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: tha snyad du byas pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is conventionally designated as such.

original: gal te du ba 'khrul pa med pa'i yul can nyid du 'dod pa me yin pas de las skyes pa'i don du ba nye ba nyid du 'dod pa de du ba min phyir te /
analyzed: gal te du ba 'khrul pa med pa'i yul can nyid du 'dod pa me yin pas de las skyes pa'i don du ba nye ba nyid du 'dod pa de du ba min phyir te /
translated: If fire is asserted to be the object of the invariable concomitance of smoke, and if smoke is asserted to be the effect that arises from it, then that is not smoke, because it is not produced from fuel.

original: de ltar na mes bskyed pa gang yin pa de du ba yin no //
analyzed: de ltar na mes bskyed pa gang yin pa de du ba yin no //
translated: Thus, whatever is generated by fire is smoke.

original: gal te du ba yin na ci ste gzhan las skyed pa'i du bar 'dod pa de'i tshe rgyur gyur pa'i don de me'i mtshan nyid dang bral ba ma yin na gang gis na du ba me la 'khrul par 'gyur /
analyzed: gal te du ba yin na ci ste gzhan las skyed pa'i du bar 'dod pa de'i tshe rgyur gyur pa'i don de me'i mtshan nyid dang bral ba ma yin na gang gis na du ba me la 'khrul par 'gyur /
translated: If it is smoke, then why is it asserted that it is generated from another? In that case, if the object that is the cause is not devoid of the characteristics of fire, then why would smoke be confused with fire?

original: de me yin te /
analyzed: de me yin te /
translated: It is fire,

original: de ni du bskyed par byed pa la sogs pa'i ngo bo nyid can yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ni du bskyed par byed pa la sogs pa'i ngo bo nyid can yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it has the nature of that which generates smoke and so on.

original: de ltar re zhig rgyu dang 'bras bu'i med na mi 'byung ba nyid yin no //🔽rang bzhin te /
analyzed: de ltar re zhig rgyu dang 'bras bu'i med na mi 'byung ba nyid yin no // rang bzhin te /
translated: Thus, in some cases, the effect is the non-existence of the cause.🔽Nature

original: rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs ni /🔽bdag nyid ji bzhin rgyu ltos nas /
analyzed: rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs ni / bdag nyid ji bzhin rgyu ltos nas /
translated: A reason of nature is

original: rang bzhin med na mi 'byung bar //
analyzed: rang bzhin med na mi 'byung bar //
translated: a nature that is not seen without its cause.

original: zhes bya ba rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs 'ga' zhig la khyab bsgrub par byed pa'i rgyu yin pa de ltar na /
analyzed: zhes bya ba rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs 'ga' zhig la khyab bsgrub par byed pa'i rgyu yin pa de ltar na /
translated: A reason of nature is a reason that proves the pervasion of some nature by another nature.

original: bdag nyid ji lta ba bzhin du de sgrub par byed pa'i gtan tshigs dag gis med na mi 'byung ba nyid yin par rtogs par bya'o //🔽'jig dang byas pa nyid /🔽gong du ji skad bshad zin to //🔽de ji ltar rigs par rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs kyi rab tu dbye ba gzhan dag kyang med na /
analyzed: bdag nyid ji lta ba bzhin du de sgrub par byed pa'i gtan tshigs dag gis med na mi 'byung ba nyid yin par rtogs par bya'o // 'jig dang byas pa nyid / gong du ji skad bshad zin to // de ji ltar rigs par rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs kyi rab tu dbye ba gzhan dag kyang med na /
translated: One should understand that the reason that proves it in accordance with the way it is is a reason of non-observation of a non-pervader.🔽🔽Annihilation and being produced🔽were explained above.🔽🔽As is fitting, there are other divisions of reasons of nature.🔽

original: mi 'byung ba nyid yin par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: mi 'byung ba nyid yin par rig par bya'o //
translated: One should understand that the reason that proves it in that way is a reason of non-apprehension.

original: de de ltar na 'brel pa rnam pa gnyis po dag kyang srog la sogs pa la yod pa ma yin pa de ltar go bar byed pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de de ltar na 'brel pa rnam pa gnyis po dag kyang srog la sogs pa la yod pa ma yin pa de ltar go bar byed pa ma yin te /
translated: The reason of non-apprehension is of two kinds: the non-apprehension of something that is suitable to be apprehended and the non-apprehension of a non-existent thing.🔽The non-apprehension of something that is suitable to be apprehended is like the non-apprehension of a pot that is suitable to be apprehended in a certain place.

original: dper na mnyan par bya ba nyid lta bu'o//🔽gang dag de go bar byed pa yin par mi 'dod pa dang srog la sogs pa go bar byed pa yin par 'dod pa de dag gi /
analyzed: dper na mnyan par bya ba nyid lta bu'o// gang dag de go bar byed pa yin par mi 'dod pa dang srog la sogs pa go bar byed pa yin par 'dod pa de dag gi /
translated: The non-apprehension of a non-existent thing is like the non-apprehension of a rabbit’s horns.🔽The non-apprehension of something that is suitable to be apprehended is a reason of non-apprehension that is a non-observation of a related object.🔽The non-apprehension of a non-existent thing is a reason of non-apprehension that is a non-observation of a non-appearing object.🔽The non-apprehension of something that is suitable to be apprehended is a reason of non-apprehension that is a non-observation of a related object.🔽The non-apprehension of a non-existent thing is a reason of non-apprehension that is a non-observation of a non-appearing object.🔽The non-apprehension of something that is suitable to be apprehended is a reason of non-apprehension that is a non-observation of a related object.🔽The non-apprehension of a non-existent thing is a reason of non-apprehension that is a non-observation of a non-appearing object.🔽The non-apprehension of something that is suitable to be apprehended is a reason of non-apprehension that is a non-observation of a related object.🔽The non-apprehension of a non-existent thing is a reason of non-apprehension that is a non-observation of a non-appearing object.🔽The non-apprehension of something that is suitable to be apprehended is a reason of non-apprehension that is a non-observation of a related object.🔽The non-apprehension of a non-existent thing is a reason of non-apprehension that is a non-observation of a non-appearing object.🔽The non-apprehension of something that is suitable to be apprehended is a reason of non-apprehension that is a non-observation of a related object.

original: ji ltar mnyan par bya ba nyid go bar byed pa ma yin pa de ltar srog la sogs pa yang yin no //
analyzed: ji ltar mnyan par bya ba nyid go bar byed pa ma yin pa de ltar srog la sogs pa yang yin no //
translated: The non-apprehension of a non-existent thing is a reason of non-apprehension that is a non-observation of a

original: mtshungs par mthong phyir /
analyzed: mtshungs par mthong phyir /
translated: Because they are seen equally.

original: mtshungs par snang ba nyid kyi phyir slob dpon gyis mnyan @321b par bya ba nyid bshad pa mdzad pas gtan tshigs min /
analyzed: mtshungs par snang ba nyid kyi phyir slob dpon gyis mnyan @321b par bya ba nyid bshad pa mdzad pas gtan tshigs min /
translated: The master has explained that they are to be heard equally, but that is not the reason.

original: rtogs pa'i tshul 'di kun /
analyzed: rtogs pa'i tshul 'di kun /
translated: All these modes of understanding

original: bshad ma thag pa ste /
analyzed: bshad ma thag pa ste /
translated: are just as we have explained.

original: dper na srog la sogs pa kho bo cag gis bstan pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: dper na srog la sogs pa kho bo cag gis bstan pa lta bu'o //
translated: For example, it is like the life-force, etc. that we have presented.

original: de bzhin du gzhan dag la yang gtan tshigs ldog pa can ni dpyad par bya /
analyzed: de bzhin du gzhan dag la yang gtan tshigs ldog pa can ni dpyad par bya /
translated: In the same way, one should analyze the other reasons that have a reversed pervasion.

original: gal te / rang bzhin 'bras bu bsgrub don du /
analyzed: gal te / rang bzhin 'bras bu bsgrub don du /
translated: If the reason is reversed for the sake of proving the result of essence,

original: gnyis dang gtan tshigs bzlog pa gnyis yin pa de'i tshe mi dmigs pa grub pa'i don du yang ci'i phyir dpe ma byas pa yin zhen /
analyzed: gnyis dang gtan tshigs bzlog pa gnyis yin pa de'i tshe mi dmigs pa grub pa'i don du yang ci'i phyir dpe ma byas pa yin zhen /
translated: then why is non-observation not given as an example for the sake of proving the established object?

original: byas pa nyid yin te /🔽de ltar ni rang bzhin mi dmigs pa ni rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs kyi nang du 'dus par 'gyur ro zhes bshad pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: byas pa nyid yin te / de ltar ni rang bzhin mi dmigs pa ni rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs kyi nang du 'dus par 'gyur ro zhes bshad pa nyid yin no //
translated: It is because it is produced.🔽In that case, non-observation of essence is included within the reason of essence. This is what has been explained.

original: de na rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs kyi dpe nyid kyis bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: de na rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs kyi dpe nyid kyis bstan pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, the example of the reason of essence itself demonstrates it.

original: brgyud pas rang bzhin nyid 'gog pa'i phyir //
analyzed: brgyud pas rang bzhin nyid 'gog pa'i phyir //
translated: Because the intrinsic nature is negated by the effect and the intrinsic nature.

original: rgyu dang khyab par byed pa mi dmigs pa yang bstan par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rgyu dang khyab par byed pa mi dmigs pa yang bstan par 'gyur ro //
translated: The non-apprehension of the cause and the pervader is also taught.

original: yang na 'di gnyis so sor bstan pa na yang gang gi rgyu'am rang bzhin 'di nyid ldog pa na /
analyzed: yang na 'di gnyis so sor bstan pa na yang gang gi rgyu'am rang bzhin 'di nyid ldog pa na /
translated: Or, when these two are taught separately, then when the cause or the intrinsic nature is negated,🔽the effect and the intrinsic nature are negated.

original: rang gi 'bras bu dang rang bzhin ldog par 'gyur ro zhes bshad do de'i phyir /
analyzed: rang gi 'bras bu dang rang bzhin ldog par 'gyur ro zhes bshad do de'i phyir /
translated: Therefore,

original: gtan tshigs rang bzhin ldog nyid kyis //🔽don gyis / de las byung ba dang de'i rang bzhin ldog pa brjod pa'i rgyu'i phyir /
analyzed: gtan tshigs rang bzhin ldog nyid kyis // don gyis / de las byung ba dang de'i rang bzhin ldog pa brjod pa'i rgyu'i phyir /
translated: by the negation of the intrinsic nature,🔽the cause and the intrinsic nature are negated.

original: gang la rgyu'am rang bzhin med pa de la 'bras bu'am rang bzhin yod ba ma yin no zhes don gyis bshad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gang la rgyu'am rang bzhin med pa de la 'bras bu'am rang bzhin yod ba ma yin no zhes don gyis bshad par 'gyur ro //
translated: Because the cause and the intrinsic nature are negated, the effect and the intrinsic nature are negated.🔽Therefore,🔽the effect and the intrinsic nature are negated.

original: de ltar na rang bzhin dang 'bras bu dag gi ldog pa bstan pa nyid kyis /
analyzed: de ltar na rang bzhin dang 'bras bu dag gi ldog pa bstan pa nyid kyis /
translated: Thus, by the negation of the effect and the intrinsic nature,

original: mi dmigs dpe ni grub pa can //
analyzed: mi dmigs dpe ni grub pa can //
translated: the non-apprehension is established as an example.

original: rgyu mi dmigs pa dang khyab par byed pa mi dmigs pa yin pa'i phyir tha dad par ni ma bstan te /
analyzed: rgyu mi dmigs pa dang khyab par byed pa mi dmigs pa yin pa'i phyir tha dad par ni ma bstan te /
translated: But it is not taught that they are different, because the reason is non-apprehension of the effect and non-apprehension of the pervader.

original: so sor ma bstan to zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: so sor ma bstan to zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: The meaning is that they are not taught separately.

original: de ltar 'gyur ba ni bla ste /
analyzed: de ltar 'gyur ba ni bla ste /
translated: It is better to explain it this way.

original: dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid kyir gyur pa'i zhes bya ba'i khyad par gang las thob pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid kyir gyur pa'i zhes bya ba'i khyad par gang las thob pa yin zhe na /
translated: From what distinction is it obtained that it is characterized by non-apprehension?

original: bshad pa de la 'ong skyes bu ma mthong las /
analyzed: bshad pa de la 'ong skyes bu ma mthong las /
translated: In response to that, it is explained:

original: srog sogs ldog pa med pa'i phyir //
analyzed: srog sogs ldog pa med pa'i phyir //
translated: Because there is no cessation of life, etc.🔽when the person is not seen.🔽Because there is no cessation of the non-appearance of the self, etc.,

original: gzhan la mthong ba'i ngo bo zhes bya ba la sogs pas bdag mi snang ba ldog pa med pa'i phyir srog la sogs pa gtan tshigs the tshom za bshad pas /
analyzed: gzhan la mthong ba'i ngo bo zhes bya ba la sogs pas bdag mi snang ba ldog pa med pa'i phyir srog la sogs pa gtan tshigs the tshom za bshad pas /
translated: when the nature of the other is seen, life, etc. are explained to be uncertain reasons.

original: gal te mi dmigs pa 'di la yang gang ldog pa sgrub par byed pa de mi snang ba'i don yin pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: gal te mi dmigs pa 'di la yang gang ldog pa sgrub par byed pa de mi snang ba'i don yin pa de'i tshe /
translated: If in this non-apprehension, what is established by cessation has the meaning of non-appearance,🔽then

original: mi snang don la de ste /
analyzed: mi snang don la de ste /
translated: it is taught that the meaning of non-appearance is uncertain.🔽If the meaning of non-apprehension is not established by cessation,

original: gtan tshigs the tshom za pa yin no zhes bstan par 'gyur ro //🔽mi dmigs pa'i @322a * //
analyzed: gtan tshigs the tshom za pa yin no zhes bstan par 'gyur ro //🔽mi dmigs pa'i @322a * //
translated: then it is taught that the meaning of non-apprehension is uncertain.

original: de dngos te /
analyzed: de dngos te /
translated: That is the case.

original: dngos por gyur pa'i chos can la yang dgag pa bsgrub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dngos por gyur pa'i chos can la yang dgag pa bsgrub par 'gyur ro //
translated: And the negation is established with respect to a property-possessor that is a thing.

original: yang gi sgra ni dngos po ma yin pa la yang ngo //
analyzed: yang gi sgra ni dngos po ma yin pa la yang ngo //
translated: The word “also” indicates that it is also with respect to a property-possessor that is not a thing.

original: 'di 'dra ba zhig ce na /
analyzed: 'di 'dra ba zhig ce na /
translated: What is it like?

original: cha ni khas blangs med pa can te /
analyzed: cha ni khas blangs med pa can te /
translated: The part is not accepted.

original: dngos po'i rang bzhin 'phen pa ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: dngos po'i rang bzhin 'phen pa ma yin pa'o //
translated: The nature of a thing is not implied.

original: rgyu dang khyab par byed pa mi dmigs pa dag gi ni dngos po rnam par gcod pa tsam dang / med pa'i tha snyad 'ba' zhig sgrub par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: rgyu dang khyab par byed pa mi dmigs pa dag gi ni dngos po rnam par gcod pa tsam dang / med pa'i tha snyad 'ba' zhig sgrub par byed pa yin no //
translated: The non-observation of a cause and of a pervader are only established by the mere exclusion of a thing and the expression of non-existence.

original: snga ma dag gis te /
analyzed: snga ma dag gis te /
translated: The former,

original: rang bzhin dang 'bras bu'i gtan tshigs dag gis don gzhan gyis dpen pa'i dngos po'i chos ma yin pa'i bsgrub par bya ba yin no //
analyzed: rang bzhin dang 'bras bu'i gtan tshigs dag gis don gzhan gyis dpen pa'i dngos po'i chos ma yin pa'i bsgrub par bya ba yin no //
translated: the reason of nature and the reason of effect, establish a property-possessor that is a thing, which is distinguished by a different object.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: sgrub par byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sgrub par byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because they establish that.

original: dngos po tsam nye ba nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dngos po tsam nye ba nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the mere thing is present.

original: rang bzhin mi dmigs pa ni med pa'i tha snyad yin gyi /
analyzed: rang bzhin mi dmigs pa ni med pa'i tha snyad yin gyi /
translated: The non-observation of a nature is the expression of non-existence.

original: med pa ma yin pa de ltar na rang bzhin mi dmigs pa /
analyzed: med pa ma yin pa de ltar na rang bzhin mi dmigs pa /
translated: If it is not nonexistent, then the nonobservation of essence

original: de la dmigs pa dag la ni /
analyzed: de la dmigs pa dag la ni /
translated: exists for those who have the observation of that.

original: snang ba'i don dag la /
analyzed: snang ba'i don dag la /
translated: With regard to the object that appears,

original: dmigs pa las gzhan yod pa yin /
analyzed: dmigs pa las gzhan yod pa yin /
translated: it exists as something other than the observation.

original: 'on kyang dmigs pa nyid yod pa nyid yin no //🔽de ltar dmigs pa'i sgra las la yod pa'am /🔽byed pa po la yod pa'i bya ba yin par brjod grang na /
analyzed: 'on kyang dmigs pa nyid yod pa nyid yin no // de ltar dmigs pa'i sgra las la yod pa'am / byed pa po la yod pa'i bya ba yin par brjod grang na /
translated: However, the observation itself exists.🔽Thus, if the word “observation” refers to the object, it would be the existence of the object.

original: las la gnas pa yin na ni /
analyzed: las la gnas pa yin na ni /
translated: Or, if it refers to the agent, it would be the action that exists in the agent.🔽If it refers to the object,

original: don gyi rung ba nyid dmigs pa yin no //
analyzed: don gyi rung ba nyid dmigs pa yin no //
translated: then the suitability of the object is the observation.

original: de yang dmigs pa dag la bdag nyid kyi phyir khyad par yod pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: de yang dmigs pa dag la bdag nyid kyi phyir khyad par yod pa nyid yin no //
translated: Moreover, it is the existence of a difference, because it is the nature of the observation.

original: byed pa po la gnas pa nyid yin na mi dmigs pa'i shes pa dmigs pa yin te /
analyzed: byed pa po la gnas pa nyid yin na mi dmigs pa'i shes pa dmigs pa yin te /
translated: If it refers to the agent, then the consciousness that is the nonobservation is the observation.

original: de yang de 'dra ba'i don yod pa nyid kyi tha snyad kyi rgyu nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de yang de 'dra ba'i don yod pa nyid kyi tha snyad kyi rgyu nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Moreover, it is the cause of the convention of the existence of such an object.

original: khyab pa dang ldog pa med na ni 'khrul pa med pa can yin pa de ltar na yang yod pa nyid bzhin du nye bar btags pa las yod pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: khyab pa dang ldog pa med na ni 'khrul pa med pa can yin pa de ltar na yang yod pa nyid bzhin du nye bar btags pa las yod pa nyid yin no //
translated: If there is no pervasion and no reversal, then it is without error. In that case, it is existence, just like existence itself, because it is a designation.

original: de ltar rnam pa gnyi ga ltar yang mi dmigs pa yod pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: de ltar rnam pa gnyi ga ltar yang mi dmigs pa yod pa nyid yin no //
translated: Thus, non-apprehension exists in both ways.

original: de med pa'ang med pa nyid yin te /
analyzed: de med pa'ang med pa nyid yin te /
translated: And that non-existence is also non-existence,

original: mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro //🔽med pa'i tha snyad kyi yul de shes pa na /
analyzed: mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro // med pa'i tha snyad kyi yul de shes pa na /
translated: because of non-apprehension.🔽When the object of the convention of non-existence is known,

original: gang gi yul can dag mi shes pa yin te /
analyzed: gang gi yul can dag mi shes pa yin te /
translated: the subject of that is not known,

original: rmongs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rmongs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because of delusion.

original: de'i phyir mi shes shes byed phyir /
analyzed: de'i phyir mi shes shes byed phyir /
translated: Therefore, because of making the unknown known,

original: rang bzhin mi dmigs /
analyzed: rang bzhin mi dmigs /
translated: the nature is not apprehended.

original: gcig dper bzhed pa yin mi dmigs pa de yang med pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yin no //
analyzed: gcig dper bzhed pa yin mi dmigs pa de yang med pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yin no //
translated: And that non-apprehension is of the nature of non-existence, because it is accepted as an example of one.

original: de bas na rang bzhin mi dmigs pa de lta yul ni med nyid phyir /
analyzed: de bas na rang bzhin mi dmigs pa de lta yul ni med nyid phyir /
translated: Therefore, because the object of that non-apprehension of nature is non-existence,

original: shes pa la sogs pa'i yul gyi dngos @322b po med pa'i rgyu'i phyir /
analyzed: shes pa la sogs pa'i yul gyi dngos @322b po med pa'i rgyu'i phyir /
translated: because of being the cause of the non-existence of the object of consciousness and so on,

original: shes pa yod pa nyid dang brjod pa nyid yod dam med ces the tshom za ba ni /
analyzed: shes pa yod pa nyid dang brjod pa nyid yod dam med ces the tshom za ba ni /
translated: The doubt whether consciousness exists or not, whether expression exists or not,🔽is the doubt about consciousness and expression.

original: shes brjod the tshom za ba yis //
analyzed: shes brjod the tshom za ba yis //
translated: The doubt about consciousness and expression

original: yul can dag ni 'gog par 'gyur //
analyzed: yul can dag ni 'gog par 'gyur //
translated: is the cessation of the subject.

original: ji ltar zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar zhe na /
translated: How is that?

original: dper na sreg med phyir me min /
analyzed: dper na sreg med phyir me min /
translated: For example, it is like the non-existence of fire because of the non-existence of burning.

original: dper na 'ga' zhig la gzhan gyi me dang 'dra bar snang ba'i shes pa skyes na /
analyzed: dper na 'ga' zhig la gzhan gyi me dang 'dra bar snang ba'i shes pa skyes na /
translated: For example, if a consciousness arises in someone that appears like the fire of another,

original: me'i rang bzhin gyi the tshom yod na /
analyzed: me'i rang bzhin gyi the tshom yod na /
translated: if there is doubt about the nature of fire,

original: gzhan la 'di ni dper na me ma yin te /
analyzed: gzhan la 'di ni dper na me ma yin te /
translated: it is said to another: “This is not like fire,

original: sreg par byed pa nyid ma yin pa'i phyir ro zhes brjod pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: sreg par byed pa nyid ma yin pa'i phyir ro zhes brjod pa lta bu'o //
translated: because it does not have the nature of burning.”

original: sreg par byed pa las me ni gzhan ma yin te /
analyzed: sreg par byed pa las me ni gzhan ma yin te /
translated: Fire is not different from burning.

original: 'on kyang sred par byed pa'i don me'i tha snyad kyi yul du 'gyur ba med pa nyid kyis /
analyzed: 'on kyang sred par byed pa'i don me'i tha snyad kyi yul du 'gyur ba med pa nyid kyis /
translated: However, because the object of burning is not the domain of the convention of fire,

original: 'jig rten la tha dad pa med par me'i shes pa la sogs par 'gog par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'jig rten la tha dad pa med par me'i shes pa la sogs par 'gog par 'gyur ro //
translated: it is the cessation of the worldly consciousness of fire, etc., without difference.🔽Just as one does not say that existence is not different from the object,

original: ji ltar dmigs pa las yod pa nyid gzhan ma yin no zhes mi brjod pa de ltar /
analyzed: ji ltar dmigs pa las yod pa nyid gzhan ma yin no zhes mi brjod pa de ltar /
translated: in the same way,

original: mi dmigs pa la mi dmigs don dag la /
analyzed: mi dmigs pa la mi dmigs don dag la /
translated: The meaning of non-apprehension is not non-apprehension.

original: gzhan yang yod pa nyid ma yin /
analyzed: gzhan yang yod pa nyid ma yin /
translated: Moreover, it is not existence.

original: 'on kyang mi dmigs pa kho na med pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: 'on kyang mi dmigs pa kho na med pa nyid yin no //
translated: However, it is only non-apprehension that is non-existence.

original: de bas na ste de'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de bas na ste de'i phyir ro //
translated: Therefore, for that reason,

original: de yod phyir /
analyzed: de yod phyir /
translated: because of its existence,

original: med pa bsgrub par bya ba ma yin no //
analyzed: med pa bsgrub par bya ba ma yin no //
translated: non-existence is not to be established.

original: 'o na ci yin zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ci yin zhe na /
translated: What then is it?

original: shes pa de rgyu can te /
analyzed: shes pa de rgyu can te /
translated: That cognition is conditioned,

original: mi dmigs pa'i rgyu can dang / sgra bsgrub byar 'gyur /
analyzed: mi dmigs pa'i rgyu can dang / sgra bsgrub byar 'gyur /
translated: conditioned by non-apprehension, and sound is what is to be established.

original: med pa'i shes pa dang / brjod pa dang tha snyad do //🔽gal te dmigs pa'i rgyu mtshan du gyur pas /
analyzed: med pa'i shes pa dang / brjod pa dang tha snyad do // gal te dmigs pa'i rgyu mtshan du gyur pas /
translated: It is the cognition of non-existence, expression, and convention.🔽If, on the other hand, the cognition without a reason, etc. is what is to be established,

original: rgyu mtshan med pa'i shes pa la sogs pa bsgrub par bya ba yin na /
analyzed: rgyu mtshan med pa'i shes pa la sogs pa bsgrub par bya ba yin na /
translated: taking as its reason the existence of the reason,

original: de'i tshe rgyu mtshan yod na rgyu mtshan can yod par nges pa med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de'i tshe rgyu mtshan yod na rgyu mtshan can yod par nges pa med pa'i phyir /
translated: then at that time, because it is not certain that when there is a reason there is one with a reason,

original: med pa'i shes pa dang / brjod pa 'jug pa 'grub pa ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: med pa'i shes pa dang / brjod pa 'jug pa 'grub pa ma yin no zhe na /
translated: the engagement of the cognition of non-existence and expression is not established.

original: skyon de yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: skyon de yod pa ma yin te /
translated: That fault does not exist,

original: 'di ltar med ces bya ba'i tha snyad 'di grub bo //
analyzed: 'di ltar med ces bya ba'i tha snyad 'di grub bo //
translated: because in this way, the convention “non-existent” is established.

original: grub pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: grub pa nyid yin no //
translated: It is established.

original: gang gi tshe zhe na /🔽snang ba ma mthong la /
analyzed: gang gi tshe zhe na / snang ba ma mthong la /
translated: When?🔽When the appearance is not seen,

original: dmigs su rung ba ma mthong ba yod pa na'o //
analyzed: dmigs su rung ba ma mthong ba yod pa na'o //
translated: and the object is not seen.

original: de'i phyir mthong ba dang ma mthong ba /🔽de grub pa na de 'bras la'ang /
analyzed: de'i phyir mthong ba dang ma mthong ba / de grub pa na de 'bras la'ang /
translated: Therefore, when the object is seen or not seen,

original: yod na / blo dang sgra la the tshom med /
analyzed: yod na / blo dang sgra la the tshom med /
translated: if it exists, then there is no doubt about the cognition and the word.

original: de ltar med pa'i tha snyad la /
analyzed: de ltar med pa'i tha snyad la /
translated: In that way, if the convention of non-existence

original: de dag 'jug pa ma yin na gang gis na nges pa med par 'gyur /
analyzed: de dag 'jug pa ma yin na gang gis na nges pa med par 'gyur /
translated: does not apply to them, then by what would it be ascertained?

original: 'on kyang de 'dra ba'i yul gyi dngos po snang ba la med do zhes bya ba'i tha snyad grub pa ma yin no //
analyzed: 'on kyang de 'dra ba'i yul gyi dngos po snang ba la med do zhes bya ba'i tha snyad grub pa ma yin no //
translated: However, the convention “the object does not exist” is not established in the appearance of such an object.

original: 'on kyang yul yod na yang rmongs pa'i phyir /
analyzed: 'on kyang yul yod na yang rmongs pa'i phyir /
translated: But even if the object exists, because of delusion,

original: gzhan dag @323a * //
analyzed: gzhan dag @323a * //
translated: others

original: skyes bu gzhan bstan par bya ba /
analyzed: skyes bu gzhan bstan par bya ba /
translated: should be taught by another person.

original: de la 'jug mi 'gyur /
analyzed: de la 'jug mi 'gyur /
translated: They will not engage in that.

original: med par brjod pa la sogs pa 'jug par mi 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: med par brjod pa la sogs pa 'jug par mi 'gyur gyi /
translated: They will not engage in the expression of non-existence, and so on.

original: brda dang dran par byed pa yin /
analyzed: brda dang dran par byed pa yin /
translated: It is a reminder of the convention.

original: dper na 'jig rten med pa tha snyad ci 'dra ba snang bar 'gyur ba mi dmigs pa na /
analyzed: dper na 'jig rten med pa tha snyad ci 'dra ba snang bar 'gyur ba mi dmigs pa na /
translated: For example, when the non-existence of the world appears as a convention, if the non-observation

original: yul nyid du /
analyzed: yul nyid du /
translated: 1.1.1.1.1.1.1. The object of the expression “non-existent”

original: grub pa yin zhing gang la khyod kyis kyang med pa'i tha snyad byas pa de dang chos mthun pa yin pa de bas na 'di /
analyzed: grub pa yin zhing gang la khyod kyis kyang med pa'i tha snyad byas pa de dang chos mthun pa yin pa de bas na 'di /
translated: is established as an object. And it is similar to that in which you also make the expression “non-existent.” Therefore,

original: grub pa'i yul dang chos mthun phyir /
analyzed: grub pa'i yul dang chos mthun phyir /
translated: because it is similar to the object of the expression “non-existent,”

original: 'dir yang med pa'i tha snyad rtogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'dir yang med pa'i tha snyad rtogs par 'gyur ro //
